If the characters are rude, disrespectful, or threatening, Agatha tries to frighten them away using her @UUID[Actor.pbsoBanshee00000.Item.Naj6ZN6sas6MnaNP]{Horrifying Visage}的巢穴提供了一个明显的地标。如果这还不足以吓阻他们，她会发动攻击。

与女妖的交涉

如果角色们表现出尊重和礼貌，他们可以通过一次成功的[[/check skill=per dc=15]]检定说服阿加莎帮助他们。

与女妖交谈的玩家进行检定。如果该玩家在角色扮演中表现出色，允许他们带着优势进行检定。如果任何角色拥有加雷尔修女的银梳并将其作为礼物呈现给阿加莎，检定将自动成功。如果检定失败，阿加莎会攻击角色；如果成功，她会冷笑着娱乐地回答他们的问题：

好吧。我知道你们寻找许多事物。问我一个问题，我会给你一个答案。

如果角色们询问博根特的咒书，阿加莎告诉他们她在一百多年前将这本书交给了来自伊里亚博尔城的一位名叫特瑟诺斯的死灵法师。她不知道这本书之后的去向。她的回答是真实的，这就是加雷尔修女需要的信息，让哈珀组织继续他们的搜索。

角色们也可以选择询问阿加莎其他事情，比如克拉格莫城堡的位置，回声洞穴的位置，蜘蛛的身份，或者哈蒙·科斯特对@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoOldOwlWell00.JournalEntryPage.KjqPduMKcZuKp7X2]{Old Owl Well} (the name of the wizard who built the tower at Old Owl Well is Dresina) . Agatha is well informed and a capable diviner, so she can answer almost any single question pertaining to the adventure that the players think to have their characters ask. However, the banshee warns the characters that she will answer only one question, so they should choose it carefully.

Sister Garaele’s Quest

Learning what Agatha knows about the missing spellbook completes a @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.2NFsevkbevf8r0ZP#sister-garaeles-bargain]{quest} given to the party by Sister Garaele in Phandalin. The characters should report to Sister Garaele to receive their payment of three @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.ytlsBjYsZ7OBSEBs]{potions of healing}的问题。

Cragmaw Castle.name: 石牙城 (Cragmaw Castle)
Cragmaw Castle.text:
石颚哥布林包括分散在特里博尔小径和无冬之林地区的几支掠夺性团伙。然而，有一位领袖被所有其他人勉强承认为至高无上：@UUID[Actor.pbsoKingGrol0000]{King Grol} of Cragmaw Castle.

Cragmaw Castle isn’t a goblin construction, nor is that the structure’s original name. It was built by a talented wizard of old Phalorm, an ancient realm that once controlled much of the North. It originally had seven overlapping towers; however, its upper levels have long since collapsed to heaps of crumbling masonry. Only the ground floor remains sound enough to be habitable.

Activate the Cragmaw Castle Scene

The following locations are keyed to the @UUID[Scene.pbsoCragmawCastl]{Cragmaw Castle} Scene.

Cragmaw Castle Locations

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3Atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.PM5bvsbG0pXm1fuh caption=false]

General Features

The centuries haven’t been kind to Cragmaw Castle. The Cragmaw goblins shored up the weakest areas beneath its falling towers with crude timbers, but it’s only a matter of time before the structure collapses completely.

Doors

Interior doors are made of wood reinforced with iron bands. They have neither locks nor keyholes. It takes a successful [[/check ability=str dc=15]] check to break down a door that is barricaded.

Ceilings

Ceilings are 15 feet high unless noted otherwise.

Floors

Cracked and uneven flagstones conceal a dirt floor underneath.

Light

A small amount of natural light filters through the arrow slits around the castle. During the day, this provides dim light in most areas. At night, all areas of the castle are dark.

Walls

The castle’s thickest walls are 5 feet thick, with 3 feet of mortared fill sandwiched between 1-foot-thick courses of hard stone blocks. Interior walls are 1-foot-thick worked stone.

Arrow slits in the castle walls are positioned 10 feet above the ground and 4 feet above the interior floors. A creature on one side of an arrow slit gains &Reference[three-quarters-cover]{three-quarters cover} 对抗来自另一方的攻击。

Castle Entrance.name: 城堡入口
Castle Entrance.text:
这座城堡有七座不同大小和高度的摇摇欲坠的塔楼，但上层都处于不同程度的倒塌状态。一段短阶梯通向主入口前的露台。穿过一对破碎的大门的残骸，便是一座阴暗的大厅。圆塔高耸在入口处，箭孔对准露台。

在@UUID[.n3inczgvCZ81TH7Z]{areas C1} and @UUID[.0czdRMD60qKNdAaY]{C2} are made of bronze-covered wood, but they are corroded and collapsed. No monsters dwell here, but the goblin sentries in @UUID[.y5KK6PJ75FZLYYah]{area C3 }之间的主门应该是在值班。然而，他们只偶尔透过箭孔张望，所以行动安静的角色可能能够悄悄地溜过他们。让每个角色进行一次[[/check skill=ste]]检定。最低的检定结果是哥布林们进行[[/check ability=wis]]检定来注意到队伍的DC。

发展。如果哥布林们发现了角色(或者角色公开接近)，他们会通过箭孔射箭。然而，他们无法直接向已经到达或穿过破损大门的敌人射击。哥布林们还会大喊，通知他们在@UUID[.VDje2CHUgxK4IF2R]{areas C4}和@UUID[.9I6vEKaSMk4uePzW]{area C6}的同伴，城堡正在遭受攻击。

Trapped Hall.name: 困住的大厅 (Trapped Hall)
Trapped Hall.text:
北边和南边的门紧闭着，南边的走廊上有一堆破碎的瓦砾部分遮挡着。向东是一条宽敞的走廊，尽头有两扇门，通向南边和东边。走廊上散落着灰尘和从天花板部分坍塌下来的石膏。

如果@UUID[.y5KK6PJ75FZLYYah]{area C3} raised the alarm, then the goblins and hobgoblins in @UUID[.VDje2CHUgxK4IF2R]{areas C4} and @UUID[.9I6vEKaSMk4uePzW]{area C6}中的哥布林哨兵同时冲过北边和南边的门。他们会从两个方向发起攻击，试图压倒冒险者，驱逐他们离开城堡。

陷阱。在通往@UUID[.51G0dT8hJSfA2l0h]{area C8} conceal a copper tripwire connected to linchpins hidden in the ruined ceiling. Spotting the tripwire requires a search of the area and a successful [[/check skill=prc dc=20]] check. Once spotted, the tripwire is easily avoided and disarmed (no ability check required).

Any creature that walks over or through the rubble without avoiding the tripwire triggers a cave-in of wooden beams and heavy stones (the area of the collapse is marked with a Drawing labeled "TRAP" only visible to the Dungeon Master). Any creature in the area when the trap triggers must succeed on a [[/save ability=dex dc=10]] saving throw or take [[/damage 2d10 type=bludgeoning]] damage from the falling rubble (half as much damage on a successful save). The noise of the collapse puts the creatures in @UUID[.y5KK6PJ75FZLYYah]{areas C3}, @UUID[.48OPvqVfs31LcWuD]{area C7}、@UUID[.51G0dT8hJSfA2l0h]{area C8}和@UUID[.CGOPCa1rt7oglgw8]{area C9}的门前的灰尘石膏和瓦砾会让他们警觉。

Archer Post.name: 弓箭手岗哨
Archer Post.text:
这个小房间里到处都是碎片。门对面的箭孔可以俯视城堡大门前的露台。两个手持短弓的地精站在箭孔附近。

克拉格摩城堡(Cragmaw Castle)的主要防御措施是其秘密位置和看起来被遗弃的外表。此外，@UUID[Actor.pbsoKingGrol0000]{King Grol}会派哨兵驱赶那些靠近的入侵者。

这两个房间中，每个都有两个手持短弓的@UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinBoss00]{goblin bosses}。

地精们每轮都会向外部目标射击。当角色进入房间时，地精们会切换到近战攻击。

Ruined Quarters.name: 废墟区 (Ruined Quarters)
Ruined Quarters.text:
城堡的西南塔楼几乎只剩下一堆碎石。几张破破烂烂的床垫散落在剩余的地板空间上，其中三张床垫上有地精正在睡觉。一个小而曲折的通道向东穿过废墟。

这里有三个@UUID[Actor.TjWQOgI3A4UAl7lC]{goblins}。尽管碎石看起来很危险，但塔楼很稳固，东边的通道也很安全。

发展。 这里的任何大声噪音都会引起@UUID[.48OPvqVfs31LcWuD]{area C7}中地精的注意。一个地精会被派遣穿过曲折的通道去调查干扰。如果他一两轮内没有回来，或者他发现麻烦并发出警报，C7区域中的其他地精会进行调查。

Storeroom.name: 储藏室 (D&D)
Storeroom.text:
旧的木桶和腐烂的谷物袋填满了这个储藏区，还有一堆杂乱的装备。

沿着高地之路和特里博尔小径被克拉格莫掠夺的商队为城堡提供了补给。

@UUID[Item.pbsoEmboldeningB]{Emboldening Brandy}. While most of the casks are full of salted meat, one small cask is filled with an exceptional dwarven brandy, which the goblins didn’t notice because it was mixed in with junk. The cask contains the equivalent of twenty glasses. A character who imbibes a glass of brandy receives 1 &Reference[temporary-hit-points]{temporary hit point}, but a character who drinks two glasses or more within 1 hour has the &Reference[condition=poisoned]{poisoned} 1小时。

@UUID[Item.pbsoSildarsGear0]{Sildar’s Gear}。 这些物资中堆放的装备包括一套血迹斑斑的锁子甲，一个装在皮鞘中的短剑，一把重型弩，以及一个长剑，剑柄上镶有“无冬之城”的徽章。锁子甲和武器属于西尔达·霍尔温特。这些物品都不是魔法物品，但如果至少他的长剑被归还，西尔达会很感激。

Hobgoblin Quarters.name: 半兽人住所 (Hobgoblin Quarters)
Hobgoblin Quarters.text:
这个军营的地板上摆放着四张普通的稻草垫和睡袋。墙上的托架上挂着各种武器：长矛、剑、晨星等。北墙显示出受损的迹象，但地板上清扫干净，没有碎石。四个褐色皮肤的人形生物无聊地坐在睡袋上。

有四个@UUID[Actor.6qnT52lZtZblgGw8]{hobgoblins} are quartered in this room. Because their goblin neighbors are always getting into fights, they don’t pay attention to noise in @UUID[.0czdRMD60qKNdAaY]{areas C2} or @UUID[.y5KK6PJ75FZLYYah]{area C3}。然而，如果有任何入侵者出现，他们会迅速捍卫他们的塔楼，或者响应由哥布林哨兵发出的警报。

克拉格莫是一个混合种族的哥布林，有一小撮大个子的熊人统治着更多数量的可怜哥布林和一些地精战士。地精战士计划有一天除掉大个子熊人并接管领地，但目前，大个子熊人是一个太大的威胁。

宝藏。挂在墙上的有五个@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.OG4nBBydvmfWYXIk]{spears}, four @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.10ZP2Bu3vnCuYMIB]{longswords}, three @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.dX8AxCh9o0A9CkT3]{morningstars}，两个@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.xMkP8BmFzElcsMaR]{greatswords}，和一个@UUID[Item.pbsoLightFeather]{quarterstaff}。这些武器都不是魔法的，但那根长棍上刻有风格化的羽毛。这根长棍惊人地轻(1 磅)，仅凭工艺就值得 10 金币。

Banquet Hall.name: 宴会厅 (Banquet Hall)
Banquet Hall.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.0QTbXuqjzn2C2CJr]

这个大厅的西部部分以一堵瓦砾墙结束，但其余部分仍然完好。这曾经是城堡的宴会厅，拥有二十五英尺高的高耸天花板。房间中央有两张大木桌和简陋的长凳，一个装满炽热煤炭的黄铜火盆被塞进一个角落。脏盘子、半满的炖锅、发霉的面包残渣和啃过的骨头覆盖着桌子。几只地精在四处忙碌，而一个看起来强壮的地精正在发号施令。

这个大厅里有六个@UUID[Actor.TjWQOgI3A4UAl7lC]{goblins} and one @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinBoss00]{goblin boss}—a cantankerous fellow named Yegg. Yegg is the primary cook for the Cragmaws, and he berates his assistants as they go about the work of putting food on the Cragmaws’ table. If Yegg is killed, any goblins left alive flee to the east or west, avoiding the north door because of the trap in @UUID[.0czdRMD60qKNdAaY]{area C2}。

Dark Hall.name: 黑暗大厅 (Dark Hall)
Dark Hall.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoIntroArtHand.JournalEntryPage.KxeEkVCfkglRmjdS]

这个区域没有外部光线。盒装文本假设角色们拥有&Reference[暗视]{darkvision} or a light source.

This high, narrow hall looks as if it might’ve been part of a chapel or shrine at one time. Angelic figures are sculpted along the room’s upper reaches, overlooking the floor. To the north, heavy curtains block a matching pair of archways. Between the archways is a cracked but ornately carved stone brazier.

This chamber is home to a @UUID[Actor.tFJX45zj3QDc3Zli]{grick}, the special pet of the goblin boss Lhupo in @UUID[.CGOPCa1rt7oglgw8]{area C9}。格里克喜欢爬到房间上部雕像阴影中隐藏的壁架上。它悄悄地观察进入区域的入侵者，然后扑下来袭击。大厅中的角色必须成功进行一次[[/check skill=prc dc=14]]检定，否则会被&Reference[突袭]{surprised}.

The grick knows that goblins are not to be eaten unless Lhupo says so. The rest of the Cragmaws are terrified of the grick and hurry through this room, preferably in twos or threes.

A character who examines the chapel’s decor can make a [[/check skill=rel dc=10]] check to identify the deities that were once revered here: Oghma (god of knowledge), Mystra (god of magic), Lathander (god of dawn), and Tymora (god of luck).

Development. If combat erupts here, the creatures in @UUID[.CGOPCa1rt7oglgw8]{area C9} cannot be &Reference[surprise]{surprised}。

宝藏。 石炉中装有一堆煤，下面埋藏着一枚金@UUID[Item.pbsoGoldenElfSta]{statuette} of an elf worth 100 gp, wrapped in crimson cloth. A goblin hid the figurine here, hoping his fellow goblins wouldn’t steal it.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{detect magic} spell reveals that the statuette is imbued with divination magic. A non-evil creature grasping the statue can ask it a question and receive a telepathic response, as though the creature had cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4v2H3hHb3Ph9XLNd]{augury}。一旦生物提出问题并得到回答，就再也无法激活这个小雕像了。

Goblin Shrine.name: 哥布林神龛 (Goblin Shrine)
Goblin Shrine.text:
石拱牙族一直把这个地方当作一个他们称为锯齿之神的虚构神的神龛。 这个神龛是@UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinBoss00]{goblin boss} named Lhupo, who styles herself as a priest, and her “acolytes,” a pair of @UUID[Actor.TjWQOgI3A4UAl7lC]{goblins}. They all wear robes over their armor, but none of them possess divine powers. If the goblins heard the characters fighting the grick in @UUID[.51G0dT8hJSfA2l0h]{area C8}的藏身之地，他们躲在祭坛后面，试图突袭角色；否则，三个地精都跪在祭坛前祈祷。 这个房间位于城堡的北塔。房间中央有一座石祭坛，上面覆盖着染血的黑色布。金制的祭祀用具——一个圣杯和一个香炉——被小心地摆放在祭坛上。南边有两个拱门，被厚重的帘子遮挡着。 祭坛上覆盖着染血的布，两侧刻有与@UUID[.51G0dT8hJSfA2l0h]{area C8}.

Treasure. The @UUID[Item.pbsoChalicecragm]{chalice} and @UUID[Item.pbsoCensercragma]{censer}中的装饰反映的相同神祇的图像。这些艺术品价值分别为180 gp和150 gp。Lhupo认为这些物品适合她未命名的仪式。

Postern Gate.name: 小门 (Postern Gate)
Postern Gate.text:
在旧城堡的南侧，一条长满杂草的小路通往一条通往城墙的通道。这里有一扇大铁门，可以避免直接外部攻击。地面上方十英尺处有箭孔俯瞰着小路。

铁门被锁上了。可以用盗贼工具打开，通过成功的[[/check tool=thief ability=dex dc=15]]检定或者用成功的[[/check skill=ath dc=25]]检定强行打开。任何试图破坏门的行为，无论成功与否，都会引起@UUID[.48OPvqVfs31LcWuD]{areas C7}, @UUID[.51G0dT8hJSfA2l0h]{area C8}, @UUID[.CGOPCa1rt7oglgw8]{area C9}、@UUID[.ROSzKfKBx0iDptT6]{area C12}和@UUID[.WnXnLJdmXcNWGZRs]{area C13}中的生物的注意。

箭孔。 任何在箭孔附近停下来倾听的角色都会听到C7区域的声音——偶尔的碎器声和愤怒的地精争论是否需要清洗餐具。地精们并不是从这些箭孔上守望，但如果角色们制造了大量噪音，地精们会前来查看。如果他们看到外面的入侵者，地精们会大声警告。

Ruined Tower.name: 废墟塔 (Ruined Tower)
Ruined Tower.text:
这座塔几乎完全坍塌，尽管底层仍有一些开阔空间。腐烂的板条箱和古老的桶表明曾经在这里存放过物资。

一道厚重的帷幕遮挡了南边一个破败的区域，一扇完好无损的门通向东边。向北，一条穿过瓦砾的短通道在一块帆布屏风前结束。

灰尘飘扬的帆布掩盖了通往这个区域的北部入口，与周围的石料和碎石融为一体。成功通过[[/check skill=prc dc=15]]检定的角色会发现通往隐藏入口的小径。如果角色们积极搜索城堡外部寻找隐藏入口，他们可以进行[[/check skill=prc dc=10]]检定来发现隐藏入口。否则，这个区域没有任何有趣或有价值的东西。

Guard Quarters.name: 护卫营房 (Guard Quarters)
Guard Quarters.text:
四个穿着盔甲的人形生物站在一个石炉旁，炉里燃烧着煤炭，在这个小兵营的中央发出微光。东墙上摆放着四张稻草垫。南边的墙倒塌了，但那个方向上被钉板封住的门仍然屹立着。一扇较好的门通向西边，而一道帘子挂在北边的拱门口。

四个@UUID[Actor.6qnT52lZtZblgGw8]{hobgoblins} stand guard in this room. They keep watch from the arrow slit, so any characters creeping around outside the east side of the castle are likely to be spotted and attacked. The hobgoblins are smart, tough, and loyal to @UUID[Actor.pbsoKingGrol0000]{King Grol}. At the start of combat, one hobgoblin runs to warn the king in @UUID[.2rGZxoGn3zlbQdfY]{area C14}，然后在2回合后再次加入战斗。

这个区域曾经是城堡原始居民的客厅，尽管它腐烂的家具被克拉格莫部族打碎并用作柴火。

Haunted Tower.name: 闹鬼塔 (Haunted Tower)
Haunted Tower.text:
这个房间的门从北侧被钉上了木板。需要几个回合才能移除木板，角色应该把这当作一个警告，表明危险就在门后。

这里的箭孔被百叶窗遮住，让房间变得黑暗。盒子里的文字假设角色们有&Reference[darkvision]{darkvision} or a light source.

The upper floors of this tower have collapsed to create a hollow silo thirty feet high. The upper reaches of the room are lost in shadows. It’s clear that this area hasn’t been used for some time. Dust, rubble, and broken glass cover the floor, and old worktables and bookshelves clutter the southern half of the room.

The Cragmaws believe this tower is haunted, but they’re wrong. The area is the lair of a @UUID[Actor.pbsoGrell0000000]{grell}, a hideous flying monster. It can worm its way through the wreckage of the upper floors to leave the castle when it wants to hunt, but between excursions, it lurks in the shadows of the hollow tower. When the grell notices intruders in the lower portion of its tower, it silently drops from the shadows and attacks.

This room was once a library and workshop, but nothing of its original contents remains intact.

Treasure. The grell’s nest in the upper part of the tower contains a @UUID[Item.pbsoGrellsBatter]{battered wooden}，这是从下面房间的残骸中发现的怪物的胸膛。从地板上看不到这个箱子，需要进行一次成功的[[/check skill=ath dc=15]]检定才能爬上支撑箱子的壁架。箱子没有锁，里面装有90枚银币，120枚金币，一瓶治疗药水，一张寂静法术卷轴，和一张复活法术卷轴。

King’s Quarters.name: 国王的卧室(King's Quarters)
King’s Quarters.text:
任何倾听门声的角色都会听到两个声音在激烈讨论——一个低沉、咆哮的声音要求支付某物，另一个则是柔和、光滑的回答。

这个房间被布置成一个居住空间，厚厚的毛皮作为地毯，旧的战利品挂在墙上，一个火盆燃烧着明亮的煤炭。一张大床位于北边，一张圆桌和几把椅子位于南边靠近门口。在桌子附近，地板上躺着一个被痛打的昏迷的矮人。站在矮人身边的是三个威胁性的人物：一个强大的半兽人，一只体型巨大的咆哮着的狼，以及一位白发、灰皮肤和灰袍的精灵女人。

@UUID[Actor.pbsoKingGrol0000]{King Grol} is a fierce old bugbear. He rules the Cragmaws through pure intimidation. His fur is streaked with gray, his shoulders are stooped, and he wears a set of jeweled silver teeth over his own rotting fangs. He’s agile and strong, demanding and vindictive, and no Cragmaw dares to cross him.

Grol is attended by his pet @UUID[Actor.EYiQZ3rFL25fEJY5]{dire wolf}, named Snarl, and a special guest: a @UUID[Actor.mWbrPhcKOz6oLXMV]{doppelganger} 伪装成一位黑暗精灵女性。使用 &Reference[昏迷] @UUID[Actor.pbsoGundrenRocks]{Gundren Rockseeker} lies nearby (see Unconscious Dwarf below). The doppelganger, Vyerith, is a messenger from the Spider, come to transport Gundren Rockseeker and the map to @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoWaveEchoCave]{Wave Echo Cave}. Grol wants to sell the map instead of surrendering it, and he and Vyerith are negotiating a price. Vyerith first wants to question Gundren to determine if anyone else knows the location of the mine. Then the doppelganger intends to betray the Spider by killing Gundren and destroying the map.

Easily Change the Doppelganger's Token

Select the Doppelganger on the Scene and run the @UUID[Macro.pbsoDoppelganger]{Doppelganger Disguise Switcher} 宏快速地在整个冒险中更改其外观。

如果恶棍们已经被警告即将遭受攻击，Vyerith 躲在东北边的门后，留着一条缝隙，希望从后方袭击入侵者。Grol 抓住了 Gundren 作为人质，准备在角色们不退缩时杀死这个矮人。

箭孔。 箭孔位于外面离地15英尺处，这里的生物没有在观察。他们不太可能注意到外面城堡周围的入侵者。

西北房间。 这个部分坍塌的房间曾经是一个舒适的浴室。里面仍然有一个大型瓷砖浴缸，但现在被城堡现在的居住者所不用。

昏迷的矮人。 在房间的西南角附近是 Gundren Rockseeker，一位矮人平民。他处于 &Reference[状态=昏迷]{unconscious} 但稳定在0生命值。

Old Owl Well.name: 老猫头鹰井 (Old Owl Well)
Old Owl Well.text:
数千年前由一个已经消失的帝国建造，老猫头鹰井现在是一座废弃的瞭望塔，以及一个毗邻的建筑物，由几堵摇摇欲坠的墙壁和塔楼的残株组成。在塔楼的庭院里，有一口仍然供应清洁、新鲜水源的老井。

老猫头鹰井位于@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoConyberryAnd.JournalEntryPage.tVaUOEExFQYcvGVe]{Conyberry}, in the hills south of the Triboar Trail. The site is relatively easy to find, and any NPC in Phandalin can provide directions to the ruins.

Recently, prospectors in the area have noted that someone has set up a campsite at Old Owl Well, and that undead guardians have been posted to keep intruders out. The ruins are currently occupied by a wizard who is exploring the site in the hope of gleaning arcane lore left by its builders.

If the characters approach Old Owl Well, read the following aloud:

As you crest a low ridge, you spy the crumbling ruins of an old watchtower and mounds of rubble enclosing a courtyard amid the rugged hills. A colorful tent sits in the middle of the courtyard, but no one is in sight.

Activate the Old Owl Well Scene

Old Owl Well is shown below and you can activate the @UUID[Scene.pbsoOldOwlWell00]{Old Owl Well} scene for this encounter. The characters can enter the site from any direction, either following old footpaths or scrambling up the slope and finding a gap in the surrounding walls of rubble.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3Atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.9TMzYiv7tNIs9VHy caption=false]

Twelve @UUID[Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{zombies}东南方18英里处，潜伏在旧瞭望塔的破败外壳内，从外面看不见。然而，任何成功通过DC [[/check skill=prc dc=15]]检定的角色都会闻到从塔楼方向飘来的致命气味。

当角色接近塔楼或帐篷时，僵尸们从塔楼蹒跚而出。如果发生战斗，@UUID[Actor.pbsoHamunKost000]{Hamun Kost}, a human mage, emerges from his tent and asks, What is the meaning of this?

Hamun is a Red Wizard—a spellcaster from a land called Thay, far to the east. His is a red-robed figure with a shaved scalp and a tattoo on his forehead. A character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=arc dc=10]] check recognizes Hamun’s tattoo as a necromantic symbol. A successful [[/check skill=his dc=15]] check verifies the wizard’s garb as belonging to Thay, a land of necromancers where wizards pattern their flesh with tattoos. The tattoo on the head represents a wizard’s school of magic specialty, Hamun’s being necromancy.

If any character attempts to talk to Hamun, even by calling out a greeting or answering his questions during combat, he temporarily calls off his zombies. The Red Wizard is not particularly aggressive, and he is willing to strike a deal that advances his interests at the same time it helps the characters.

Hamun stays tight-lipped about the reason for his presence in the region. He is, however, willing to provide the information the party needs in exchange for a favor. If the characters give Hamun some indication of what they might want (for example, the location of Cragmaw Castle or Wave Echo Cave), he shares one or both requests:

  • He wants the marauders at @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoWyvernTor000]{Wyvern Tor} to leave; they’ve scouted out his camp and seem inclined to cause trouble.
  • He wants to ask @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoConyberryAnd]{Agatha the banshee}是建造老猫头鹰井塔楼的巫师的名字。哈蒙不愿冒那个女妖的愤怒，但角色可以替他问这个问题。(阿加莎知道这个名字：德雷西娜)

宝藏

哈蒙的帐篷里有一套舒适的旅行套房：一张小床，一把椅子，一张写字台，一些用品，和一箱衣物。在@UUID[Item.pbsoHamunsChest0]{chest} is a leather bag containing 35 sp, 20 ep, 20 gp, and 5 pp; five small agates worth 10 gp each; a potion of healing and a spell scroll of darkness in a bone tube; and a Tiny jeweled box worth 25 gp.

The jeweled box contains the Red Wizard’s most interesting discovery so far: a ring of protection from ancient Netheril. The ring is made from a single piece of mystical green glass that’s stronger than steel. It has the added property of making the wearer less likely to drop or lose anything held in the hand the ring is on. The wearer receives a +4 bonus to saving throws or checks made to avoid dropping or being disarmed of any item held in that hand.

Daran Edermath’s Quest

Learning about the Red Wizard’s presence at Old Owl Well completes a quest given to the party by Daran Edermath in Phandalin. The characters should meet with @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.zftIv8cpWW4tEmS9]{Daran in Phandalin} to receive their reward of @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.hSY1b8yi8JWw2blf]{boots of striding and springing}。

Ruins of Thundertree.name: 雷树废墟 (Ruins of Thundertree)
Ruins of Thundertree.text:
在从Neverwinter Wood涌出的Neverwinter River附近，矗立着废弃的村庄Thundertree。曾经，这里是一个繁荣的社区，靠着伐木工和捕兽者的劳作致富。三十年前，北部Hotenow火山的喷发摧毁了Thundertree。自然灾害过后，一场奇怪的僵尸瘟疫席卷了该地区，杀死或驱赶了幸存者。

尽管大多数僵尸早已化为尘土，但弥漫在该地区的奇异魔法已经使当地植被变异成了新的危险形态。如今很少有人敢进入这座废墟村庄，那些冒险者也很少停留很久，除了两个值得注意的例外。德鲁伊@UUID[Actor.pbsoReidoth00000]{Reidoth} (see @UUID[.tLBgw4lBdSSAOD81]{area U4}) visits Thundertree from time to time, keeping a wary eye on its dangers. Some cultists also arrived recently (see @UUID[.KlG4d6FSrqrR1GpO]{area U13})前来与声称Thundertree为其领地的一只龙交涉(见@UUID[.B1n2IzyjdVNSphhG]{area U7}).

As the party approaches the ruined settlement, read the following:

Gradually, the trail becomes an old, overgrown lane winding between dilapidated buildings choked with vines and brush. In the middle of the settlement rises a steep hill, upon which stands a stone tower with a partially collapsed roof and an adjoining cottage. A dirt road hugs the base of the hill and wends its way between old stone houses, many of which are roofless ruins. Other buildings appear intact. The whole place is eerily silent.

A wooden sign is nailed to a post nearby. It reads: Danger! Plant monsters and zombies! Turn back now!

Reidoth placed the sign to discourage treasure seekers from stirring up the monsters in the area.

Activate the Ruins of Thundertree Scene

The following locations are keyed to the @UUID[Scene.pbsoRuinsOfThund]{Ruins of Thundertree} Scene.

Ruins Locations

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3Atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.nW2zCJ0jqpf0WWY5 caption=false]

General Features

Many of Thundertree’s buildings have crumbled in the years since the town was abandoned, and nature threatens to swallow what remains.

Buildings

A building in Thundertree is either ruined or intact, as shown on the Dungeon Master's version above.

Ruined buildings are empty shells with stone walls 5 to 8 feet high. Their roofs are gone, leaving piles of debris inside the walls. The debris is &Reference[difficult-terrain]{difficult terrain})。

完好的建筑物是破旧的、临时搭建的石头小屋，但仍然屹立不倒。它们的木门被卡住，需要成功进行[[/check ability=str dc=10]]检定才能强行打开。任何完好的建筑物的窗户都有2英尺宽，上面覆盖着包含6英寸宽箭孔的木百叶窗。箭孔一侧的生物对来自另一侧的攻击获得&Reference[three-quarters-cover]{three-quarters cover}。大多数完好建筑物内仍保留着灰尘覆盖的家具，如简单的木椅和桌子。

树木和灌木

树木平均高30到40英尺，提供掩护。灌木是蔓延的灌木丛，被视为&Reference[difficult-terrain]{difficult terrain}。

Westernmost Cottage.name: 西部小屋 (Westernmost Cottage)
Westernmost Cottage.text:
在一棵古老树的阴影下，有一座残破、长满杂草的石头小屋，没有屋顶。

两个@UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights}藏在小屋开放的门旁的杂草中。具有[[/check skill=prc passive=true dc=13]]或更高的角色可以从最多10英尺外发现这些枯枝怪。或者，距离门口10英尺内的角色可以寻找危险迹象，并进行[[/check skill=prc dc=13]]检定，在成功检定后发现这些枯枝怪。

这些枯枝怪保持完全静止。它们不会主动攻击(除非是自卫)，但如果战斗在那里爆发，它们会迅速前去帮助@UUID[.lV7dsdOfeoEAPnK3]{area U2}中的枯枝怪。

Blighted Cottages.name: 荒废的小屋 (Blighted Cottages)
Blighted Cottages.text:
这些毁坏的并排小屋看起来曾经是富有的店主或富裕农民的住所。现在只剩下倒塌的墙壁和一堆废墟。几棵年轻的树已经长在废墟中。

茂密的植被掩盖着致命的威胁：两个@UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights} lurking in the foliage. Characters who have a [[/check skill=prc passive=true dc=13]] or higher spot the blights from up to 10 feet away. Alternatively, a character within 10 feet of the doorway can look for signs of danger and make a [[/check skill=prc dc=13]] check, spotting the blights on a successful check.

These plant monsters are hungry and fight until destroyed. One round after these blights attack, the @UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights} in @UUID[.LpJoXMy8iDEWcDu1]{area U1}加入战斗。

宝藏。曾经住在这里的商人将一个箱子藏在了石板地板下。仔细搜索东侧小屋内部并成功进行一次[[/check skill=inv dc=10]]检查，会在房子里长着树的根部发现这个旧箱子。箱子里装有[[/award 1400cp 160sp 90gp]]。

The Brown Horse.name: 棕色马 (The Brown Horse)
The Brown Horse.text:
这里曾经是褐马酒馆，以其出色的艾尔而闻名。

这座大建筑门口的破旧招牌上显示着一个褪色的图像，是一匹拉着酒桶的工作马。建筑物已经开始下垂和破败，但比对面的废墟要完整一些。

在这座建筑物的阴影中，有六个@UUID[Actor.pbsoAshZombie000]{ash zombies}(见下文“灰烬僵尸”)潜伏着，倚靠在墙边或者酒吧下。当有活物进入时，这些僵尸会发出呻吟声，慢慢地站起来。它们会追击任何它们看到的角色，直到被摧毁。

建筑物的东半部曾是旧的客厅，而西部则是厨房和酿酒缸所在。巨大的木桶立在西边，空气中仍然飘散着微弱的酵母味。艾尔早已消失。

灰烬僵尸

这些僵尸是三十年前霍特诺火山爆发时的魔法毁灭所创造的。它们使用僵尸的属性。当它们死去时，会留下一团持续5分钟的灰烬云，但不会遮挡视线。

Druid’s Watch Post.name: 德鲁伊哨所 (Druid's Watch Post)
Druid’s Watch Post.text:
这座小屋比附近那些破旧的建筑物状况要好。 门上加固了厚重的铁箍，厚实的百叶窗保护着窗户。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.Qy4fMl80B1OtZqEA caption=false classes="right one"]

这就是@UUID[Actor.pbsoReidoth00000]{Reidoth} makes camp when she visits Thundertree. Reidoth is an elderly human woman with long, white hair who doesn’t use two words when one word will do. Though she doesn’t receive many visitors, she is reasonably hospitable.

Reidoth is adept at staying away from the @UUID[Actor.pbsoAshZombie000]{ash zombies} that overrun the village, as well as avoiding the area’s mutated plants. She knows that dangerous spiders lurk in the ruins at the base of the hill, and she suspects that miscreants have a hideout on the eastern side of town—she’s seen “people in black masks and cloaks” (the @UUID[Actor.qkLNA1lKMMJpxuWg]{cultists}潜伏的地方。然而，她最担心的是一只年轻的绿龙已经搬进了塔楼(@UUID[.B1n2IzyjdVNSphhG]{area U7}) since the last time she was here. She warns the characters of all these threats and suggests that they leave Thundertree before they’re killed.

Development. If the characters ask about @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCragmawCastl]{Cragmaw Castle}, Reidoth hesitates to provide directions. She is a member of the Emerald Enclave, a widespread group of wilderness survivalists who preserve the natural order while rooting out unnatural threats. The enclave works to restore and preserve the natural order by keeping the elemental forces of the world in check, preventing civilization and the wilderness from destroying one another, and helping others survive the perils of the wilds. As such, Reidoth doesn’t want to rile the goblins without good cause. If any of the characters appear to respect her position and beliefs, the druid tells them where to find the goblin stronghold. Otherwise, Reidoth offers a bargain: if the characters chase off @UUID[Actor.85ahD1jEo9B3POaQ]{Venomfang}是@UUID[.B1n2IzyjdVNSphhG]{area U7}中的龙，她会提供方向。

如果角色因任何原因攻击她，Reidoth会变成一只灰松鼠，从小屋的墙缝中匆匆逃走。她会藏在树林里，直到角色离开。她的岗哨里没有任何有价值的东西。

加入翡翠团

如果队伍帮助Reidoth赶走毒牙，德鲁伊会私下接触团队中的某些成员，并敦促他们加入翡翠团。她会与那些体现保护自然秩序理念的人交谈。如果角色同意，Reidoth会赋予个人“春之守护者”的称号。这个级别和派系不会影响本次冒险，但对于参与组织游戏活动的玩家来说是重要的。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.59UonVipRzDMsP5v caption=false classes="two"]

Blighted Farmhouse.name: 荒废的农舍 (Blighted Farmhouse)
Blighted Farmhouse.text:
这座废墟看起来曾经是一座农舍。现在已经被茂密的灌木丛吞噬了一半，树木长在它的地基上。在废墟之后，小路向南延伸一小段距离，最终通往一个长满杂草的田地。

在这废墟东边的灌木丛中，有十二只@UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights}和两只@UUID[Actor.pbsoNeedleBlight]{needle blights}。任何对废墟中的干扰(例如，角色在废墟中翻找)都会引起这些荆棘怪的愤怒。

每个回合持续3回合，两只荆棘怪朝南门口前进，另外两只朝北门口前进。第3回合时，针刺怪也跟随着，每只向不同的门口移动。这些怪物无畏且攻击直至被摧毁。

Ruined Store.name: 废弃商店 (D&D)
Ruined Store.text:
在村庄中间附近的一个十字路口，一条狭窄的小巷蜿蜒而上，通往北边陡峭的山坡。正南方是一座废墟，可能曾经是一家商店或车间。蜘蛛网从建筑物延伸到道路北侧的树木上。

这家曾经的杂货店尚未完全成为废墟；部分瓦片屋顶仍然完好无损。

两只@UUID[Actor.v99wOosUJjUgcUNF]{giant spiders} lurk in the building, hiding behind the walls. Thin, trailing lines from the webs in the lane outside allow the spiders to sense when likely prey moves through the webs, at which point they nimbly scuttle over the wall and attack. Allow characters who alert the spiders to make a [[/check skill=prc dc=17]] check to avoid being &Reference[surprise]{surprised}.

Webs. The webs are &Reference[difficult-terrain]{difficult terrain}，试图穿过它们的生物必须成功进行一次[[/check skill=ath dc=8]]检定，否则将被&Reference[束缚]{restrained} condition as the webs snare it. A restrained creature can take an action each round to make a [[/check ability=str dc=8]] check to break free, or it can try to cut its way free by using a light weapon that deals slashing damage. The webs have AC 10 and have 10 hit points and vulnerability to fire damage.

Going around the webs is difficult because of the thickets on the north side of the road. Going around the building to the south leads to the @UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights} in @UUID[.YDPtsSj1aArP6AIQ]{area U5}。

网感

在场景上放置一个隐藏的图示，只有地下城主才能看到，指示蜘蛛可以感知到附近行走的生物。

宝藏。 一个不幸冒险者的尸体被蜘蛛丝裹着，位于建筑物的西半部。尸体干瘪而干燥，但似乎是一名男性精灵。尸体穿着@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.dXtZxlh2VKLCo1nA]{+1 leather armor} and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.osLzOwQdPtrK3rQH]{shortsword} in the scabbard at its hip. A careful search also yields a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.ytlsBjYsZ7OBSEBs]{potion of healing}，携带一@UUID[Item.pbsoSlainAdventu]{belt pouch}，还有23金币和35银币。

Old Tower.name: 古老塔楼 (Old Tower)
Old Tower.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.zvnc2CmZ10dNc1C3]

山顶上矗立着一座圆塔，旁边附有一间小屋。尽管塔楼的一半屋顶已经坍塌，但两者都处于相对良好的状态。一扇门通往小屋，塔楼上可见几扇箭孔窗。你注意到这个地区异常安静，空气中弥漫着一种奇怪、刺鼻的气味。

塔楼地板上躺着两具@UUID[Actor.v99wOosUJjUgcUNF]{giant spiders} sprawl near the edge of the pathway, apparently dragged there. Their bloated bodies are puckered and blistered and appear to have been mauled by a large animal.

This tower was formerly the home of a human wizard, who was killed fighting the ash zombies that overran Thundertree thirty years ago.

A young green dragon named @UUID[Actor.85ahD1jEo9B3POaQ]{Venomfang} recently claimed the tower, having passed over Thundertree while searching Neverwinter Wood for a suitable lair. The giant spider corpses in the clearing are the former residents of the tower, killed by the dragon after Venomfang tore through the roof. Since then, the dragon has been laying low.

Tower. The dragon lives in the tower—a single large room with the remains of a 40-foot-high ceiling. A 5-foot-wide staircase circles the interior, rising to the now-opened rooftop that allows the dragon easy access to its new home. Heavy wooden beams and stair supports crisscross the tower interior.

Venomfang doesn’t want to give up such a promising lair, but if the characters reduce the dragon to one-quarter of its hit points, Venomfang climbs to the top of the tower and flies off.

Cottage. The cottage contains dusty furniture draped in webbing, but nothing of value. If the characters make a lot of noise in the cottage, the dragon hears them and prepares for a fight.

Treasure. A @UUID[Item.pbsoWizardsOldWo]{broken, old wooden chest}的尸体，他们手中握着死去法师的最后财宝：2100铜币，130金币，四只镶有月光石的银高脚杯，每只价值60金币，一卷迷雾步法术卷轴，以及一卷闪电箭法术卷轴。毒牙花费数小时每天贪婪地欣赏这些战利品。

龙几乎没有注意到宝藏中最有趣的物品。在硬币下面躺着一把生锈的古老矮人制造的战斧。战斧头部用矮人文刻着“劈”字，而锈迷惑了人。《劈》是一把+1战斧，当持有者攻击植物生物或木制物体时，可造成最大伤害。这把斧子的创造者在砍柴时用它保护自己免受森林中的危险。

.

Old Smithy.name: 老铁匠铺 (Old Smithy)
Old Smithy.text:
根据宽阔的烟囱和墙外堆积的腐烂木柴，这座下垂的建筑物在当时很可能是一家铁匠铺。

地板上躺着四个@UUID[Actor.pbsoAshZombie000]{ash zombies}(见下文“灰烬僵尸”)。当角色们进入时，这些怪物会站起来，向前蹒跚前进攻击。一旦僵尸们看到角色，它们会无情地追击角色。

这座建筑物内散落着各种旧工具——钳子、风箱、锤子和一对铁砧。

宝藏。一只破旧的橱柜被部分坍塌的屋顶埋在下面。里面装着一个大@UUID[Item.pbsoLeatherSatch]{leather satchel}，里面装满了奇怪的棕金色菱形板片。每个板片大约半个人手那么大，重量轻，坚固如铁。这些板片是黄铜龙鳞，可以卖给铁匠或其他有兴趣的买家，总共价值75金币。

灰烬僵尸

这些僵尸是三十年前霍特诺火山爆发时的魔法毁灭所创造的。它们使用僵尸的属性。当它们死去时，会留下一团持续5分钟的灰烬云，但不会遮挡视线。

Herbalist’s Shop.name: 草药店 (Herbalist's Shop)
Herbalist’s Shop.text:
这家破旧的商店里摆满了下垂的储物架和破损的家具。玻璃碎片和陶器碎片在杂草和瓦砾中闪闪发光，旁边还有腐烂的书籍和木桶。

这曾经是属于米尔娜·登德拉尔家族的草药和炼金术店，现在米尔娜已经是芬德林(见@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoRedbrandsHid.JournalEntryPage.byAFcp7julyNSY4c]{Holding Cells} in the Redbrand Hideout Locations section in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter20000]{chapter 2}).

All the reagents and concoctions here have long since spoiled, and the books are unreadable masses of rot. However, a small wooden case is hidden in a compartment beneath the storage shelves. A character searching through the wreckage can find the case with a successful [[/check skill=prc dc=10]] check. The check succeeds automatically if Mirna sent the party to find the heirloom.

Treasure. The case is worthless but contains a @UUID[Item.pbsoFineEmeraldP]{gold necklace})的居民，拥有一枚价值200金币的精美祖母绿吊坠。

Town Square.name: 镇广场 (Town Square)
Town Square.text:
在镇的东侧，小巷口敞开成一个小广场。广场四周有几座废墟建筑，但北边有一座较大、完整的建筑看起来像一个兵营。一条巷道通往南边，另一条绕过镇中的小山向西南方向延伸，第三条路蜿蜒向北。在广场中央，稍微倾斜着一尊破旧的木质雕像，握着长矛和盾牌的战士。

倾斜的雕像高10英尺，包括底座。它描绘了一位名叫帕利恩(Palien)的尼瓦温(Neverwinter)老英雄，据说在桑德树(Thundertree)建立之初，曾在尼瓦温森林(Neverwinter Wood)中击败了几只怪物。研究这座雕像的角色通过一次成功的[[/check skill=his dc=15]]检定，认出了这个描绘。

Old Garrison.name: 老要塞 (Old Garrison)
Old Garrison.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.4d407rS057Gi6SbF]

兵营似乎比镇上大多数建筑更经受住了岁月的洗礼。它的屋顶上有简单的城垛，箭孔窗表明它在紧急情况下曾充当过一个小堡垒。

五个@UUID[Actor.pbsoAshZombie000](灰烬僵尸)(请参见下文“灰烬僵尸”)潜伏在这座建筑物中。作为守备队的前成员，他们仍然穿着生锈的锁子甲和士兵外套的残余物。这些碎片护甲并不提高它们的护甲等级。如果有任何活物打扰了它们的休息，这些僵尸会苏醒并发动攻击。

建筑物内部仍然保留着家具，主房间有一把梯子通向屋顶的天窗。主房间里有两张双层床，而南边的房间有三张双层床，总共提供了十个士兵的住所。在主区域的西北部是一个厨房和储藏室，现在堆满了腐烂的袋子和曾装盐肉的桶。害虫早已吞食了所有食物。

灰烬僵尸

这些僵尸是三十年前霍特诺火山爆发时的魔法毁灭所创造的。它们使用僵尸的属性。当它们死亡时，会留下一团持续5分钟的灰烬云，但不会遮挡视线。

Weaver’s Cottage.name: 织工小屋 (Weaver's Cottage)
Weaver’s Cottage.text:
这座废墟内到处都是残骸。一个角落里矗立着一个破损的织布机。

四个@UUID[Actor.pbsoTwigBlight00]{twig blights} lurk in the thicket south of this ruin, while two @UUID[Actor.pbsoNeedleBlight]{needle blights} hide in the trees on the east side of the lane. A character within 10 feet of one or more blights can make a [[/check skill=prc dc=13]] check, detecting the creatures’ presence on a successful check. Otherwise, the blights attack if a character comes within 5 feet of them.

Development. Any loud noises here alert the cultists in @UUID[.KlG4d6FSrqrR1GpO]{area U13}小心翼翼地调查。

Dragon Cultists’ Cottage.name: 龙崇拜者小屋 (Dragon Cultists' Cottage)
Dragon Cultists’ Cottage.text:
一个名为龙之教派(Cult of the Dragon)的广泛团体试图与剑海岸(Sword Coast)的强大龙类结盟。为此，四名@UUID[Actor.qkLNA1lKMMJpxuWg]{cultists} recently tracked the green dragon known as @UUID[Actor.85ahD1jEo9B3POaQ]{Venomfang} to Thundertree (see @UUID[.B1n2IzyjdVNSphhG]{area U7}正在等待合适的时机接近龙类；他们一直在远处监视龙类，试图评估毒牙(Venomfang)的态度和需求。

当角色们接近这个区域时，朗读以下内容：

这座小而破旧的农舍的院子里散落着碎片。

这间小屋的门从里面闩上，需要进行成功的[[/check ability=str dc=20]]检定才能强行打开。百叶窗也从里面闩上，需要进行成功的[[/check ability=str dc=15]]检定才能强行打开。

有六名价值50金币的人类@UUID[Actor.qkLNA1lKMMJpxuWg]{cultists} hide in the house. Four stand guard at a time (two in each room) on eight-hour shifts, while the others rest in the larger chamber. The cultists wear black cloaks cut to resemble dragon wings and black leather masks with stylized dragon horns. In addition to Common, the cultists speak Draconic.

The interior of the house is dusty and strung with cobwebs. The only furnishings are a small stove, a table, two chairs, and a bunk (which the cultists share).

Development. The cultists aren’t interested in fighting anyone and prefer to be left alone. The leader is an ambitious young man named Favric, who hopes to rise through the ranks quickly by earning the allegiance of the green dragon in @UUID[.B1n2IzyjdVNSphhG]{area U7}. His fellow cultists don’t share Favric’s ambition and flee if he’s captured or killed.

If the characters talk to the cultists, Favric explains that they’ve come to treat with the green dragon (whose name he doesn’t know). If the characters express a similar desire, Favric suggests an alliance. He actually plans to offer the characters to the dragon as part of his tribute, and if a fight ensues, the cultists side with the dragon against the party in the hope of earning its trust.

Treasure. In addition to what he carries, Favric has a small coffer containing tribute for the green dragon: six @UUID[Item.pbsoFavricsAmeth]{lustrous amethysts}。他还携带一瓶塞子封闭的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.eTNc8XPtvZNe3yQs]{potion of flying}挂在脖子上。

Wyvern Tor.name: 双足飞龙之峰(Wyvern Tor)
Wyvern Tor.text:
这座悬崖是剑山东北崎岖山丘上的一个显著地标，从二十英里外就能轻易看到。沿着特里博尔小径前行的人们在科尼贝里附近会看到南边的毒蝎峰。这座峰曾经是一群大型危险毒蝎的家园，但几年前一群勇敢的冒险者解决了这些怪物。尽管毒蝎们再也没有回来，但其他生物偶尔会在这里筑巢，包括几个月前在这里扎营的一群兽人袭击者。由一名名叫@UUID[Actor.pbsoBrughorAxebi]{Brughor Axe-Biter}, these raiders noticed the Triboar Trail’s increase in traffic and have been ambushing travelers and stealing their wares. Recently, strange goblins with elongated skulls have occasionally joined the raiders in their attacks, although the goblins never stick around long enough for the raiders to learn much about them.

Raider Camp

Wyvern Tor is a sizable hill, with miles of rugged terrain on its flanks and slopes. Searching for the hidden raider camp takes time. The character leading the party can attempt one [[/check skill=prc dc=15]] or [[/check skill=sur dc=10]] check per hour to find the camp, made by the character leading the way.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh3Atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.G44pYysob4K1OCUm caption=false]

Activate the Wyvern Tor Scene

When the characters find the camp, you can activate the @UUID[Scene.pbsoWyvernTor000]{Wyvern Tor} Scene and read the following narrative text below.

The faint smell of smoke hangs in the air as you ascend a rugged ridge on the lower slopes of the hill. Fifty yards away, a cave mouth opens up at the bottom of a ravine. Hunkered down by a boulder twenty yards outside the cave, evidently keeping watch, is a single bugbear.

If the characters quietly take out the lone @UUID[Actor.QtJairF0h18BRhEM]{bugbear}的兽人领导，他们有机会进行&Reference[surprise]{surprise} the raiders in the cave. If the sentry spots the characters sneaking up, or if an attack fails to take the sentry out, the sentry shouts a warning and retreats back to the cave, joining the rest of the marauders there.

The marauders in the cave include @UUID[Actor.pbsoBrughorAxebi]{Brughor Axe-Biter}, an orc with 18 hit points; four @UUID[Actor.QtJairF0h18BRhEM]{bugbears}攻击；还有一个@UUID[Actor.eIGowKTkEBC9gUzx]{ogre} named Gog. Gog fights until slain, while the rest flee if Brughor is killed.

If the characters examine the cave walls, they find a strange, scrawled drawing on the northwest wall. The drawing crudely depicts a lanky goblin with a crystal jutting from its skull. The characters can tell this isn’t a Cragmaw goblin, but they can’t learn anything more just yet. Psionic goblins who were off task in their search for obelisk fragments made this drawing. It attempts to depict their leader, @UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid}, who is described more in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.txt9zybqx8bd4yOw#the-goblins-story]{chapter 5}。

宝藏。布鲁戈尔的团伙在前往毒蝎峰的路上抢劫了几个更北边的农舍。一个未锁定的@UUID[Item.pbsoBrughorsChes]{treasure chest} in the cave holds 180 sp, 15 ep, and three vials of perfume worth 5 gp each.

Harbin Wester’s Quest

Defeating the marauders at Wyvern Tor completes a @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.WFBSOYnZzaRLEOru#dangerous-trail]{quest} given to the party by Townmaster Harbin Wester in Phandalin, and delivers on a promise to Hamun Kost at @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoOldOwlWell00]{Old Owl Well}。角色们可以向哈宾·韦斯特报告，领取他们的100gp奖励。

Wave Echo Cave.name: 回音洞穴(Wave Echo Cave)
Wave Echo Cave.text:
曾经是一个繁荣的矿山，充满活力的波浪回音洞现在是一个被怪物占领的危险之地。

无论角色是跟随冈德伦的地图还是从其他来源得到前往波浪回音洞的指引，他们最初的进入通道会引导他们来到一个狭窄的隧道，其入口隐藏在剑山山麓(@UUID[.QZ6zoeAqr27Uhf3Y]{area W1}).

Activate the Wave Echo Cave Scene

The following locations are keyed to the @UUID[Scene.pbsoWaveEchoCave]{Wave Echo Cave} Scene.

Cave Locations

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh4Atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.JKOHd3I5qzKFkNSK caption=false]

Wandering Monsters

@Embed[RollTable.pbsoWanderingMon classes="caption-top"]

Wave Echo Cave Features

The mine is cold, damp, and drafty. A noticeable breeze blows from @UUID[.QZ6zoeAqr27Uhf3Y]{area W1}朝向@UUID[.8Bj7MPxoFccBLXIL]{area W16}. Features of Wave Echo Cave are described below.

Ceilings

Tunnels are 10 feet high unless noted otherwise. Rooms have 20-foot-high ceilings, while natural caverns have 30-foot-high ceilings dotted with stalactites.

Doors

Unless noted otherwise, all doors are 6 feet tall, 4 feet wide, and made of 6-inch-thick cut slabs of stone fitted with iron handles and hinges.

Walls

The walls are hewn stone and are 3 feet thick. In a few areas (area @UUID[.3O9PWNjTxkdHk8bd]{W14}, area @UUID[.TENYExq2D5saTuet]{W15}，区域@UUID[.tX49OpF3CSRmAAtB]{W19}, and area @UUID[.MHO7M3O6bU8vCna1]{W20}), they are dressed with well-fitted stone blocks.

Floors

All floors are smooth, natural stone.

Light

None. The boxed text assumes the characters have light sources or &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision}。

石笋

在许多自然洞穴中发现的这些岩石尖塔可以提供掩护。

澎湃的波浪

有规律的巨浪轰鸣声在整个矿山中回荡，声音足够响亮，足以使脚下的石头震动。这些波浪大约每两分钟一次，向东北方向越来越响。

波浪回音洞离海洋很远，但是矿山深处的一个水洞连接着一个地下温泉。温泉不断地沸腾，产生一股冲击力，猛烈地撞击一个狭窄的漏斗，听起来像是海浪拍打的声音。偶尔向玩家描述这种声音；它应该引起他们的好奇心，吸引他们朝着声音的源头前进，并因此深入矿山。

Cave Entrance.name: 洞穴入口 (Cave Entrance)
Cave Entrance.text:
入口隧道通往一个由岩柱支撑的大型天然洞穴。在洞穴的西部，岩柱后面有三张床垫和一堆普通的物资：面粉袋、盐袋、腌肉木桶、灯笼、灯油瓶、镐、铲等装备。在这些物资中，你看到了一名矮人的尸体，至少已经死去一周。

洞穴的东北部部分坍塌，形成了一个十英尺宽、二十英尺深的坑。在洞穴中的三根石笋中的一根上系着一根结实的麻绳，悬垂到坑中。

这里是洛克西克家族的营地。死去的矮人是落石者的兄弟，@UUID[Actor.pbsoNundroRockse]{Nundro}, is the Spider’s prisoner in @UUID[.MHO7M3O6bU8vCna1]{area W20}.

The dwarves’ supplies are potentially useful but not particularly valuable.

Open Pit. A tunnel at the bottom of the pit leads northwest toward @UUID[.vkS4WjbQwjTFKBoh]{area W2}和朝东走向@UUID[.FK8GA83azlTNG5yV]{area W3}。

哥布林尸体。 坑底躺着一名奇怪的哥布林尸体，头骨延长，皮肤上有绿色条纹。任何对这具身穿肮脏破布的尸体的检查都会发现它不是克拉格莫哥布林。角色们现在无法进一步了解情况，但这是一名念力哥布林的尸体。这名哥布林是一个小型侦察组的一员，偶然发现了这个矿洞。在发现洞穴中没有方尖碑碎片后，其他哥布林离开了这个区域，留下了他们同伴的尸体。

宝藏。 落石者身上戴着一件@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.lvaMqEhfidfHDGf5]{cloak of protection}，这是蜘蛛在匆忙探索浪回洞穴其他地方时忽略的。

Mine Tunnels.name: 矿洞 (D&D)
Mine Tunnels.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh4ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.3kkyuRwELwXZX4u1]

这个区域由许多交错的通道组成。这里的天花板只有六英尺高，几条通道的尽头是部分挖掘出来的岩石。

这个迷宫般的通道是波浪回音洞穴原始矿井的一部分。

潜伏在一个死胡同里的是一个@UUID[Actor.xBhG7Dos3tkg9jWz]{ochre jelly}(你可以决定果冻的确切位置)。当冒险小组进入矿井的这一部分时，果冻开始悄悄跟踪着他们，本能地等待着攻击一个孤立的目标的机会。

放置隐藏令牌

您可以通过按住ALT键将令牌放置在隐藏状态下，然后再放置令牌到场景中。这样您就可以将黄褐色果冻放置在您想要的任何地方，而不会立即被玩家看到。

低天花板。由于这个区域的低天花板，中型及更大的生物在使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.BYFd9hiJGo9L5aOM.JournalEntryPage.AOOs5OrXYgGzwI9d]{light}武器进行近战攻击时有劣势。

Old Entrance.name: 古老入口 (Old Entrance)
Old Entrance.text:
四条隧道在这个高三十英尺的洞穴交汇。墙壁上雕刻着简单的浮雕，展示了矮人和侏儒矿工的工作场景。洞穴地板上散落着近两打锈迹斑斑的盔甲碎片骸骨。有些是矮人骸骨，而另一些似乎是更大个体的遗骸。洞穴周围的壁龛或壁架上有半打大而未点亮的黄铜灯笼。

向南延伸的隧道是波浪回音洞的原始入口，但在几个世纪前矿山遭受毁灭时被掩埋了。当土匪袭击矿山时，这里曾发生过激烈的战斗。死者仍躺在他们倒下的地方。

六只吸血怪@UUID[Actor.gKRtiMNAjZiCVfwz]{stirges}紧贴在天花板上。怪物在矿山中很少找到活的猎物，它们非常饥饿。由于角色们可能正在看地板上的骸骨，吸血怪很可能会突袭他们。任何没有看向天花板的角色必须成功进行一次[[/check skill=prc dc=14]]检定，以避免被&Reference[surprise]{surprised}。没有被吓到的角色会听到吸血怪下降袭击的声音。

灯笼和矿工工作的雕刻是为了欢迎新来者。

Old Guardroom.name: 老兵营 (Old Guardroom)
Old Guardroom.text:
破碎的石凳和部分坍塌的天花板上堆满了碎石。在破烂的石铺和倒塌的武器架中，有八具尸体，包括两只腐烂的食人魔尸体。

在任何生物进入这个房间的下一回合，死去的生物会爬起来攻击。两只食人魔(Actor.RenLfmDT2XlbCF4x)和六只矮人(Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW)战斗直到被摧毁。

Assayers' Office.name: 鉴定员办公室 (Assayers' Office)
Assayers' Office.text:
这个房间曾经是办公室或储藏室。一块大石台将房间分成两半，上面放着三个铁制的灰尘覆盖的天平。北墙上刻有隔间，塞满了破碎的纸片。地板上散落着几具腐烂的尸体。

如果触摸，这些几个世纪前的纸张会立即破碎，但一名读懂矮人文的角色可以在一些纸片上看到淡淡的标记，记录着称重和分发情况。

宝藏。 在石台后面坐着一个上锁的铁制保险箱，需要盗贼工具和成功的[[/check tool=thief ability=dex dc=20]]检定来打开。这个支付箱里装有[[/award 600cp 180sp 90ep 60gp]]。

South Quarters.name: 南区
South Quarters.text:
这是矿工宿舍，熟练的探矿者在回音洞穴工作时在轮班休息。任何角色在半开着的门边倾听，通过成功的技能检定(感知DC=10)可以听到微弱的嘎吱和碎裂声。

这个房间的墙壁上排列着整齐的旧石铺设的铺位，中间放着一个装满冷煤的锈蚀铁炉灶。几个矮人和更大的土匪的骨骸散落在周围，仍穿着碎片护甲。三个灰色的驼背身影蹲在残骸中间，抓着碎片啃噬骨头。

这里有三个来自@UUID[Actor.OBujQLLPSmlJiZnL]{ghouls}背包的[[角色名]]，他们正在这里啃噬骨头，虚幻地希望还有一点骨髓残留。这些食尸鬼渴望新鲜的食物，会立即发动攻击。

Ruined Storeroom.name: 废弃的储藏室 (D&D)
Ruined Storeroom.text:
这个房间的东墙已经倒塌成一堆瓦砾。向北，一扇门半开着，通往一个相当大的储藏室。灰尘覆盖的木桶和酒桶整齐地靠在墙边，它们都因年代久远而裂开。

虽然不是非常舒适，但这个储藏室是一处安全的休息地点。没有怪物会经过这里。此外，储藏室的门还很结实，可以很容易地从内部堵塞或闩上。

木桶和酒桶的内容物早已蒸发殆尽。

Fungi Cavern.name: 真菌洞穴 (Fungi Cavern)
Fungi Cavern.text:
在这个洞穴中，地面上覆盖着密集的奇怪真菌地毯。生长物包括直径一英尺的泡菇、生长在石笋上的奇怪的架子菌，以及高达五英尺的大茎和帽子。一些泡菇散发着诡异的绿色磷光。

这里潜伏着两个@UUID[Actor.7EmUVycEASn7SFL0]{violet fungi}，一个位于中央真菌区的中间，另一个位于北部区域。由于周围有许多其他真菌，它们很难被注意到。每个角色可以尝试进行一次[[/check skill=nat dc=15]]检定，以在接近紫色真菌之前发现它们。角色可以通过靠近南墙和东墙来安全地避开这些真菌。

发出绿光的真菌是无害的，但它们让生物可以在没有&Reference[黑暗视觉]{darkvision}或光源的情况下看到整个洞穴。

这个洞穴阻碍了蜘蛛的探索。涅兹纳怀疑矿山的魔法车间就在附近，但他不愿冒险面对这里的危险怪物。

Great Cavern.name: 巨大洞穴 (Great Cavern)
Great Cavern.text:
陡峭的悬崖将这个大洞穴分为三个部分：两端是高高的悬崖，中间是一个较低的区域。雕刻的石阶通向悬崖。中间区域有两张大桌子，以及一对老式火盆。东侧悬崖上有一张小桌子。数十具战士的骸骨遗骸证明了很久以前发生的激烈战斗。

这些骸骨是静止不动的。然而，五只潜伏在西侧悬崖阴影中的@UUID[Actor.OBujQLLPSmlJiZnL]{ghouls}。任何具有[[/check skill=prc dc=12 passive=true]]或更高的角色都会注意到这些食尸鬼。食尸鬼会注意到洞穴其他地方的任何光线或噪音，并迅速跳下来攻击。它们饥饿且战斗到被摧毁。

悬崖高10英尺，需要成功的[[/check skill=ath dc=12]]检定才能攀爬。从悬崖顶部摔下或被击倒的生物会受到[[/damage 1d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]]伤害，并陷入&Reference[prone]{prone}状态。

Dark Pool.name: 黑暗池 (Dark Pool)
Dark Pool.text:
一个静静的水潭占据了这个洞穴的大部分空间。水很深，看不清里面可能隐藏着什么。水潭的岸边由来自奇怪的苍白贻贝的薄薄一层碎壳构成。空气中弥漫着一股鱼腥味。

从这个区域向南通往一条通道，一组台阶向东方上升。一条缓慢的小溪从洞穴的东北方流出。

小鱼在水边游动，但水潭中还栖息着一种更大的生物：一个@UUID[Actor.NpvwE1feOHyEqAbP]{giant constrictor snake}. If the characters pass through this area, the snake slithers from the water and attacks the character at the back of the party.

Pool. The pool is 20 feet deep in the middle. The stream to the northeast is 3 feet deep, and the ceiling of the passage is 2 to 3 feet above the water. Characters can easily wade through the stream to @UUID[.ySART705xdEPMl8X]{area W18}.

Hidden Path Tile

The path from area W10 to W18 is included as a hidden tile only visible to the Dungeon Master to make it clear where you will need to move the Tokens if the players choose to navigate this way.

A character who explores the pool finds an old skeleton lying on the bottom, 10 feet from the shore and under 10 feet of water. These are the remains of a human wizard from old Phandalin who died defending the mines against bandit attackers. Several arrows remain lodged in the skeleton’s ribcage.

Treasure. The @UUID[Item.pbsoWecWizardsRe]{skeleton of the wizard}戴着三枚镶嵌宝石的金戒指(每枚价值150 gp)，手指间紧握着一根魔法飞弹魔杖。

North Quarters.name: 北区 (North Quarters)
North Quarters.text:
东侧的门被从房间内部用障碍物封锁，需要进行一次[[/check skill=ath dc=20]]检定来强行打开。任何一个听着门并成功进行一次[[/check skill=prc dc=10]]检定的角色都能听到粗哑的声音，说着哥布林语并谈论他们有多饿。

这些房间的墙壁上排列着古老的石头铺位，中间有一个发光的铁火盆提供照明和取暖。六只巨怪，其中一只比其他的都要大，正懒洋洋地躺在房间里，抱怨着他们的饥饿。

如果队伍从西侧进入，添加：

房间的另一侧有另一扇门，这扇门被用一张木桌的残骸做成的障碍物挡住。

六个@UUID[Actor.QtJairF0h18BRhEM]{bugbears} reside in this chamber. They are loyal minions of Nezznar. This room marks the front line in the Spider’s assault on Wave Echo Cave, and the bugbears are here to prevent ghouls, zombies, or other Undead from troubling their leader in his lair (@UUID[.tX49OpF3CSRmAAtB]{area W19}).

Like @UUID[.MTHgYj51AVbqnvYj]{area W6}，这里曾经是矿工的营房。巨怪们把他们在这里找到的尸体搬走了，并建起了障碍物。

宝藏。 最大的巨怪身上携带着一个@UUID[Item.pbsoLargeBugbear]{pouch}，里面有15个铜币，13个银币，两颗价值各自10金币的玛瑙，以及一瓶治疗药水。

Smelter Cavern.name: 熔炉洞穴 (Smelter Cavern)
Smelter Cavern.text:
一个由水车驱动的高炉和机械风箱占据了这个宽敞的大厅。高炉冷冷黑暗，但旁边堆放着一堆煤炭，还有满载未经精炼的矿石的推车。水车坐落在房间地板上切出的十英尺宽的水道中，但水道已经干涸。通道通向西、南和东。空水道通向北和东。

房间四处散落着十多具干瘪的尸体，这些人仍穿着残留的盔甲。他们上方漂浮着一个被绿色火焰包围的头骨。

八名倒下的矮人战士是@UUID[Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{zombies}. They rise and shuffle toward any living creatures that enter the room, but they don’t pursue creatures outside this area for more than 1 round. In addition, a far more intelligent Undead creature guards this area: a @UUID[Actor.pbsoFlameskull00]{flameskull}. This creature was a servant of the dwarves’ human wizard allies, and it continues to act on ancient instructions to prevent any intruders from passing through this area.

Toggle Flameskull Illumination Levels

Select the Flameskull in the Scene and run the @UUID[Macro.pbsoToggleFlames]{Toggle Flameskull Illumination} 在其两种光状态之间切换的宏。

这个令人印象深刻的大厅是波回洞穴采矿作业的中心。在这里，矮人们熔炼矿石，精炼成纯银、金和铂金锭。干涸的水道是矮人们从@UUID[.ySART705xdEPMl8X]{area W18} to power the waterwheel here. The waterwheel operated the bellows that fed the furnace in the southeast corner of the room.

The channel’s bottom is 5 feet below floor level, and no ability check is required to scramble in or out of it. Characters in the channel can follow it from this room to the north or to the east, though the ceiling is only 5 feet high after the channel exits this room.

Like the fungi cavern at @UUID[.jb8k7zK2zc91RDLL]{area W8}, this chamber poses a serious obstacle that prevents the Spider from reaching his objective: the Forge of Spells (@UUID[.TENYExq2D5saTuet]{area W15}转移溪流的地方。尼兹纳仍在制定一个计划，以通过这个区域的不死守卫。

.

Starry Cavern.name: 星辰洞穴 (Starry Cavern)
Starry Cavern.text:
在这个巨大的洞穴天花板上闪烁着的矿物捕捉到任何光线，并将其反射回来，营造出星空的印象。地板上散落着数十具骷髅——许多被倒塌的碎石压在下面。

这个洞穴足够大，可以容纳两个独立的建筑物。这两个石头房间都是为人类使用而设计的，而不是矮人大小的门和家具。两个建筑物都有破损和被烧黑的砌体墙，它们的双门裂开且烧焦。

洞穴被一道悬崖分隔开，一段楼梯被切割进去。通道从这个区域通向北、南和西。

这个区域的结构损坏和骷髅遗骸是几个世纪前在这里进行的毁灭性法术战斗的证据，当时土匪和他们的雇佣巫师冲击了矿山。

受损的房间在区域@UUID[.3O9PWNjTxkdHk8bd]{W14} and area @UUID[.TENYExq2D5saTuet]{W15}. The skeletons are inanimate and pose no danger. The minerals in the ceiling are pretty, but they are neither magic nor valuable.

Any character proficient in the &Reference[Arcana] skill can sense a subtle aura of magic in this cavern. (A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{detect magic}中描述。法术揭示了相同的事实。）当一个人接近最北边的房间时，光环变得更强烈(@UUID[.TENYExq2D5saTuet]{area W15})。

Wizards' Quarters.name: 巫师区 (Wizards' Quarters)
Wizards' Quarters.text:
通往这个区域的双门开裂，铁铰链部分融化。扭开或砸开门需要成功进行一次[[/check skill=ath dc=15]]检定。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh4ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.1cYGvmXIx8Uwh2g caption=false]

灰尘、灰烬、被火烧黑的墙壁，以及在下垂的天花板下堆积的碎片表明这个房间受到了破坏性爆炸的影响。家具——桌子、椅子、书架、床——都被烧焦或破裂。一个被烧焦的铁箱子立在其中一张床脚附近。南墙上相邻的壁橱里堆满了瓦砾。

这个房间里寄宿着最后一位死在这里的巫师的不安灵魂，@UUID[Actor.pbsoMormeskTheWr]{Mormesk the wraith}. Mormesk was a powerful mage until he met his end in the spell battle at the climax of the bandit attack. Centuries of anger have poisoned his soul, transforming him into a hate-filled apparition.

Mormesk leads the Undead that haunt Wave Echo Cave. The wraith spends his time here because the treasure he had amassed in life lies in the scorched chest. No longer corporeal, he cannot touch or possess the wealth he enjoyed in life.

This room served as a guesthouse for visiting wizards working in the Forge of Spells (@UUID[.TENYExq2D5saTuet]{area W15}), most of whom were humans from nearby cities. The furnishings are all sized for humans.

Treasure. The @UUID[Item.pbsoMormesksScor]{scorched chest}已解锁，里面有1,100铜币，160银币，100铜币，价值10gp的五颗孔雀石，以及一根镶有铂金花纹的木烟斗，价值150gp。

Forge of Spells.name: 魔法锻造炉 (Forge of Spells)
Forge of Spells.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh4ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.G9XMg5hrCO73BjEV]

与法兰德瓦盟约中的矮人和侏儒结盟的巫师们利用这些洞穴中潜藏的魔法，赋予了精美的矮人武器和侏儒小工具魔力。最北边的门被烧焦并裂开，铁铰链部分融化；强行打开需要成功进行一次[[/check skill=ath dc=15]]检定。双门同样受损，但半开半合。

这个大工作室被古老的魔法战役严重破坏，矿井也因此荒废。房间的两个角落被工作台占据，被烧焦，石膏已经从砖墙上烧掉。房间中央，一个石座上放着一个小火盆，里面燃烧着一团怪异的绿色火焰，跳动着。这个火盆和它的石座似乎未受到摧毁这个区域的力量的影响。

在绿焰火盆后漂浮着一个球形生物，直径大约四英尺。四根眼柄从它的中央质量上突出，两边各两根。身体中央有一个大眼睛盯着你。它用一种嘶哑的声音向你打招呼，你只能在脑海中听到。

守护这个房间的球形怪物是一个@UUID[Actor.pbsoSpectator000]{spectator} that speaks Common. One of the human wizards who worked in the Forge of Spells summoned the creature to guard the magic items created and stored here. The spectator was slated to serve for 101 years. When the mine was sacked, the bandits disturbed the delicate magic in the area, eroding the spectator’s grip on reality. It believes the mine is still in use, ignoring all evidence to the contrary.

The wraith (@UUID[.3O9PWNjTxkdHk8bd]{area W14}) wants to eliminate the spectator, but so far, the creature has easily handled the assaults of Mormesk’s zombies and ghouls while seeing nothing strange about Undead roaming the mine. With a successful [[/check skill=dec dc=15]] check, a character can convince the spectator that one or more party members are wizards or dwarves who work for the owners of Wave Echo Cave, sent to terminate the spectator’s employment (thereby releasing it from its obligations). If the deception succeeds, the spectator disappears and returns to its home dimension.

If the party attempts to remove anything from this area, the spectator attacks.

Brazier of Green Flame. A successful [[/check skill=arc dc=15]] check identifies the brazier as the source of the magic that suffuses the surrounding caverns. This magic has waned over the years and can no longer be harnessed to permanently enchant magic items. However, any nonmagical weapon or suit of armor bathed in the green flame for at least 1 minute becomes a +1 weapon or a suit of +1 armor respectively, for [[/gmroll 1d12]] hours.

Removing the brazier from the Forge of Spells douses the green flame and forever deprives the brazier of its magical power.

Enchant Items with the Brazier of Green Flame

You can enchant/disenchant items using the @UUID[Macro.pbsoBrazierOfGre]{Brazier of Green Flame}宏。将一个物品拖放到放置区域，然后按下按钮进行附魔或解除附魔。

北部房间。 这个小房间是一个独立的工作区，用于为待附魔的物品打磨、涂漆、上光或进行其他加工。和主工作室一样，它也受到了严重破坏。

宝藏。 在房间东南角的工作台上，有守护者被委托保护的物品：一把+1权杖和一件+1胸甲。这些魔法物品还有一些额外的属性，如下所述：

权杖。 这件武器，被称为@UUID[Item.pbsoLightbringer]{Lightbringer}，是为黎明之神拉瑟德的牧师制作的。权杖的头部呈太阳爆炸形状，由实心黄铜制成。当持有者命令时，权杖会发出像火炬一样明亮的光芒。在发光时，权杖对不死生物造成额外的1d6辐射伤害(物品中实现)。

胸甲。 这件胸甲，被称为@UUID[Item.J45ebuzqkXb5Oqmv]{Dragonguard}，在设计中有金龙图案。为了尼华冬老英雄泰尔贡而制作，它使穿戴者对龙的吐息武器的豁免检定获得优势。

Booming Cavern.name: 激荡洞穴 (Booming Cavern)
Booming Cavern.text:
一个狭窄的岩壁俯瞰着一个容纳着汹涌澎湃水体的大洞穴。整个矿井中传来的有规律的轰鸣声在这里更为响亮。定期地，一股新的水流涌入这个洞穴并猛烈地撞击在岩壁下方。回声暗示着这个洞穴可能是一个更大洞穴的一部分，位于东北方向。

拍打海浪声使回音洞穴得名的声音可以追溯到这个充满水的洞穴。

贴着南墙的岩壁高出水面15英尺。然而，当水每2分钟涌入洞穴时，水位会上升10英尺。1分钟后，水位恢复到正常的20英尺深度。

这个被水淹没的洞穴是@UUID[Actor.p9Xnr820UAZBOIVN]{giant octopus}的家园，它被水面上的任何光吸引。如果角色停留在灯笼、火把或其他光源旁，章鱼就会浮出水面并发动攻击。它的触手足够长，可以触及站在岩壁上的目标，但距离岩壁5英尺以上的生物是安全的。巨型章鱼会把任何被它缠住的生物拖入水中。

在水中开始他们的回合的角色必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=strength dc=10]]豁免才能继续漂浮。未通过豁免的角色会被拉到水下。

东北洞穴。 东北方向的更大洞穴是一个数百码宽的地下湖，通往其他几个通道和洞穴系统。费安德尔之盟的矿工们对那些区域进行了初步探索，但他们的探险记录早已遗失。产生定期水流的温泉位于某处。进入这里的水中的角色会发现水比预期的地下湖要温暖。

Old Streambed.name: 老河床 (Old Streambed)
Old Streambed.text:
这条通道只有四英尺高，被圆形的巨石和鹅卵石挡住。看起来像是一条河床，尽管现在这里没有水流。

从@UUID[.tSgLovz8boD8RgYp]{area W10} to @UUID[.ySART705xdEPMl8X]{area W18} used to continue through this low passage, eventually emptying into @UUID[.8Bj7MPxoFccBLXIL]{area W16}流出的小溪。

矮人们将小溪引到通往@UUID[.6ZYcuLN7DNu1MkO0]{area W12}的水渠中，以驱动熔炉中的水车。在土匪入侵的最后一场法术战中摇撼了波回洞穴的地震导致W18区域的地板坍塌，再次改变了小溪的流向。旧河床仍然是一个可用的通道，绕过W12区域的不死生物，尽管蜘蛛尚未发现这一点。

Collapsed Cavern.name: 坍塌洞穴
Collapsed Cavern.text:
这个洞穴的东半部分有一个宽阔的裂缝。一条小溪从西墙流出，然后倾泻到裂缝中，向北流去。沿着裂缝西边的铁桩固定着几根绳索，通向深渊底部。一个黑暗精灵监工正在对着两个巨魔下达命令，两个其他的巨魔站在旁边把守。

涅兹纳的走狗占据了这个洞穴。蜘蛛的占卜显示，当这个区域被摧毁时，底部隐藏着一些宝贵的财宝。

四个@UUID[Actor.QtJairF0h18BRhEM]{bugbears} in this area clear rock on the rift floor while the other two stand guard in the western half of the cavern, watching for any Undead incursions. A @UUID[Actor.mWbrPhcKOz6oLXMV]{doppelganger} named Vhalak supervises the operation in the guise of a drow. If a fight breaks out in the main cavern, the two bugbears in the rift climb the ropes to join the fray.

Rift. The rift is 20 feet deep.

Development. If three or more bugbears are killed, the doppelganger tries to retreat to @UUID[.tX49OpF3CSRmAAtB]{area W19}中的两个被派去警告蜘蛛有麻烦来了。

宝藏。 涅兹纳的占卜是准确的。在裂缝底部浅浅的碎石中埋葬着一个矮人的骷髅，身穿@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.3TWT5bv3z5zGUZCe]{gauntlets of ogre power}。成功进行[[/check skill=prc dc=20]]检定可以找到遗骸。每个搜索的角色每小时可以尝试一次检定。搜索超过一小时的角色可能会在您的判断下引起附近生物的注意。

Temple Of Dumathoin.name: 杜马索恩神殿 (Temple Of Dumathoin)
Temple Of Dumathoin.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh4ArtHandou.JournalEntryPage.TWD7Apyu04xdFEBi]

涅兹纳将这个房间作为他在矿井探索并寻找魔法锻造熔炉时的总部。

六根破裂而分裂的大理石柱沿着这个大厅的墙壁排列。一个九英尺高的矮人雕像坐在王座上，他的膝盖上横跨着一把强大的石制战锤，占据了北端。他的眼睛中闪烁着大颗翡翠。

灰尘和碎片被扫到地板的一侧。半打卧具和背包被整齐地摆放在雕像前一个粗糙建造的火坑周围。一张木桌子立在房间的西侧，两根柱子之间。

如果房间的占据者在角色进入时没有察觉到他们，添加以下内容：

两只巨怪站在桌子旁，两侧是一名穿着黑色皮甲和长袍的黑暗精灵。黑暗精灵紧握着一根顶端雕有蜘蛛的黑色法杖，当他看到你时皱起了眉头。“看来我必须亲自解决你们了。可惜事情必须以这种方式结束。”

@UUID[Actor.pbsoNezznarTheSp]{Nezznar the Spider} is accompanied by two @UUID[Actor.QtJairF0h18BRhEM]{bugbears} who defend their leader to the death. If the @UUID[Actor.mWbrPhcKOz6oLXMV]{doppelganger} 从 @UUID[.ySART705xdEPMl8X]{area W18} retreated to this area, it assumes the guise of Nundro Rockseeker so that Nezznar can use the dwarf as leverage to force the party’s surrender (although the Spider won’t actually harm the doppelganger). See “Roleplaying Nezznar” for more information on the Spider.

Disguise the Doppelganger

Select the doppelganger and run the @UUID[Macro.pbsoDoppelganger]{Doppelganger Disguise Toggle} Macro to switch between its Drow and Nundro Rockseeker display.

If they’re expecting trouble, the bugbears hide behind pillars, and Nezznar casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]{invisibility} 身上施加了一个魔法，并站在桌子旁。为巨怪进行一次[[/check skill=ste]]检定；最低点数是角色必须进行的[[/check skill=prc]]检定的DC，以避免被&Reference[surprise]{surprised}.

Statue. The statue in the room depicts Dumathoin, the dwarven god of mining. Any character proficient in the Religion skill recognizes the depiction. The statue is beautifully carved, and its @UUID[Item.pbsoStatuesEmera]{emerald eyes} appear to be worth 5,000 gp each.

A character can climb the statue and pry loose a gem with a [[/check ability=str dc=10]] check. If either gem is removed, the character must succeed on a [[/save ability=dex dc=12]] saving throw or the six pillars that line the walls crumble, triggering a ceiling collapse. Every creature in the room must make a [[/save ability=dex dc=15]] saving throw. A creature takes [[/damage 2d10 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage from falling rubble on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Any creature still in the room 1 round later is buried and killed as the chamber fills with stone, at which point the area becomes impassible.

Table. The table is strewn with notes and maps showing Nezznar’s efforts at exploring the mine so far. There is also a sack of treasure amid the papers (see Treasure below).

Roleplaying Nezznar. Even though he intends to kill the characters, Nezznar can’t resist being curious about them. Given the chance, he quizzes the characters at length regarding their identities, allegiances, interests, and goals, filing it all in his memory in the hope that someday he will find a use for what he learns.

Nezznar admits to being the Spider, and to using the Cragmaw goblins and the Redbrands to ensure that Wave Echo Cave remains his secret. He’ll say or do anything to put the characters off guard, including promising to surrender or proposing cooperation against the monsters impeding his progress toward reaching the Forge of Spells. However, he betrays the characters as soon as he can.

Development. The creatures in @UUID[.ySART705xdEPMl8X]{area W18}。在这个房间里可以听到战斗的声音。如果他们还没有被处理，他们将在3轮后到达，并立即在行动顺序中跟在巨怪后面。

如果角色俘获涅兹纳并将他送到芬德林的镇长大厅，他将被关押，直到西尔达·霍尔温特或其他领主联盟的代表可以护送他前往尼瓦沃接受审讯。尼瓦沃的组织渴望了解涅兹纳对回声洞穴的一切了解。除非角色在涅兹纳的牢房外设置了警卫，否则哈莉亚·索顿 @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.FVuy16GzNw8yzAH9#halias-job-offer]{breaks him out of jail}, smuggles him out of Phandalin, and delivers him into the custody of the leaders of the Zhentarim. What happens to Nezznar at that point is up to you.

Treasure. Nezznar carries a @UUID[Actor.pbsoNezznarTheSp.Item.flDawBiokLtV3jjT]{potion of healing} and a @UUID[Actor.pbsoNezznarTheSp.Item.0aG4XwdBY69Ex1NK]{spider staff}。此外，他在木桌上携带了一个 @UUID[Actor.pbsoNezznarTheSp.Item.tdZlXkBG58O9h48u]{iron key} with a head shaped like an anvil. This key unlocks the door to @UUID[.MHO7M3O6bU8vCna1]{area W20}.

Nezznar’s exploration of Wave Echo Cave has yielded some treasure, which he keeps in a @UUID[Item.pbsoBlackLeather]{black leather sack}。袋子里有190枚银币，130枚金币，15枚银币，九颗小宝石(每颗10枚金币)，以及一个由锤击电金制成的矮人麦酒杯(80枚金币)。

Priests’ Quarters.name: 牧师住所
Priests’ Quarters.text:
这个房间的门被锁上了，需要盗贼工具和一次成功的敏捷检定 (DC 15) 才能打开。尼兹纳尔 (尼兹纳尔{area W19}) 拿着钥匙。

除非角色们行动潜行，否则在门口的任何活动都会引起尼兹纳尔和他在W19区域的盟友的注意，促使蜘蛛派遣他的大蜘蛛来调查。

这个房间的墙壁上挂着红色和金色的灰尘覆盖的帷幕，房间里还有一张床和一个火盆。一个衣衫褴褛的矮人躺在冰冷的石板地板上，被捆绑着昏迷不醒。

地板上躺着的人是努德罗·洛克西尔 (努德罗·洛克西尔{Nundro})，一个矮人普通人，也是三兄弟洛克西尔中的最后一个。尼兹纳尔让他活着是因为他认为这个矮人可能知道矿井的情况比他承认的要多。蜘蛛自从俘虏他以来，每天都在审问努德罗。

发展。 如果英雄们救出努德罗，他会感激不尽，并提议在他们在回声洞穴逗留期间跟随他们。努德罗对洞穴的布局并不比角色们已经知道的更多。

如果角色们处理了尼兹纳尔和大蜘蛛，这个区域可以作为他们继续探索矿井前休息的安全场所。

Paths of Peril.name: 危险之路
Paths of Peril.text:
当角色们在波浪洞穴的冒险之后回到范达林时，他们发现小镇陷入动荡之中。盗窃、破坏和暴力困扰着范达林，所有这些都是由一群地精所为，其中一些展示出奇怪的精神力量。这些地精在之前章节的背景中一直在追求他们的目标(参见@UUID[.txt9zybqx8bd4yOw#the-goblins-story]{"The Goblins’ Story"}), and their efforts have now become the adventure’s main story. @Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.NHD4twRyUEmYKE8R]

Distressed and unsure how to help the victims, let alone find and stop the criminals, townmaster Harbin Wester asks the characters to investigate these crime scenes, find the culprits, and put a stop to the incidents. This task eventually leads the characters to the goblins’ base far underground in an old duergar mining post called Zorzula’s Rest, where a goblin leader who calls himself Ruxithid the Chosen receives orders from powerful overlords.

Running This Chapter

This chapter can be divided into two parts: the investigations around Phandalin and the hunt for Ruxithid.

The goblins left four distinct @UUID[.fE30XYPDI02HyUPn]{crime scenes} that the characters can investigate in any order. Each crime scene has at least one witness and one potential combat encounter. From these crime scenes, the characters should gather enough clues to point them toward @UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid}，地精的领袖，没有他，地精的犯罪行为将停止。

追踪Ruxithid会让角色们进入@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest}. This section is a traditional dungeon crawl, filled with strange secrets to uncover and dangerous enemies to fight.

Character Advancement

The characters should be 5th level when this chapter begins. In this chapter, characters can advance to 7th level and no further. Advancement is handled as follows:

  • The characters gain a level when they discover the location of Zorzula’s Rest and determine that they must confront Ruxithid the Chosen and the Sawplee goblins there.
  • The characters gain a level when they defeat Ruxithid and learn of a larger, more sinister plan.

The Goblins’ Story

The goblins at the heart of this chapter’s adventure are part of an enclave whose ancestors have inhabited an abandoned duergar mining outpost called Zorzula’s Rest for generations. Centuries ago, the outpost was conquered by mind flayers, and the goblins there were exposed to the illithids’ strange powers, leading a subset of the goblins to develop unusual psionic powers. The mind flayers eventually left, but the goblins remained, sequestered from the rest of the world until recently when the mind flayer fanatics called on them. Some of these goblins’ descendants possess psionic powers, as evidenced by the @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiCom]{goblin psi commanders} and @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers}，这些地精组成了他们的队伍。总称为Sawplees的地精：这是深语中“地精”一词的简化。

最近几周，Sawplee地精的领袖发现了一颗神秘的宝石。未知于@UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid the Chosen}，一群新的来自法域的触须怪狂热者为他种下了这颗宝石。这颗宝石让Ruxithid能够与触须怪进行心灵交流，他认为他们是神。触须怪要求Ruxithid的地精找到一些奇特的黑色石碎片，这些碎片来自于曾经在范达林外的荒野中竖立的一座古老方尖碑。这方尖碑起源于古代尼瑟帝帝国，据说具有变形的能力，尽管地精对其属性或历史知之甚少。地精只知道他们的“神”追踪到方尖碑的一些碎片到了范达林，渴望这些碎片用于某种更大的目的，并要求Sawplees的帮助。

在与他们法域主人交流时，触须怪得知有四块方尖碑碎片被隐藏在范达林周围已经很久了。（有关触须怪的故事可以在后续章节中找到。)正是对这些碎片的追寻成为了地精犯罪行为的动机。然而，许多地精只是利用这个机会在整个城镇制造混乱，仅仅是为了好玩。

Townmaster's Plight.name: 镇长的困境
Townmaster's Plight.text:
当角色们在Wave Echo Cave的对抗之后回到芬德林时，朗读以下内容：

一群愤怒的人群的喧嚣声迎接着你们回到镇上的旅程。很快你们就能找到这混乱的源头：镇长哈宾·韦斯特的家。一群镇民聚集在那里，有些人高声要求哈宾出来，有些人则谴责他的领导能力。人群中有些人显示出轻微的伤势，所有人都显得焦虑和沮丧。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.tUXHEw4EMOweyStT]

人群的不满源于镇上发生的犯罪。具有[[/check skill=prc passive=true dc=13]]或更高的技能检定的角色可以听到人群中以下对话片段：

一个半身人女性抱怨道：“我以为红袍团是坏人，但至少他们从来没有砸过酒吧。谁会这么做？”

一个人类矿工大声喊道：“交易所快倒了，我的一些朋友失踪了！”

一个穿着围裙的恼怒精灵男子说：“如果我再看到那些小精灵靠近我的店，我就要用擀面杖打他们。我受不了了！”

一个焦躁的人类女性安抚着怀抱中的幼儿。“一切都会好的，”她说。“我们只是不能在日落后外出玩耍，好吗？”

一个人类男子举起一张半兽人女性的素描并大喊：“我妻子失踪已经好几天了！做点什么，你这懦夫！停止这一切！”

当角色们靠近哈宾的房子时，疲惫不堪的镇长拉开门，匆忙地把角色们拉进去。@UUID[Actor.pbsoHarbinWester]{Harbin}看起来焦躁，脸颊发红，眼袋深重。

哈宾告诉角色们以下内容：

“我知道他们生气了，但他们指望我一个人解决一切吗？我一个人无法对付一群无赖。我无法阻止那些决心破坏建筑和偷窃的人。荒谬！”

哈宾解释说，当角色们不在时，一系列犯罪困扰了镇上。根据目击者的说法，罪犯很可能是地精。这些犯罪引起了镇民的不安，他们要求哈宾采取行动保护芬德林。然而，哈宾既不是调查员也不是警官，他被人民的愤怒所压倒。

哈宾请求角色们@UUID[.fE30XYPDI02HyUPn]{investigate}四个犯罪现场，尽可能帮助受害者，并找到一种彻底制止罪犯的方法。他声称自己已经尝试过，但无法跟上众多事件。然而，一次成功的技能检定(调查 DC=12)揭示了哈宾想让角色们去调查，因为他自己太害怕了。

对于这项任务，哈宾提供给角色们每人[[奖励 50gp]] 作为预付款，并承诺在完成调查后再支付每人[[奖励 150gp]]。如果角色利用哈宾的恐惧作为筹码，并在物品检定(DC=11)或感知检定(DC=11)中成功，哈宾会将金钱奖励翻倍：每人[[奖励 100gp]] 预付款，以及在调查完成后每人[[奖励 300gp]]。

Quests and Locations.name: 任务与地点
Quests and Locations.text:
被盗碎片

哥布林为了取回方尖碑碎片而犯下了以下罪行。所有这些事件都发生在最近几天。您可以根据您的战役需求定制具体的时间线，但这些罪行应该是最近发生的，而角色们离开城镇时。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ONjHFiWci0jYS19t]{Barthen's Well}

The well the goblins vandalized is located behind Barthen's Provisions. Years ago, the well was built using material scavenged from the nearby area—including an obelisk shard, which was used as the drum for the well’s winch.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.IcoR1VFfA1pfeuwd]{Miner's Exchange}

During initial construction of the Miner’s Exchange, the miners of Phandalin embedded a sparkling shard of obsidian into the building’s ceremonial cornerstone. Unbeknownst to them, this shard is part of the obelisk the Sawplee goblins seek. A few days ago, goblins used crude mining supplies stolen from the Miner’s Exchange to hack the shard from the cornerstone, damaging the building’s integrity. Now, the Miner’s Exchange leans precariously, and members of the guild are desperate to repair it.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.SPuyFWCtfXxZFvyq]{Shrine of Luck}

从周围荒野的材料中拼凑而成，幸运神龛由一堆奇怪的岩石和石头组成。城镇居民不知道，神龛中的一块石头起源于方尖碑。这块小的黑曜石碎片多年来一直是神龛拱门的中心，直到一群哥布林在清晨时分来到，将其从原位取走。这导致整个拱门倒塌在神龛上，造成了损坏。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ltvZLADIjqljb45k]{Sleeping Giant}

With the Redbrands’ operation curtailed by the characters, the Sleeping Giant is no longer a meeting place for criminals. Most townsfolk are still wary of the place, though a few have started coming to the tavern for cheaper drinks.

The Hunt for Ruxithid

Once the party has finished investigating, they will determine that it's time to go to Zorzula's Rest and eventually, the Indigo Sanctum within it.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula's Rest}

Zorzula’s Rest is an ancient duergar mining outpost located in one of the Sword Mountains east of Phandalin. The meaning of its name has been lost to time, though some history books mention a powerful duergar leader named Zorzula, who commanded mining operations throughout the Sword Mountains. However, duergar control of the outpost ceased centuries ago when Zorzula’s Rest was overtaken by mind flayers.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu]{Indigo Sanctum}

在矮人矿山作业期间，蓝紫色圣所位于佐祖拉之息的遗迹中，是一个神圣的大厅。隐藏在山洞深处的蓝紫色圣所是矮人和他们的盟友们休息、恢复和安全的地方。

What’s Next?.name: 接下来是什么？
What’s Next?.text:
击败了Ruxithid并得知有更大、更邪恶的力量在起作用后，角色们应该意识到范达林正处于危险之中。他们很可能希望返回范达林休息并计划下一步行动。如果玩家们需要在这个方向上有所提示，提醒他们圣所中的被绑架受害者需要尽快得到食物和医疗。幸存者可能没有足够的力气自己前往范达林，需要角色们护送他们到镇上。回到范达林后，哈宾支付给角色们@UUID[.CIH2pXSwtSmlzKdf]{agreed upon amount}，并深深感谢他们的帮助。

在冒险的这一部分，无论角色们做出什么选择，哥布林们已经将四块方尖碑碎片从范达林送到了掠心者那里。现在冒险变成了一场追逐时间的比赛，要找到剩下的三块碎片。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.loNXsG9OapLz8FrC]

Crimes and Chaos.name: 犯罪与混乱 (Crimes and Chaos)
Crimes and Chaos.text:
哈尔滨在角色接受他的任务后描述了犯罪现场。以下地点可以在@UUID[Scene.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin Village} Scene in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.5ypi0Nehichr6c2m]{chapter 2}:

Barthen’s Well, behind Barthen’s Provisions, where the goblins smashed the well winch before fleeing underground.

The Miner’s Exchange, where the goblins stole one of the building’s cornerstones, causing the building to tilt.

The Shrine of Luck, which the goblins destroyed and desecrated, trapping people inside.

The Sleeping Giant, where goblins ransacked the bar.

The crime scenes are further detailed in the @UUID[.gdg1shUmjEkIwUyZ]{Stolen Shards}部分找到。角色可以以任何顺序调查这些场景。

正在进行的恶作剧

当角色在范达林周围调查时，他们可能会遇到一群索普利(Sawplee)地精正在犯罪。@Embed[RollTable.pbsoGoblinMischi classes="caption-top"]

地精知晓的事情

如果地精中的任何一个—无论是来自四个犯罪现场调查还是来自城镇周围的随机恶作剧—被角色抓住、贿赂或被角色&Reference[condition=charmed]，地精可能会向队伍透露一些有用的信息。成功的[[/check skill=itm dc=13]]或[[/check skill=per dc=13]]检查会促使地精透露以下信息之一：

矮人城堡前哨站。 地精驻扎在附近的一座古老的矮人矿山前哨站，但在地下。

地精领袖。 他们为一个名叫被选中的鲁西西德(Ruxithid the Chosen)的地精工作。鲁西西德拥有一个“大脑”，地精们相信这是强大神灵赐予的。

横冲直撞。 一些地精在城镇制造混乱，因为这是他们第一次离开地下家园，他们正在享受自由。

偷取碎片。 地精被派去偷取一座古老方尖碑的碎片。他们相信这座方尖碑有摧毁范达林的力量。

Scholarly Aid.name: 学者援助 (Scholarly Aid)
Scholarly Aid.text:
在他们的调查过程中，角色们遇到了@UUID[Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{Gwyn Oresong}, a dwarf scholar visiting @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin} who can help piece together the goblins’ grand plan.

After the characters investigate at least one crime scene, read or paraphrase the following:

A cheery voice calls out to you, and you see a dwarven woman clad in blue robes waving to your group. Her forearms are marked with numerous tattoos of sigils drawn in white ink. Slung across her back is a leather satchel brimming with books, scrolls, and other implements.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.oTxVBoBZyoMQ05WD classes="right two" caption=false]

Gwyn is new to town and is slightly lost. She requests the party’s help in directing her to the Stonehill Inn.

Gwyn Oresong

@UUID[Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{Gwyn}，一个中立善良的矮人侍僧，来自从不冻河城。她正在芬德林与她的姐姐艾尔莎共度几个月的时光，艾尔莎在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.dHJZscNdlIBbdjfp]{Stonehill Inn}, and to do field research in the surrounding area.

Gwyn has heard about the various crimes from her sister and recognizes the characters as the group tasked with putting an end to the crimes. Though she admits she can’t help fight vandals, Gwyn offers to assist the party. She asks the characters to bring any clues to her so she can help them investigate the crimes.

Gwyn knows a wealth of information about the history of the wilds around Phandalin, and she specializes in knowledge about empires of the past. Dwarven history is the focus of her scholarship, but she’s also fascinated with goblin history and culture. This knowledge will help the characters later. Gwyn freely shares her knowledge with the characters when they need it (though she has a propensity to ramble), and she is a great ally to help them determine why the goblins are attacking the town.

Uncovering the Clues

As the characters’ investigation proceeds, they find clues about the goblins’ goals, base of operations, and leader. The possible clues are as follows:

Duergar Site. The goblins are coming from a place that’s duergar in origin.

This clue can be found either by examining the axe found at the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.SPuyFWCtfXxZFvyq]{Shrine of Luck} or by successfully interrogating a captured goblin.

Fragments of a Location. The characters have a fragment of the goblin outpost’s name, Zorzula’s Rest.

This clue can be found either by talking with Ander at @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ONjHFiWci0jYS19t]{Barthen’s Well}担任酒吧招待，或者通过检查@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ltvZLADIjqljb45k]{Sleeping Giant}.

Goblins’ Purpose. The goblins are specifically hunting shards of dark stone that display strange properties.

This clue can be found either by successfully interrogating a captured goblin, or by talking to Wheel-of-Fortune about the stones missing from the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ltvZLADIjqljb45k]{Sleeping Giant’s} bar, or Halia about the cornerstone of the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.IcoR1VFfA1pfeuwd]{Miner’s Exchange}上的涂鸦。讨论安德尔与@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ONjHFiWci0jYS19t#talking-to-ander]{well water} can also lead to this clue.

Leader’s Name. The goblins are operating under the command of a goblin named Ruxithid.

This clue can be found either by eavesdropping on the goblin camp near the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.IcoR1VFfA1pfeuwd]{Miner’s Exchange} or by successfully interrogating a kidnapped goblin.

The characters might piece together these clues themselves and figure out that they must confront Ruxithid in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest}的先前经历，以阻止索普利哥布林的犯罪。或者，如果角色们找到了所有四个线索，格温很容易就能追踪到哥布林的来源，那就是被遗弃的矮人矿山前哨站，即所谓的佐祖拉之息。格温对哥布林打算用偷来的碎片做什么感到紧张，她敦促角色们赶往佐祖拉之息，并阻止哥布林的计划，无论是什么。

如果角色们找到的线索少于四个，并请求格温的帮助，格温会同意，但她的笔记很混乱。角色可以进行一次[[/check skill=history dc=15]]检定来帮助格温整理她的研究。检定成功后，格温找到了关于佐祖拉之息的笔记。然后格温建议前哨站可能是下一个搜索的好地方。检定失败后，格温找不到相关的研究。角色们必须找到更多线索才能找到佐祖拉之息。如果他们陷入困境并寻求格温的帮助，她会告诉他们位置。

当角色们准备好时，他们可以按照格温的指示前往佐祖拉之息。前哨站的布局稍后会在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest.JournalEntryPage.dcSt7UogD9CYw95W]{this chapter}中详细描述。

Entering the Sanctum.name: 进入圣所 (Entering the Sanctum)
Entering the Sanctum.text:
当角色进入圣所时，请阅读或解释以下内容：

电梯的门打开，映入眼帘的是一座由黑曜石建造的巨大圣所。两股熔岩瀑布从圣所入口两侧倾泻而下，在拱形天花板上投下诡异的光芒。在圣所的对面，矗立着一尊巨大的矮人女性雕像。裂缝沿着她的手臂延伸，半边脸被打碎，但仍残留着一丝和蔼的微笑。

圣所由抛光的黑曜石建造，拱形天花板高达20英尺。圣所的内部如下所示。

激活靛蓝圣所场景

阅读上述叙述文本后，激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p6000000]{Indigo Sanctum} 场景。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.WSFRvVpIjqdc2Pnh caption=false]

被选中的鲁西西德(Ruxithid the Chosen)站在雕像后面的中庭上。当角色面对鲁西西德时，请阅读以下内容：

这个哥布林样的人物比你们遇到的其他哥布林更高更宽，一块扭曲的水晶裂开了他的头颅，露出了他的大脑。他转过身来，眼睛和血管发着超自然的绿光，向你招手。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.DqnCsLeKkItu6sWP caption=false classes="left three"]

被选中的鲁西西德

站在圣所中庭的哥布林是@UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid the Chosen}。鲁西西德的精神能力使他在前哨站周围具有一定的基本预知能力，因此这位哥布林领袖在角色到达之前就已经察觉到了他们的存在。

鲁西西德以一种不自然的平静、抑扬顿挫的声音说话。起初，他试图对角色友好。不知道他的“伟大神灵”实际上是掠心者，鲁西西德解释说他是神圣的预言者，他寻找这些碎片的任务旨在引发物质位面的变革。然而，任何成功进行[[/check skill=ins dc=16]]检定的角色都会注意到鲁西西德说话时眼睛往后翻的奇特方式：这表明这位哥布林正在与自己的头脑进行第二次对话，他所说的话并非完全属于他自己。

.

Sanctum Showdown.name: 圣所对决(Sanctum Showdown).
Sanctum Showdown.text:
如果角色没有表现出加入Ruxithid的迹象，或者其中任何一个威胁使用暴力，Ruxithid会变得敌对。阅读或解释以下内容：

绿光从Ruxithid的胸膛中脉动，迅速飞向巨大的矮人雕像。像寄生虫一样，光线钻入雕像破碎的脸上，渗透到裂缝中。雕像向前倾斜，依然微笑着，而Ruxithid命令它来杀死你。

这座雕像是一位@UUID[Actor.z85EsGS2GVWj46qE]{shield guardian} under Ruxithid’s control and fights alongside its master. The shield guardian stores a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BYNvBJzHcF5VJhXw]{phantasmal killer} spell from its original duergar creator and Ruxithid can command the Construct to cast it. If this fight seems too easy for the party, add two @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers}，他们将在3回合内从Zorzula's Rest赶来参加战斗。

在战斗中，Ruxithid利用他的智力飞行在混战上空盘旋，突袭攻击并指挥护盾卫士(以及其他两只地精，如果它们也在场)来承受伤害。Ruxithid战斗至死，但当他的生命值降至0时，护盾卫士变得无生命力，其他地精(如果在场)投降。

揭示的令人不安的真相

如果Ruxithid被杀死，阅读以下内容：

Ruxithid倒在地上，他的晶体大脑破裂。圣所里充满了一片混乱，就像成千上万的声音同时哭泣。三个声音出现，异口同声地说话。

这些声音嘶嘶道：

“所以你成功了。很好。四块碎片将很快到达这里。现在还有三块需要找到。你知道你的任务，小家伙。从Talhundereth、Talhund的地下室和Gibbet Crossing收集碎片，带给我们。你将重生，比你想象的更伟大，而Phandalin将成为我们的。”

那些畸形的食脑怪狂热地给晶体充能，并用它与Ruxithid进行心灵感应交流，同时存储重要信息。在信息播放完毕后，晶体失去光芒，变得平凡无奇。

当Ruxithid死亡时，播放给角色的信息是食脑怪对他的最后命令：找到并交付另外三块隐匿在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth}, the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6crypttalh]{Crypt of the Talhund}, and @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing}（关于这些地点的更多信息可以在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter60000]{next chapter}).

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.HrMlUbvDwp10SsNA caption=false classes="right three"]

Any character who hears the message can make a [[/check skill=rel dc=13]] check. On a successful check, the character realizes that the message’s tone as well as the means of communication are unlike any known divine tradition—this is some other kind of powerful entity or group of entities, posing as gods to accomplish their malign ends.

Key. Ruxithid carries a key to his personal quarters (@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest.JournalEntryPage.vU8dDpPmNlmhFBDo]{Z10}).

Hostage Room. The goblins used the west wing of the sanctum to hold their kidnap victims. Most of the victims were transported elsewhere to serve as “offerings for the gods” (or food for the mind flayers), but some victims were deemed unfit and left to starve within the sanctum’s depths.

There are three hostages here, and all use the @UUID[Actor.SqZRuJ8lt2KGJBbq]{commoner}的统计数据中找到。它们是Dareth Grint，一个是Townmaster Harbin Wester的表弟的人类农民；Paulina Previne，一个偶尔在Stonehill Inn工作的人类马夫；以及Tumblewick Rollins，一个侏儒药剂师，

他们病弱得几乎没有意识，地精们没有向他们解释太多。因此，他们只能回忆起他们作为囚犯时的一些事情：

石柱。 地精们着迷于重新组装某种石柱。

其他受害者。 这里曾经有更多的受害者。然而，那些受害者被哥布林带到别处，进行“特殊目的”。

作战室。鲁克西西德将圣所的东翼用作他的作战室。

作战室。圣所的东翼作为鲁克西西德的作战室，他在那里安排各种远征活动，以取回方尖碑碎片。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O classes="left three" caption=false]

调查这个房间的角色会在中央桌上找到一张粗糙绘制的地区地图，上面有混乱的箭头和涂鸦标签，上面写着“吊架十字路口”，“塔尔亨德地下墓穴”和“塔尔亨德雷斯”。

成功进行[[/check skill=inv dc=15]]检查的角色还会发现一张粗糙的黑石方尖碑草图。图中有四块碎片被划掉，而三块被圈出。这是涅瑞斯方尖碑的草图，被划掉的四块对应于在方达林找到的碎片，而被圈出的三块对应于还需找到的三块碎片。鲁克西西德的上级向他描述了方尖碑，并利用来自遥远领域的力量粗略定位了方尖碑的散落碎片。

索普利哥布林。尽管鲁克西西德是他们的领袖，但索普利哥布林对他并不特别忠诚。鲁克西西德通过恐惧统治，将哥布林置于危险之中，为了自己对权力的自私追求。

没有邪恶的领袖推动他们，哥布林变得和平、好奇，但调皮。角色可以决定如何处理索普利哥布林。方达林的镇民不喜欢哥布林，但如果角色希望结束索普利人和镇民之间的敌对关系，他们可以轻松地促成和平。

Indigo Sanctum.name: 靛蓝圣所 (Indigo Sanctum)
Indigo Sanctum.text:
在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu]{Indigo Sanctum}的Zorzula's Rest矿山运营期间，靛蓝圣所被视为一座神圣的大厅。靛蓝圣所隐藏在山洞深处，是矮人和他们盟友们休息、恢复和安全的地方。

然而，当掠夺者征服了矿山前哨站时，他们扭曲了这个圣所，用于他们邪恶的设计。曾经是受祝福的大厅变成了殖民地的智者之脑的家园。即使掠夺者离开了矿山前哨站，他们的精神残留仍像疾病一样紧紧地依附在圣所上。

最近，Sawplee领袖@UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid}进入了这个圣所。当他进入时，引起了一群远境崇拜的掠夺者的注意，他们正在研究这个地区，寻找一个适合他们新掠夺者帝国首都的地方。一旦他们选定Phandalin作为目标，并将破碎的尼瑟里斯方尖碑作为他们计划的导管，这群掠夺者就用一块水晶施加了魔法，作为他们与Ruxithid之间的心灵感应联系。

掠夺者狂热分子的一个下属随后将水晶留给了哥布林领袖。一旦Ruxithid将水晶嵌入他的大脑，哥布林领袖就听到了掠夺者狂热分子的心灵声音，并相信自己正在与神灵交流。他们指示Ruxithid找到破碎尼瑟里斯方尖碑的失落碎片，激发了Sawplees在Phandalin的罪行。

现在，Ruxithid在他的圣所里冥想，与他强大的心灵霸主交流，策划他任务的下一步。

Well Cavern.name: 威尔洞穴(Well Cavern)
Well Cavern.text:
如果角色希望追踪地精或调查井口的堵塞源头，角色可以使用绳子成功进行Athletics(体能)检定(DC 10)来爬下井口。如果角色没有绳子，安德会从商店的库存中借给他们一些。在成功检定后，角色爬下20英尺进入井口下面的洞穴——井口洞穴。如果检定失败，角色会摔倒，受到2d6点钝击伤害，并陷入倒地状态。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.rh7nK1O3LsIKFAMT caption=false]

激活井口洞穴场景

无论玩家以何种方式进入洞穴，从这一点开始激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p1000000]{Well Cavern} Scene.

When a character enters the cavern below the well, read or paraphrase the following:

The smell of damp earth, tinged with acrid rot, fills your nose. What looks like the remains of an underground river snakes through this cavern, though a pile of dark rocks blocks its headstream. In the far corner is the source of that scent: a pile of carrion and sewage being dragged by a fleshy, three-legged creature.

An @UUID[Actor.jcZblJ6lqtW0ePxe]{otyugh} lurks in the cavern, feasting on a pile of trash it has gathered from the town above. A falling character immediately attracts the otyugh’s attention; otherwise, a character must succeed on a [[/check skill=ste dc=11]] check to avoid the otyugh’s notice. The otyugh is hostile to any creature it sees.

Cave-In. It takes 1 hour for a character to dig out the tunnel. If more characters help, the time it takes to dig out the tunnel decreases by 10 minutes per character, to a minimum of 10 minutes total.

The cleared northern tunnel leads eastward to a mountainous outcropping near Zorzula’s Rest, though the mining outpost itself isn’t visible from the exit of the tunnel. At your discretion, the characters could enter @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest}，尽管他们应该先调查其他犯罪现场。

Goblin Camp.name: 哥布林营地 (Goblin Camp)
Goblin Camp.text:
袭击了@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.FVuy16GzNw8yzAH9]{Miner’s Exchange} are camping in a clearing about an hour’s walk from @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin}. The uninjured goblins returned to @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest}的哥布林带着碎片，而其他人留在营地里修补伤口。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.ZcUs8Yob9gPBRuej caption=false]

激活哥布林营地场景

当你的玩家完成接近时，激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p2000000]{Goblin Camp} Scene.

The makeshift camp, shown above, consists of a few tents and a small fire. The camp is situated in the center of a small clearing. As the characters approach the camp, they overhear one of the goblins complaining about their leader in Common:

“Hope the others made it back, else Ruxithid’s gonna have our heads!”

Currently, three @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers} remain at the camp. A character can avoid the goblins’ notice by succeeding on a [[/check skill=ste dc=16]] check. Otherwise, the hostile goblins detect any creature that enters their camp. If one of the goblins is killed, the others try to surrender.

The Clue. Eavesdropping on the camped goblins reveals that the goblin leader’s name is Ruxithid. This is a @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.rdOrCDjNChbNNj01#uncovering-the-clues]{clue}，可以帮助角色或格温·欧尔歌发现真相。

审问哥布林。 如果有任何哥布林被抓获或&Reference[condition=charmed]，角色可以带着哥布林去芬德林进行询问。查看@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.fE30XYPDI02HyUPn#what-the-goblins-know]{What the Goblins Know}部分，了解角色可以从哥布林那里获得的不同信息。被抓获的哥布林会发生什么取决于你和玩家。如果角色询问，哈宾·韦斯特勉强将哥布林关在镇长大厅的监狱里，直到角色揭开事情的真相。

Phandalin Alleys.name: 芬达林小巷 (Phandalin)
Phandalin Alleys.text:
激活费安德林小巷场景

在调查过程中，你可以激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p3000000]{Phandalin Alleys}场景。

调查场景。费安德林小巷场景展示了神龛和周围地区。搜索神龛寻找线索的角色会发现在瓦砾中有一把损坏的矿镐；通往附近小巷的匆忙脚印；以及嵌在附近建筑物墙壁上的一把斧头的闪光。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.eRMKl35XK6R9lRpf caption=false]
