线索。 检查斧头并成功进行[[/check skill=his dc=17]]检定的角色会认出斧头上刻着的符文是杜尔加尔人的。格温·奥尔松(Gwyn Oresong)立即认出符文的来源，这把斧头是@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.rdOrCDjNChbNNj01#uncovering-the-clues]{clue}，可以帮助她引导角色前往佐祖拉之墓(Zorzula’s Rest)。

Rooftop Stash.name: 屋顶藏匿
Rooftop Stash.text:
当哥布林逃走时，他们不小心把被偷的硬币袋子掉在了屋顶上。现在，三只哥布林已经回来取回袋子。

激活屋顶储藏场景

激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p4000000]{Rooftop Stash} for this encounter.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.XtUBfKHrtkS3GSwj caption=false]

If a character follows the trail of coins to the roof, or when the characters decide to finish their investigation at the Sleeping Giant, read or paraphrase the following:

A shrill shriek echoes from the roof of the Sleeping Giant. You see three goblin figures standing atop the building, muscles tensed in surprise. Green energy crackles around the fists of two of the goblins. The third wields a blade of the same energy and hefts a large cloth sack over her shoulder.

The goblin holding the sword and the sack is a @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiCom]{goblin psi commander}, and the other two goblins are @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers}。一旦被发现，所有三只哥布林都会发起攻击。

在随后的战斗中，哥布林会尽力保持在两层酒馆的屋顶上，利用高处的优势。

一旦其中一只哥布林被打败，剩下的哥布林会逃走，抛弃硬币袋。

@UUID[Item.pbsoRooftopstash]{Treasure.} 袋子里装着大部分酒馆一周的收入：10 gp，14 sp和17 cp。如果角色们从哥布林那里取回袋子并归还给格里斯塔，她会很感激。她会为了感谢他们的帮助而提供一周的免费餐，尽管食物不是最好的。

Barthen's Well.name: 巴森之井 (Barthen's Well)
Barthen's Well.text:
哥布林破坏的水井位于@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.N1xenckfVyuEm8Km]{Barthen's Provisions}. Years ago, the well was built using material scavenged from the nearby area—including an obelisk shard, which was used as the drum for the well’s winch.

Recently, goblins came during the night to retrieve the obelisk shard, destroying the well in the process. But their raid was interrupted by Ander, one of Barthen’s clerks. The goblins fled with the shard, jumping into the well and caving in a tunnel so they couldn’t be followed to Zorzula’s Rest. This escape, however, not only dammed the underground river that provided the well with its water but also awoke a grumpy otyugh that was feasting on refuse beneath the town.

Crime Scene

When the characters investigate this crime scene, read the following:

The modest red-brick well behind Barthen’s Provisions is dilapidated and crumbling. The well’s walls are toppled over. Chunks of brick and stone litter the nearby grass, and the well’s roof is splintered and caved in. The well’s winch and pulley have been smashed to pieces.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.Ln3xLbvw5GNdnmLf classes="left three"]

A character who inspects the well can make a [[/check skill=inv dc=15]] check. On a successful check, the character realizes that while most of the mechanism could be reassembled from the remaining pieces, the winch’s drum is missing.

Characters who have a [[/check passive=true skill=prc dc=15]] or higher also hear a low, gurgling growl coming from the well. A character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=nat dc=17]] check concludes that this growl is most likely coming from an irritated creature.

Talking to Ander

Ander is a wide-eyed, fast-talking, teenage halfling commoner who works as one of Barthen’s clerks. He was taking stock of the store when the goblins destroyed the well. Ander is waiting at Barthen’s Provisions to talk with the characters when they arrive. He reveals the following information:

Base of Operations. When Ander chased them off, he heard one of the vandals shout, “Hurry! Back to the Rest!” The vandals then jumped into the well to flee underground.

Description. Ander describes the vandals as “strange folk, bit bigger than me, with long flat ears, big heads, and hands that glowed with strange magic.”

Dry Well. Since the attack, the well has been dry. Ander suspects the vandals dammed the well’s water source during their escape.

Strange Behavior. The vandals arrived at sundown. Strangely, they didn’t go after any of the store’s stock; instead, they immediately began destroying the well.

The Clue. The goblins’ comment about retreating to “the Rest” is a @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.rdOrCDjNChbNNj01#uncovering-the-clues]{clue} that could help the characters or Gwyn Oresong determine the name of the goblins’ outpost.

Helping Ander. Ander mentions that Barthen hopes the party will restore the well’s water source, but Ander seems unenthused by the idea. If a character succeeds on a [[/check skill=per dc=13]] check, Ander reveals that every time he’s drawn water from the well, he’s also had vivid nightmares. Ander believes the well is @UUID[.ONjHFiWci0jYS19t#talking-to-ander]{cursed with bad luck}后面，现在已经停用，很高兴。

安德尔不知道，水的不良影响是由绞盘上的碎片引起的。现在这些影响不再困扰水井，因为碎片已经被移除。

遭遇：水井洞穴

如果角色希望追踪哥布林或调查水井堵塞的来源，请继续前往：@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.SoB2IIxWvI482i6W]{Well Cavern}

Miner's Exchange.name: 矿工交易所 (Miner's Exchange)
Miner's Exchange.text:
在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.FVuy16GzNw8yzAH9]{Miner’s Exchange}的初期建设过程中，凡达林的矿工们将一块闪闪发光的黑曜石碎片嵌入了建筑的奠基石中。他们并不知道，这块碎片是索普利哥布林寻找的方尖碑的一部分。几天前，哥布林们使用从矿工交易所偷来的粗糙采矿工具从奠基石上砍下了碎片，损坏了建筑的完整性。现在，矿工交易所倾斜不稳，行会成员们急于修复它。

犯罪现场

当角色们调查这个犯罪现场时，请朗读以下内容：

当你们靠近矿工交易所时，你们听到木梁折断和石头磨擦的声音，紧接着是惊慌的呼喊声。建筑物倾斜不稳，矿工们在建筑的基础周围爬行。站在一边的是行会大师哈莉娅，她的表情紧张，口气严厉地下达命令。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.bzcZKsk9JGONc5yJ classes="right three"]

行会大师哈莉娅·桑顿带领着修复建筑的工作。如果角色试图与哈莉娅交谈，行会大师会简洁地说她会在确保建筑不会倒塌后很乐意与他们交谈。

修复建筑。 角色中的任何人都可以帮助修复矿工交易所。角色可以帮助支撑建筑的重量，将材料递给修复结构的熟练石匠，或使用材料修复损坏。每位帮助的角色必须进行一次[[/check ability=str dc=12]]检定或[[/check ability=dex dc=12]]检定，取决于情况。如果尝试这两项检定的角色还具有相关工匠工具(如石匠工具)的熟练，则在检定中获得优势。

只要角色们至少进行了两次成功检定，他们就帮助完成了修复。如果他们没有成功，哈莉娅会感到沮丧。她责备角色们碍手碍脚。哈莉娅告诉他们在矿工们完成修复建筑之前不要再打扰她。

或者，角色们可以选择以非传统的方式帮助修复工作，利用他们掌握的任何魔法或工具。请随意根据情况裁决这些非传统的修复努力。

与哈莉娅交谈

一旦矿工交易所被修复，哈莉娅会告诉角色们发生了什么。她会提供以下信息：

孤独的目击者。 一天晚上，一群哥布林袭击了矿工交易所。哈莉娅当时是唯一一个在交易所的人，因为其他行会成员都在睡醉的巨人酒馆喝酒。

被偷的石头。 海莉娅尽力抵抗着哥布林，但她无法阻止他们拿走建筑物的一块基石。

交换打击 海莉娅在混战中受伤，所以她无法追赶哥布林。她知道自己重伤了几个哥布林，所以他们不可能走得太远。

奇异魔法 在战斗中，海莉娅发誓有一个哥布林用某种魔法的无形力量推了她。

追踪哥布林 海莉娅不知道哥布林为什么对建筑物的基石感兴趣；她只知道一个奇怪的“幸运石”镶嵌在其中现在不见了。

遭遇：哥布林营地

如果角色希望追踪哥布林，继续前往：@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.ED201sKiJ6uB9XM2]{Goblin Camp}

.

Shrine of Luck.name: 幸运神龛
Shrine of Luck.text:
由周围荒野搜集的材料建造而成，@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.2NFsevkbevf8r0ZP]{Shrine of Luck} consists of a strange assemblage of rocks and stones. Unbeknownst to the townspeople, one such stone in the shrine originated from the obelisk. This small, obsidian shard was a centerpiece in the shrine’s archway for years until a band of goblins came in the wee hours of the morning and plucked it from its perch. This caused the entire arch to collapse atop the shrine, damaging it.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.omkqjoR7BzNaw6vv classes="right three"]

The young girl working alongside @UUID[Actor.pbsoSisterGarael]{Sister Garaele} is Tamara Stonehill, the daughter of innkeeper Toblen Stonehill. Early one morning, Tamara visited the Shrine of Luck to pray with her mother, Trilena. However, as they were walking up, part of the shrine collapsed, and three small creatures—the goblins—hurried away from the rubble carrying a stone. Tamara and Trilena have since been helping Sister Garaele rebuild the shrine; Tamara is sorting through smaller chunks of rubble to find still-usable pieces, while Trilena is retrieving food and water at the Stonehill Inn.

Sister Garaele. Sister Garaele returned to Phandalin from a Harper mission a few hours after the shrine was vandalized. As such, she knows little about what occurred. If asked for information, she refers the characters to Trilena and Tamara.

Regardless, Garaele is visibly upset that the shrine has been desecrated. She gladly accepts any offers of help to rebuild and rededicate the shrine. A character can try to help by making a [[/check skill=sur dc=15]], [[/check skill=rel dc=15]], or [[/check skill=acr dc=15]] check. On a failed check, the shrine crumbles more, and the character takes [[/damage 1d4 type=bludgeoning]] damage from falling rocks.

After three successful checks, the shrine is repaired.

Investigating the Scene

See the following for remaining investigations around the Shrine of Luck: @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.N2UVprBdtXiULm3H]{Phandalin Alleys}

犯罪现场

当角色调查这个犯罪现场时，请阅读以下内容：

曾经是一座由五颜六色的岩石和供奉给提摩拉的引人注目的堆石祭坛，现在看起来不太稳固。你看到两个人正试图移动祭坛上的一些较大的石头：精灵加拉瑞尔和一个年龄不到十岁的人类女孩。

与塔玛拉交谈

塔玛拉，一个聪明伶俐的十岁女孩，专注于重建祭坛。角色可以通过成功进行一次[[/check skill=per dc=14]]检定来说服她在工作时回答问题。一旦祭坛修复好了，塔玛拉会自由回答角色的问题。

塔玛拉知道以下信息：

定期祭拜。 特里莉娜和塔玛拉在黎明时分到祭坛上进行每周的提摩拉祭祀，却看到祭坛突然坍塌。

小影子。 特里莉娜和塔玛拉都看到祭坛倒塌后，有三个矮小的影子匆匆离开。塔玛拉发誓她还听到一群尖声的声音在祭坛倒塌前响起，尽管她听不懂那些声音所说的语言。

被偷的中心物品。 根据石头的倒塌方式，塔玛拉推测肯定有人拿走了祭坛石拱的中心物品而没有替换。她提到那块石头是一种非常漂亮、闪闪发光的黑色。

作为提摩拉的信徒，特里莉娜和塔玛拉可以向角色解释祭坛的重要性和传统，如果角色还不知道的话。

Sleeping Giant.name: 沉睡的巨人 (Sleeping Giant)
Sleeping Giant.text:
随着角色们削弱了红袍团的行动，@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil.JournalEntryPage.V8y1mIcw0VIhXcaF]{Sleeping Giant} is no longer a meeting place for criminals. Most townsfolk are still wary of the place, though a few have started coming to the tavern for cheaper drinks.

Beyond its connection to the Redbrands, the Sleeping Giant is known for its collection of curios, amassed from travelers visiting Phandalin. One such curio was embedded in the bar itself: a near-spherical piece of glittering obsidian. Local myth says it is a piece of the &Reference[condition=petrified] giant that gave the tavern its name. In reality, this is an obelisk shard.

During the night, a band of goblins broke into the Sleeping Giant, smashed the bar to extract the obelisk shard, and ransacked the kitchen. The bar’s owner, a dwarf named Grista, chased the goblins away, but not before the tavern sustained significant damage.

Crime Scene

When the characters investigate this crime scene, read the following:

The taproom of the Sleeping Giant is quiet, save for the occasional thunk of tankard against table. The bar itself is in shambles, the wooden stiles smashed to splinters and the top split in half. Nevertheless, a tall purple tiefling works behind the broken counter, diligently cleaning mugs and plates under the watchful eye of the surly dwarf owner, Grista.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.Zh0BNQq8ekYKXr6r classes="right three"]

Grista gruffly greets the characters. The dwarf makes it clear that she despises Harbin and his attempts to govern the town, but she wants the criminals who destroyed her bar brought to justice. She gives the characters free rein to poke around the tavern as necessary.

The only other individual in the Sleeping Giant is the bartender, a nervous tiefling named Wheel-of-Fortune, who is a new arrival in Phandalin.

Investigating the Bar. The bar is in splinters, and the tavern’s lockbox has been broken open and looted. Characters who investigate the bar spot crudely carved pieces of graffiti under the counter.

The Clue. The legible parts of the graffiti read, “Zorz ws here.” This is intended to say, “Zorzula was here,” and the goblins left the graffiti in reference to Zorzula’s Rest. The graffiti is a @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.rdOrCDjNChbNNj01#uncovering-the-clues]{clue} that can help the characters or Gwyn Oresong pinpoint the goblins’ lair.

Investigating the Kitchen. The Sleeping Giant’s kitchen area suffered less damage than the bar, but many of the barrels and crates of foodstuffs have been ransacked. A character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=prc dc=15]] check while scanning the kitchen notices a trail of stray copper and silver pieces on the ground. These coins, stolen from the tavern’s lockbox, spilled from the goblins’ bag as Grista chased them away.

There is a total of [[/award 5sp 7cp]]. Following the trail of coins leads to the tavern’s fireplace, through which the goblins fled. Checking out the roof triggers @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.MlI6kpy3oKLDKy6m]{“Encounter: Rooftop Stash.”}

与命运之轮交谈

命运之轮尽力帮助角色们，并提供免费饮料。如果角色接受了命运之轮的饮料，请阅读或转述以下内容：

命运之轮轻松地拿起一个干净的马克杯，将其倒满。在递给你之前，这位魔鬼移动到柜台上敲击马克杯，但在中途停下来，羞涩地脸红。

命运之轮解释说，柜台曾经嵌有一块大块黑色石头，但自从袭击发生后就不见了。据说这块石头带来好运，每次他们倒酒时，命运之轮都会敲击马克杯。

成功通过[[/check skill=ins dc=12]]检定的角色会直觉到命运之轮在隐瞒某事。在追问时，命运之轮解释说，他们倒的每一杯酒都会在某种程度上有些“不对劲”：麦酒经常会引起头痛，蜜酒闪烁着油膜般的七彩光泽。命运之轮不知道这是怎么发生的，对自己的无能感到尴尬，认为自己被诅咒了。(他们并不知道，与柜台上的方尖碑碎片距离过近导致了这些不良影响。)

命运之轮不在哥布林袭击酒馆时在场。如果询问袭击者，这位魔鬼会指引角色们与格里斯塔交谈。

与格里斯塔交谈

格里斯塔勉强分享以下信息：

粗鲁唤醒。 格里斯塔被木头被破坏的声音惊醒。当她最终下楼时，她看到一群五个小生物正在摧毁吧台和洗劫厨房。

粗鲁的孩子。 格里斯塔最初误以为这些生物是因为身材矮小而行为不端的孩子，但后来她注意到他们长长的扁平耳朵和尖锐的牙齿。他们还都携带武器。

破坏吧台。 令格里斯塔惊讶的是，这些生物并没有偷走太多食物；相反，他们专注于摧毁吧台。

被追赶后逃跑。 她用扫帚赶走了这些生物。当她这样做时，几个生物逃离了吧台，通过壁炉爬上了烟囱。

格里斯塔没有认出这些生物是哥布林。如果询问曾经嵌在柜台上的黑色石头，格里斯塔声称它没有特殊属性。

遭遇：屋顶藏匿处

当哥布林们逃跑时，他们不小心把偷来的硬币袋子掉在了屋顶上。现在，三个哥布林回来取回袋子。

如果角色跟随硬币的痕迹到达屋顶，继续前往：@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.MlI6kpy3oKLDKy6m]{Rooftop Stash}

Entrance.name: 入口
Entrance.text:
你面前的高耸石制双门没有装饰。门两侧各有一个箭孔，每个箭孔离地面约10英尺，守卫着入口。

入口门没有锁，但关闭且太重，除非用1分钟的力气推开，尽管@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1nhIxh0DsJsntCfj]{Knock} spell or similar magic opens it with ease. Pulling a lever in @UUID[.wFqoyQzZf1ePm54Q]{area Z2} causes the doors to swing inward, stone grinding against stone.

Arrow Slits. Two @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiCom]{goblin psi commanders}位于入口的箭孔处。箭孔离地10英尺，可以通过@UUID[.wFqoyQzZf1ePm54Q]{area Z2}. The parapet shown on @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.1CNZNquBvPx2Zj6p]{map 5.5} in area Z2 connects the two arrow slits, which grant all of the creatures on the ledge &Reference[three-quarters-cover]{three-quarters cover}内的螺旋楼梯到达，用于防御外部的攻击。

哥布林对外来者很谨慎但易受骗，并且他们对鲁西西德让他们执勤感到愤怒。角色可以通过成功的[[/check skill=dec dc=15]]或[[/check skill=per dc=15]]检定，或者支付至少25 gp的贿赂来说服哥布林打开门。如果角色威胁使用暴力，哥布林会发动攻击。三回合后，@UUID[.6S3kUuUa4KsZttfx]{area Z3}的增援到达。

Vestibule.name: 门厅
Vestibule.text:
昏暗的蓝光洒在前哨站潮湿的内部，螺旋楼梯沿着这个区域的北墙上升。远处，你听到微弱的谈话声和餐具碰撞盘子的声音。

在门的两侧各有一座细长的螺旋楼梯，通向@UUID[.uAw6Xpg6snXyCP02]{area Z1}中描述的守卫入口的箭孔之一。箭孔下方的城垛上有一个拉杆，可以打开双门。拉杆直接位于门的正上方。

Mess Hall.name: 食堂 (Mess Hall)
Mess Hall.text:
蓝色调的岩浆流过沿着墙壁顶部边缘的几何雕刻，给房间带来诡异的光线。三张长方形石桌伸展在房间的长度，还有几组石凳。几只地精坐在这些桌子旁，将颗粒状的白色粥铲进嘴里。

房间的一侧有一个窗户，可以看到前哨基地的厨房。

随时，[[/gmr 2d4]] @UUID[Actor.TjWQOgI3A4UAl7lC]{goblins} eat in the mess hall, along with [[/gmr 1d6]] @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers} and [[/gmr 1d4]] @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiCom]{goblin psi commanders}。

如果他们注意到餐厅里有入侵者，地精们会惊慌并发动攻击。地精们试图用数量压倒任何入侵者，目的是制服而非杀死。如果所有角色的生命值降至0，他们会在靛蓝圣所的左翼内醒来，与芬德林的被绑架受害者一起(见@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu.JournalEntryPage.2Il2XA8eXvcvgMBK]{Sanctum Showdown})。假扮成地精进入餐厅的角色可以进行一次[[/check skill=dec dc=15]]检定，通过成功检定可以悄无声息地通过。

角色可以尝试通过进行一次[[/check skill=itm dc=13]]或[[/check skill=per dc=13]]检定来阻止地精发动攻击。在成功检定后，地精停止战斗但仍对队伍保持警惕。然后地精试图与角色达成协议，允许队伍穿过前哨基地，前提是他们解决困扰前哨基地锻造厅的怪物(@UUID[.3Lh25ULfL7hS93vn]{area Z7})。

Bunks.name: 铺位
Bunks.text:
铺位的门没有锁，半开着。

这个房间里充斥着鼾声。墙边摆放着许多凌乱的铺位，床单皱巴巴的。西墙上的一个黑暗开口揭示了一个空荡荡的竖井，用金属桁架支撑着。

在任何时候，[[/gmr 1d6]] @UUID[Actor.pbsoGoblinPsiBra]{goblin psi brawlers} sleep in the bunks. Characters who enter the room must succeed on a [[/check skill=ste dc=17]] check to avoid waking the goblins.

If awoken, the goblins in the bunks flee and call for help. However, a character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=itm dc=16]] or [[/check skill=per dc=16]] check can convince the goblins to be quiet and not mention the party’s presence to others—on the condition that the characters help the goblins by defeating the monsters in the forge (@UUID[.3Lh25ULfL7hS93vn]{area Z7}).

If asked about Ruxithid, the goblins state that he’s probably in the blue room communing with the mighty gods that gave him and the other psionic goblins their powers. This refers to the Indigo Sanctum, which is across the bridge (@UUID[.wfWOQ2gsNHr8yPSw]{area Z19})。这些地精对于Ruxithid的宏伟计划没有更多的细节。

矿井竖井。 西墙上的缺口通向一个深30英尺的竖井。这个竖井曾经安装了一台魔法升降机，供矮人矿工进入采矿隧道，但是这台升降机已经破损不堪。

检查这台升降机并成功进行一次[[/check skill=inv dc=10]]检定的角色会发现升降机的损坏机制以及它以前的能源：一块晦暗而龟裂的虹彩水晶碎片，偶尔会闪烁出魔法能量。任何精通@Reference[skill=arc]技能的角色都能感知到这块水晶可以通过触摸并消耗1级或更高级的法术位来充能。然后机制可以通过成功的[[/check skill=arc dc=16]]检定来修复；如果角色精通工匠工具，这个检定会获得优势。

一旦修复，升降机会持续地在铺位和采矿隧道之间移动，每个地点停留1分钟。

Latrines.name: 厕所
Latrines.text:
这些厕所散发着恶臭。这里的墙壁上排满了长长的木凳，上面有等距离的洞，通向一个大水沟。房间中央是一个装满浑浊水的长槽。

厕所的废物在这里停滞了。

秘密门。 那些具有[[/check passive=true skill=prc dc=13]]或更高技能的角色会注意到厕所西北角有一个轻微凹陷。按压这个凹陷会揭示出前往前哨隐藏温泉(@UUID[.soL1VmKW4BdlhZ6l]{area Z6})的入口。

Hot Spring.name: 温泉 (Hot Spring)
Hot Spring.text:
这个房间中央是一个装满了绿松石色水的大自然泳池。蒸汽从水面上升起，卷曲着，直至洞穴天花板上的通风口。水面闪烁着一种诱人、宁静的光芒。

这个温泉具有魔法恢复属性，曾被居住在前哨站的古代矮人使用。入口被那些厌恶温泉的探虫人(mind flayers)封印起来，但后来被地精挖掘出来，尽管入口仍然隐藏在@UUID[.eMT7sO1SI8wNSUdC]{area Z5}中。

这个温泉有15英尺深。每隔10分钟，一个生物在温泉中浸泡，就可以恢复[[/damage 1d6 type=healing]]点生命值。

通风口。 距离温泉水面40英尺的山壁上有一个通风口，让蒸汽逃逸。角色可以利用这个通风口作为通往或离开Zorzula’s Rest的替代出口。需要成功进行[[/check skill=ath dc=18]]检定才能向通风口攀爬并进入其中。

Kitchen.name: 厨房
Kitchen.text:
这间厨房的天花板上挂着一些无法辨认的干肉条和草药。一台矮矮的铁炉子站在一旁，里面还余烬燃烧。地板上散落着装满谷物和蔬菜的麻袋。

从角落传来微弱的鼻息声，你看到一只庞大的獾正贪婪地将脸埋进一袋食物中。獾看着你，发出愉快友好的哼声，然后又回到它的食物上。

西侧走廊的窗户可以看到厨房和餐厅，反之亦然。在厨房里嗅探的@UUID[Actor.cJGY1ZywUOo6heNR]{giant badger}是哥布林聚落的非官方宠物。一根脏绳子系着一块粗糙的铭牌，铭牌上用哥布林文写着“贝西”。

贝西有一天从食品储藏室钻进前哨站，从那以后就成为了聚落里的“好姑娘”。她对所有人都友好，喜欢肚子被摸。

Pantry.name: 食品储藏室 (Pantry)
Pantry.text:
哨站的石头地板让位于凉爽、坚实的泥土地面。 桶和箱子挤满了空间，霉味在空气中浓重。 一个小隧道已经被挖穿了储藏室的后面。

这里的大部分食物都又陈旧又被啃食了。

@UUID[Item.pbsoZ9treasure00]{Treasure.} 搜索储藏室并在[[/check skill=inv dc=15]]检定成功的角色会发现两瓶强效治疗药水和一瓶灵能坚韧药水，它们藏在灰尘覆盖的酸葡萄酒瓶后面。

隧道。 在储藏室的后面是贝西獾挖的隧道。 这个隧道通向哨站外部，可以用作另一入口。

中等生物可以在不挤压的情况下爬过这个隧道。

Captain's Suite.name: 船长套房 (D&D)
Captain's Suite.text:
曾经为矿业探险队队长保留的私人卧室，现在作为Ruxithid的个人住所。套房的门被锁上，但角色可以使用盗贼工具尝试撬锁，成功进行一次[[/check ability=dex dc=15]]检定。另外，角色也可以用成功的[[/check skill=ath dc=15]]检定来强行打开门。@UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid}, found in the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu]{Indigo Sanctum} later in this chapter, has a key. The goblin leader doesn’t allow any others access to this room.

These personal quarters contain a large, plush, four-poster bed covered in silk sheets. Stone shelves bearing books and ornamental ceramic jars line the walls alongside dust-covered banners embroidered with Dwarven runes. In one corner stands an elegant mahogany desk, on top of which is a map and several crumpled notes.

The map on the desk is a copy of @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O]{the map}在Ruxithid的作战室中发现(见@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu.JournalEntryPage.2Il2XA8eXvcvgMBK]{Sanctum Showdown}), but it’s missing the location labels. While inspecting the room, characters who have a [[/check passive=true skill=prc dc=15]] or higher also notice a faint murmuring coming from one of the ceramic jars—a smooth, onyx-black jar with geometric engravings inlaid with blue gemstones—displayed in the bookcase.

Murmuring Jar. The murmuring jar is actually a canopic jar that holds the soul of a neutral duergar named @UUID[Actor.pbsoHjoldakHollo]{Hjoldak Hollowhelm}, the last mining captain of Zorzula’s Rest. Hjoldak’s soul was imprisoned in the jar by the mind flayers when they overtook the outpost; he has remained trapped in the jar ever since.

Hjoldak can see normally while trapped in the jar and can still speak, though his voice comes out no louder than a whisper. Upon seeing the characters enter the room, he attempts to grab their attention (he has been attempting to get Ruxithid’s attention for years now, to no avail). If the characters stop to listen to him, he desperately explains his plight and asks the characters to free him. He also claims to know the goblins’ plan and offers to aid the characters. However, a character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=ins dc=13]] check intuits that while his offer of help is earnest, Hjoldak knows less than he claims. @Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.ZcNb6E3OZNYDhNgO caption=false classes="right three"]

The jar is sealed with an intricate puzzle lock, requiring the body and lid of the jar to be moved at the exact right place and angle to open. A character can open the lock by succeeding on a [[/check skill=inv dc=15]] check. Characters can also attempt to break the jar open by making a [[/check skill=ath dc=20]] check, smashing the jar on a success. Once freed, @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.ZcNb6E3OZNYDhNgO]{Hjoldak’s soul manifests})，作为一个和平的感念灰影。

霍尔达克的帮助。 霍尔达克熟悉前哨站的布局，包括隐藏的房间。如果被释放，他会乐意为角色们充当向导。霍尔达克还知道如何修理复杂中的电梯、斗式输送机和矿车。

如果询问关于Ruxithid和地精的事情，霍尔达克承认自己对他们的计划了解不多。他解释说，Ruxithid在这个房间的逗留变得越来越少。每当Ruxithid来的时候，地精总是看起来心不在焉，翻阅着一些纸屑，然后匆匆离开。霍尔达克推测，地精领袖一定在前哨站更深处策划或工作。

@UUID[Item.pbsoZ10treasure0]{Treasure.} The room has two hidden stashes of treasure: a smaller compartment in the bed frame, and a larger vault. Hjoldak knows the location of both stashes as well as how to open them.

The bed frame’s compartment was used to store weapons and other means of defense in case of an emergency. A character must succeed on a [[/check skill=inv dc=20]] check to find the outline of the bed frame’s compartment. Pushing the compartment’s panel opens it; inside is a dagger of venom and an emerald elemental gem.

Secret Door. Any character who examines the north wall and succeeds on a [[/check skill=prc dc=16]] check notices a small section of wall engraved with four Dwarvish runes. The runes are (from left to right) “storm,” “death,” “light,” and “wind.” These runes are the key to opening the room’s hidden vault (@UUID[.ls5Fy1FPnhevEl95]{area Z11}).

The runes must be tapped in the correct order to open the vault. The correct order is the same as the runes’ order on the wall, from left to right: storm, death, light, and wind. If a creature taps the runes in the wrong order, the vault’s trap triggers, and the creature must make a [[/save ability=dex dc=15]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes damage that varies depending on the last rune the creature tapped:

Death. [[/damage 3d8 type=necrotic]] damage

Light. [[/damage 3d8 type=radiant]] damage

Storm. [[/damage 3d8 type=lightning]] damage

Wind. [[/damage 3d8 type=force]] damage

Once the correct sequence has been tapped, the secret door in the wall opens, revealing @UUID[.ls5Fy1FPnhevEl95]{area Z11.}

。

Vault.name: 金库
Vault.text:
这个地窖里的陈旧空气表明已经很多年没有打开过。里面是一堆积满灰尘的硬币、宝石和布料。

@UUID[Item.pbsoZ11vault0000]{Treasure.} 地窖里装满了古老的矮人硬币——56枚白银币，350枚金币，189枚银币和304枚铜币，还有价值100金币的四块翡翠和价值500金币的一块大孔雀石。此外，整齐地叠放在墙边的还有三幅灰尘覆盖的富丽堂皇的矮人挂毯，每幅价值75金币，以及一块价值145金币的天鹅绒锦缎。

Mining Tunnels Entrance.name: 采矿隧道入口 (D&D)
Mining Tunnels Entrance.text:
这个由泥土和石头构成的小房间有三个入口，分别通向东北、东和东南的隧道。一条通道通往上层。

矿井的竖井长30英尺，通向前哨站的铺位(@UUID[.YAvUm3wSEL0e9Ahp]{area Z4})。如果角色们修好了铺位里的升降机，他们可以使用它到达前哨站的层级。

Mine Cart Maintenance Chamber.name: 矿车维护室(Mine Cart Maintenance Chamber)
Mine Cart Maintenance Chamber.text:
一条摇摇欲坠的轨道贯穿了这个洞穴。半打生锈的矿车停放在轨道上，车轮弯曲，车厢上布满蛛网。地面上散落着古老的废物，洞穴墙壁上摆满了灰尘覆盖的工具箱。靠在这些工具箱旁边的是三具骷髅，它们的头骨被砸碎了。

这些骨骸是三名灰矮人的遗骸，是久远前邪恶智者入侵的可怕遗物。一名角色研究这些尸体并在[[/check skill=arc dc=16]]或[[/check skill=med dc=16]]检定成功后，意识到被粉碎的头骨暗示着摄心者进行了脑部提取。

矿车。 这些矿车已经破损，沿着轨道发出吱吱作响的声音。每辆矿车都是自行推动的。一名角色检查这些矿车并在[[/check skill=inv dc=10]]检定成功后，会发现矿车的主要推进机制：同样的虹彩晶体材料制成的暗淡碎片，这种晶体材料被用来给@UUID[.YAvUm3wSEL0e9Ahp]{area Z4} and the bucket conveyor in @UUID[.3Lh25ULfL7hS93vn]{area Z7}. Any character proficient in the @Reference[skill=arc]{Arcana}中的电梯提供动力。具备技能的角色可以通过触摸晶体并消耗1级或更高级的法术位来重新充能晶体。

一旦矿车被充能，角色可以拉动轨道开关，将修复好的矿车转移到主轨道上。主轨道呈圆形，经过储藏室(@UUID[.xc8QtXYkMu6R60NN]{area Z18}), the strip mine (@UUID[.sgJIR4dO5MSTyYri]{area Z15}), and the crystal cavern (@UUID[.QgnqiIEHgWkYkBHX]{area Z14})。

宝藏。 地精已经掠夺了骷髅的钱袋。然而，一名检定成功[[/check skill=inv dc=15]]的角色可以从灰矮人身上找到一对布满蛛网的@UUID[Item.pbsoCeleritybrac]{bracers of celerity}。

Crystal Cavern.name: 水晶洞穴 (Crystal Cavern)
Crystal Cavern.text:
隧道通向一个高二十英尺的圆柱形大厅。洞穴看起来像一个洞穴内部，墙壁上长满了闪烁发光的晶体。一条矿车轨道蜿蜒绕过洞穴，然后深入山脉。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.p1nDfJ2Hhh5XvlbZ classes="left three"]

三辆@UUID[Actor.tFJX45zj3QDc3Zli]{gricks} hide among the rocks and crystals, waiting to ambush potential prey.

The first time the characters enter this cavern, every character must make a [[/check skill=prc dc=16]]. On a failed check, a character is @Reference[condition=surprised] by the gricks as the creatures attack.

Crystals. The iridescent crystal spires that cover the cavern spark with magical energy. The crystals can be harvested to power various machinery in the outpost, such as the lift in @UUID[.YAvUm3wSEL0e9Ahp]{area Z4}, the bucket conveyor in @UUID[.3Lh25ULfL7hS93vn]{area Z7}，和矿车在@UUID[.ppwTmRL3QriqYmwU]{area Z13.}

Characters can attempt to mine the crystal spires that line the walls. Each crystal spire has AC 15, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. When a character deals damage to a spire, the character must succeed on a [[/save ability=dex dc=16]] saving throw or take [[/damage 2d4 type=force]] damage, as the crystals’ magical energy lashes back at the character.

Once a spire has been reduced to 0 hit points, it shatters into [[/r 1d6#Salvageable shards]] salvageable shards. @UUID[Item.pbsoEnergizedSha]{Each shard} can be used as a spellcasting focus, and these shards can be used to replace the drained shards of the elevator, bucket conveyor, and mine carts in lieu of recharging them with spell slots. The shards are worth 15 gp each to a spellcaster.

Mine Carts. The mine cart track runs through the crystal cavern, entering from the cliff mine (@UUID[.sgJIR4dO5MSTyYri]{area Z15})之前螺旋式向下穿过洞穴。当矿车进入洞穴时，它们会减速但不会完全停下，这样可以安全地装载材料。

Cliff Strip Mine.name: 悬崖露天矿 (Cliff Strip Mine)
Cliff Strip Mine.text:
三层木脚手架沿着这个三十英尺高的黑石崖。在最底层的脚手架上，有六个人物在岩石表面挖掘。沿着悬崖的长度有一套高架的破旧矿车轨道。

Three @UUID[Actor.pbsoFeralAshenwi]{feral ashenwights} and three @UUID[Actor.pbsoPsionicAshen]{psionic ashenwights} occupy the cliff’s lowest scaffolding. They mimic the mining they did in life, clawing at the rock in search of precious material.

Fixated on the rock wall, the feral ashenwights become hostile toward anyone who attacks them. The psionic ashenwights are aware of their surroundings and have seen Ruxithid and his entourage pass through the mine numerous times. A character can convince the psionic ashenwights to divulge where Ruxithid went by succeeding on a [[/check skill=per dc=15]] check or by offering coins or gems worth at least 50 gp total. The psionic ashenwights direct the characters to the sanctum crossing (@UUID[.wfWOQ2gsNHr8yPSw]{area Z19}).

矿车。 矿车沿着位于上层脚手架顶部的轨道行驶。

Cesspit.name: 污水坑 (Cesspit)
Cesspit.text:
刺鼻的污水气味袭击着你的感官。隧道口展现出一个被污水淹没的洞穴。滴水的钟乳石部分遮挡了一团黑色外骨骼和半透明苍白皮肤的庞大物体，它贪婪地舔食着污水。

这个生物是潘德林中的@UUID[Actor.pbsoOtyughMutate]{otyugh mutate}. Long ago, duergar miners captured and brought several otyughs from the Underdark to serve as a convenient way to dispose of the outpost’s waste. The otyughs survived the mind flayers’ attack, continuing to feast on the remains and waste of the illithids’ prisoners; however, the aberrant energy exuded by the mind flayers warped the otyughs and their descendants. Now this mutated otyugh gorges itself on the goblin enclave’s sewage.

A character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=arc dc=15]] check recognizes the creature’s den habits and diet as those of an @UUID[Actor.jcZblJ6lqtW0ePxe]{otyugh}, though its physical appearance is radically altered. Any character who encountered the otyugh beneath @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoStolenShards.JournalEntryPage.SoB2IIxWvI482i6W]{Barthen's well}，在进行这次检定时获得优势。

希望避开乌食变异兽注意的角色必须成功通过一次[[/check skill=ste dc=12]]检定。如果乌食变异兽注意到了其巢穴中的入侵者，它会变得敌对并发动攻击。

宝藏。 乌食变异兽半透明的皮肤让人可以看到它的胃部。具有[[/check passive=true skill=prc dc=14]]或更高技能的角色会注意到在它的肚子里闪烁的乳白色金属光芒；这是一件@UUID[Item.l2T46xCqUbJvKE7A]{luminous war pick}，乌食变异兽在啃食哥布林尸体时意外吞下的。一旦乌食变异兽被杀死，这件魔法物品可以轻松地从它的身体中取出。

Shrine to Ilsensine.name: 伊尔森辛神龛 (Ilsensine).
Shrine to Ilsensine.text:
这个稀疏的洞穴里有一个英勇的矮人雕像，穿着典礼盔甲，但纪念碑已经被打碎成大块。雕像的被斩断的头部躺在地板上。雕像底座上刻着一个奇怪的符号。一些奇怪、黑暗、滴落的液体污损了图像。

成功通过一次[[/check skill=rel dc=17]]检定的角色会认出这座被亵渎的神龛的图像是伊利森恩(Ilsensine)的，他是邪恶食脑怪帝国的主保神。这座神龛建在一个破碎的杜尔加雕像之上，最近有人亵渎了它。

在鲁克西西德(Ruxithid)掌权后，一群地精发现了这座神龛并摧毁了它。如果询问其中任何一个地精为什么摧毁了神龛，他们会坚决声称他们憎恶这座神龛的存在，但他们无法进一步解释。(他们并不知道，摧毁这座神龛的冲动源自鲁克西西德与伊尔瓦什（Ilvaash)的联系，后者是一个鄙视伊利森恩的法域神灵。）

邪恶能量。 这座纪念碑现在充满了邪恶的法域能量。当角色第一次触摸或检查神龛时，角色必须进行一次[[/save ability=cha dc=20]]豁免检定。未通过检定的角色会受到剧烈的头痛困扰，每当角色闭上或睁开眼睛时，他们会短暂地看到阴影般的外星触须在视野边缘蠕动。此外，角色对精神伤害具有脆弱性。这种效果会持续，直到被法术或魔法效果结束，比如在废墟中留下的@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse}.

Treasure. A character who interacts with the shrine and succeeds on a [[/check skill=inv dc=15]] check finds a @UUID[Item.dGnkwePemh7ovuDv]{ring of mind shielding}，在食脑怪统治时期作为对伊利森恩的供奉。

Storage Chamber.name: 存储室 (Storage Chamber)
Storage Chamber.text:
这个房间堆满了板条箱。一些被灰尘覆盖的油布勉强掩盖了里面的矿石，而另一些则被钉死。从洞穴地板到天花板附近的洞口传来金属的吱吱声。一套矿车轨道穿过了洞穴的西北端。

一把巨大的圆锥形铁钻，内部熊熊燃烧着炽热的红色火焰，发出尖锐的尖叫声，向你冲来。

铁钻是@UUID[Actor.pbsoFiendishAuge]{fiendish auger}, a remnant of the ancient duergar mining operation. It attacks the characters who enter the chamber.

Treasure. In total, the various open crates around the chamber hold 30 pounds of unrefined @UUID[Item.pkpkvyW31ZIx4pvC]{iron ore.} Characters can take this ore to the smith in Phandalin, who can refine the ore into seven iron ingots worth 25 gp each.

Additionally, three smaller, @UUID[Item.pbsoStorageCrate]{sealed crates}的一部分，分布在这个房间周围。每个板条箱可以用成功的[[/check skill=ath dc=12]]检定打开。这些板条箱包含以下物品：

  • 一块透明的浅蓝色水晶碎片，带有靛蓝色光芒(光明宝石)
  • 四块价值30金币的大块蓝色石英
  • 一颗价值250金币的拳头大小紫水晶

桶式输送机。 如果角色修复了熔炉中的桶式输送系统(@UUID[.3Lh25ULfL7hS93vn]{area Z7})，他们可以使用桶来在采矿层和前哨站层之间移动。试图乘坐桶的角色必须成功进行[[/check skill=acr dc=15]]检定，否则会摔落到地板上，受到[[/damage 1d6 type=bludgeoning]]伤害。

矿车。 矿车轨道穿过储存室。矿车进入储存室时会自动减速，但不会完全停下，这样可以安全地装载材料。

Sanctum Crossing.name: 圣所十字路口
Sanctum Crossing.text:
翻滚的熔岩下面弥漫着浓烈的热浪，石桥的尽头是一座黑曜石金字塔。金字塔的表面雕刻着古代矮人们的盛宴、庆祝和照料受伤者的浮雕。金字塔的顶点雕刻着银色镶嵌的复杂几何图案。金字塔前面有一扇凹陷的双门。门面装饰着符文和微弱发出绿色能量的圆形通道。

圣所入口前的桥和台阶都高出熔岩20英尺。

圣所之门。 通往圣所电梯的门被封闭。门上的圆形雕刻形成了一个只能用灵能能量打开的魔法锁。研究这扇门并在[[/check skill=arc dc=15]]检定成功的角色可以辨别出门锁的性质；如果一个角色能够阅读矮人文，那么这个角色在检定时具有优势，因为门上的魔法符文是矮人起源的。

这个锁是一个小型魔法物品，具有AC 12，30生命值，对所有伤害免疫，除了精神伤害。随着对锁的伤害，雕刻上发光的绿色能量逐渐变亮。当锁减至0生命值时，通往圣所的门会滑开。锁和门会保持开启状态10分钟，之后它们会再次封闭。

如果角色无法对锁造成精神伤害，他们可以尝试说服一个哥布林灵能格斗者或哥布林灵能指挥官这样做，通过成功进行[[/check skill=itm dc=12]]或[[/check skill=per dc=12]]检定(或者他们可以贿赂或&Reference[condition=charmed]{charm}这些哥布林)。他们也可以使用盗贼工具进行成功的[[/check ability=dex tool=thief dc=18]]检定来打开锁。

锁和门可以很容易地从内部打开。门通往一个直径15英尺的圆形石台，自动在圣所过道和圣所之间移动。该平台不断上升和下降，每个位置停留1分钟。平台需要30秒的时间在过道和@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu.JournalEntryPage.kOMpOyy4aLKh9yhX]{sanctum interior}之间的30英尺垂直距离上移动。

Overlook Forge.name: 俯瞰熔炉 (Overlook Forge)
Overlook Forge.text:
萨普利(goblins)地精已经用障碍物封锁了锻造厅的入口，因为他们害怕潜伏在那里的怪物。具有[[/check passive=true skill=prc dc=12]]或更高技能的角色听到了门外传来的低沉呻吟声和脚步声。

角色必须成功进行[[/check skill=ath dc=12]]检定才能移除障碍物。三个人物是@UUID[Actor.pbsoFeralAshenwi]{feral ashenwights}, undead spirits who perished in the mind flayers’ takeover. The ashenwights are hostile and attack immediately.

Floor-to-ceiling glass windows overlook a churning lava sea. Three large, blackened anvils stand in a row, and unfinished pieces of weaponry and armor litter the room. Above, a stationary conveyor of buckets casts ominous shadows across the forge floor.

Standing at each of the anvils is what appears to be an ashen husk of a gray-skinned dwarf. All three pantomime metalwork in eerie synchronization. As they turn toward you, they brandish sharp chunks of black rock. With gasping, angry cries, the figures surge forward.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoArtHandouts0.JournalEntryPage.INJ7clXxlhDsnolP]

Bucket Conveyor. The buckets hanging from the forge’s ceiling are part of a conveyor system built to transfer ore to the forge from the mining tunnels below. The conveyor system is currently broken.

A character who inspects the area and succeeds on a [[/check skill=inv dc=10]] check uncovers the conveyor system’s broken mechanisms as well as its dull power crystal. This crystal is the same kind as the one in @UUID[.YAvUm3wSEL0e9Ahp]{area Z4}, and it and the broken mechanisms can be repaired in the same ways. Any character proficient in the @Reference[skill=arc]{Arcana}技能的人可以感知到，通过触摸水晶并消耗1级或更高级别的法术位，可以重新充能水晶。

一旦充能，这些桶会在锻造厅和采矿隧道的储存室之间持续移动(@UUID[.xc8QtXYkMu6R60NN]{area Z18}). A character attempting to climb up and ride the moving buckets must succeed on a [[/check skill=acr dc=15]] check or fall 20 feet to forge’s floor, taking [[/damage 2d6 type=bludgeoning]] bludgeoning damage. The forge has a tall stepladder used to access the buckets’ contents.

Treasure. Numerous weapons and armor pieces are scattered about the forge. A character who succeeds on a [[/check skill=inv dc=13]] check finds one of the following items. If the check succeeds by 3 or more, the character finds two items, instead of one. You can choose which item a character finds:

A @UUID[Item.10ZP2Bu3vnCuYMIB]{longsword} decorated with shimmering filigree, worth 200 gp

A bronze @UUID[Item.SK2HATQ4abKUlV8i]{breastplate}镶嵌着石英，价值500 gp

一个镀金的@UUID[Item.LEC1wkaAUnWzDPDD]{javelin of lightning}

一套精致的银质@UUID[Item.ZYEqOSY9BLZs2GPx]{bracers of archery}

。

Features of Zorzula's Rest.name: 佐祖拉之息 (Zorzula's Rest) 的特点。
Features of Zorzula's Rest.text:
Zorzula’s Rest有以下值得注意的特点。

硫磺熔岩

前哨站建在硫磺熔岩泉之上。硫磺使熔岩呈现蓝紫色，并充斥着有毒气味。在该区域呼吸这些气味的生物必须通过一次[[/save ability=con dc=10]]豁免检定，否则会获得&Reference[condition=poisoned]状态，持续1小时。对毒性伤害具有抗性或免疫力的生物会自动通过这次豁免检定。通过这次豁免检定的生物对该区域有毒气味的效果免疫，持续24小时。所有居住在Zorzula’s Rest的生物对这些气味免疫。

墙壁和地板

前哨站的墙壁和地板由灰色火成岩石制成。采矿隧道穿过紧实的土壤和岩石沉积物。

天花板

除非另有说明，房间的天花板高15英尺，拱形，隧道的天花板高10英尺，平坦。

照明

几何槽刻在前哨站的天花板和墙壁上。这些槽允许熔岩流过并用微弱的蓝光照亮前哨站的内部。采矿隧道通常很暗，除非另有说明。

无数隧道！

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.1CNZNquBvPx2Zj6p]{DM version of Zorzula's Rest}及其相应的位置描述详细介绍了采矿隧道的主要区域。然而，一些较小的分支隧道从这些区域分叉出来。这些隧道曾经被古老的杜尔加矿工使用，但现在已经废弃。

这些分支隧道的内容对于冒险的主要部分并不重要。如果角色想要探索这些区域，可以随意在这些额外的隧道中放置任何您认为合适的宝藏或怪物。

Zorzula's Rest Locations.name: 佐祖拉的休息地点
Zorzula's Rest Locations.text:
以下位置与@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p5000000]{Zorzula's Rest} 场景相关联。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh5atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.1CNZNquBvPx2Zj6p caption=false]

Zorzula's Rest.name: 佐祖拉之息(Zorzula's Rest)
Zorzula's Rest.text:
查看更多关于@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest} is an ancient duergar mining outpost located in one of the Sword Mountains east of Phandalin. The meaning of its name has been lost to time, though some history books mention a powerful duergar leader named Zorzula, who commanded mining operations throughout the Sword Mountains. However, duergar control of the outpost ceased centuries ago when Zorzula’s Rest was overtaken by mind flayers.

After conquering the outpost, the illithids reigned over the area for decades, even at one point housing an elder brain within the outpost’s underground sanctum. Eventually, the mind flayer colony also abandoned the outpost when their underground empire fell, but echoes of their presence still cling there.

Zorzula’s Rest is still the home of an enclave of secretive goblins who call themselves the Sawplees. These goblins have inhabited the outpost for generations, with some of their number displaying psionic abilities that trace to the aberrant influence of the mind flayers who also once lived there. Only recently have the goblins ventured beyond the outpost and ransacked nearby areas.

This effort is helmed by a goblin named @UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid the Chosen}, who receives orders telepathically using a special crystal from his “mighty gods”—actually the group of mind flayers at the heart of this adventure. (See @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu]{Indigo Sanctum}的信息。Ruxithid错误地认为这些具体的掌脑者是哥布林心灵能力的源头，并且他相信这些“神灵”会因为他的顺从而慷慨奖赏他。

除了取回尼瑟尔方尖碑碎片外，Ruxithid和他的哥布林们还被要求以芬德林镇的市民作为祭品来供奉他们的神灵。一些被绑架的受害者被关押在地下世界的更深处(见后面的章节)，尽管有一些被囚禁在前哨基地的深处。

接近前哨基地

激活佐祖拉之息场景

无论玩家如何接近，你都可以激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap5p5000000]{Zorzula's Rest} Scene.

Once the characters learn the location of Zorzula’s Rest from @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.rdOrCDjNChbNNj01#uncovering-the-clues]{Gwyn Oresong}, the journey to the outpost is easy. Zorzula’s Rest is a day’s travel from Phandalin. When the characters near the outpost, read or paraphrase the following:

Slowly, the mountainous terrain begins to change. Gray gravel darkens to ash-black, and shrubbery becomes dry and sparse. Instead of the brisk cold of most mountain peaks, the air starts to warm.

Ahead of you rises a tall cliff face, in which is set a pair of forbidding obsidian doors: the entrance to Zorzula’s Rest.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest}，它位于巨大的山脉内。佐祖拉之息有三个潜在的入口：前门(@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest.JournalEntryPage.uAw6Xpg6snXyCP02]{Z1}), the hot spring vent (@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest.JournalEntryPage.soL1VmKW4BdlhZ6l]{Z6}), or the pantry tunnel (@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest.JournalEntryPage.qApPuhHuLikYKhVT]{Z9})。角色可以通过侦察该区域并成功进行[[/check skill=prc dc=16]]检定来发现泉水通风口和食品储藏室隧道。角色也可能通过在芬德林的调查中了解到食品储藏室入口。

.

The Shattered Obelisk.name: 破碎的方尖碑 (The Shattered Obelisk)
破碎的方尖碑 (The Shattered Obelisk)
The Shattered Obelisk.text:
角色们已经打败了@UUID[Actor.pbsoRuxithidTheC]{Ruxithid}, the Sawplee goblin leader who collected fragments of a Netherese obelisk. However, an unsettling truth has emerged: Ruxithid acted at the behest of much more powerful overlords who want the obelisk pieces to impose some terrible fate upon the town.

The characters discovered Ruxithid’s map, which shows the locations of the remaining obelisk pieces. (You should feel free to distribute @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O]{the map} to your players as a handout.) Further, some townspeople are still missing and could be captives at one of these locations. To save @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin}及其失踪的居民，角色们必须在霸主们之前收集剩余的方尖碑碎片。在前进的过程中，英雄们会了解更多关于笼罩在芬德林上空的阴影威胁。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.oOcmv67blI8ocmbz]

进行本章

本章以城镇中的一些英雄壮举为开端，但重点是三个独立的地下城：@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth}, the haunted @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6crypttalh]{Crypt of the Talhund}, and the subterranean @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing}的废弃神庙。每个地下城的位置都粗略标记在@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O]{map} that the characters found at the end of the previous chapter. @UUID[Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{Gwyn Oresong} tells the characters more about these locations in the @UUID[.gATX1uMnwVCQ995K]{Return to Phandalin}部分。角色们无法进入地下墓穴，除非他们通过塔尔亨德雷斯，但他们可以在探索神庙和地下墓穴之前或之后接近吉贝特十字路口。

角色进阶

当本章开始时，角色们应该是7级。在本章中，角色们可以晋升到9级，不再往上。进阶处理如下：

  • 角色们在塔尔亨德雷斯或吉贝特十字路口面对碎片守护者后晋升一级。
  • 角色们在本章中克服所有三个方尖碑碎片的守护者后晋升一级。

The Sinister Truth.name: 邪恶真相
The Sinister Truth.text:
索普利哥布林间接为三个@UUID[Actor.pbsoMindFlayer00]{mind flayers} that draw power from a malevolent Far Realm godlet named @UUID[Actor.pbsoIlvaash00000]{Ilvaash}. Using their godlet as a warped sort of elder brain, these mind flayers are even more alien than others of their kind. (For more information, see @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter70000]{chapter 7}效劳。

芬德林周围的探索者活动并不新鲜；几个世纪前，正如@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula's Rest}, mind flayers swept through the Underdark beneath and around Phandalin, consuming or destroying all in their path. That illithid empire eventually fell, but the mind flayer threat never entirely subsided. Now, mind flayers pose more of a threat to Phandalin than ever before.

The Ritual

The mind flayers seek to enact a dreadful ritual that will transform the entire population of Phandalin into mind flayers.

As if that brutal process weren’t terrifying enough, the ritual would work from a significant distance—even from the Far Realm itself, as described in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter80000.JournalEntryPage.tob7ZcaOZWhU0Zd2]{chapter 8}—and would affect individuals on a large scale. However, the fanatics learned from Ilvaash that transforming beings into mind flayers from afar requires a powerful source of magic.

After much communing and research, the mind flayer fanatics determined that the Netherese obelisk can power their ritual. Long ago, this obelisk was broken into fragments that are now scattered around the region. The mind flayer fanatics need to collect these fragments and rebuild the obelisk as completely as possible so the ancient object can power their ritual.

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O caption=false classes="right two"]

The Map

The characters learned in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter50000.JournalEntryPage.gdg1shUmjEkIwUyZ]{chapter 5}所证明的那样，索普利哥布林收集了芬德林周围四块方尖碑碎片。现在，探索者狂热者拥有这些碎片，但他们需要尽可能多的方尖碑碎片来确保他们的仪式成功。

索普利哥布林的地图揭示了另外三个碎片的位置：一个被称为@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth}, the crypt beneath it, and a subterranean trading nexus called @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing}. These locations are in the Starmetal Hills, several days northeast of Phandalin.

In the previous chapter, a loyal grimlock servant of @UUID[Actor.pbsoQunbraxel000]{Qunbraxel}的废弃矮人神庙（探索者狂热者的盟友，被描述为@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro.JournalEntryPage.dfHMaTHPuk5jbOBO]{later in this adventure}) traveled to @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula’s Rest} to retrieve the shards before the adventurers arrived to confront the goblins.

In this chapter, the characters might prevent the mind flayers from acquiring the other three fragments. The fanatics can proceed with the fragments they have, but the more obelisk pieces the mind flayers acquire, the more difficult it will be to stop their ritual. The characters must race against the clock to keep the mind flayers and their lackeys from recovering more of the shattered obelisk.

Kidnapped Townspeople

If stopping the threat against Phandalin isn’t enough motivation for the characters, concern about the still-missing townspeople should prompt them to follow the previous chapter’s clues. The characters rescued some kidnapped townspeople in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIndigoSanctu.JournalEntryPage.2Il2XA8eXvcvgMBK#a-disturbing-truth-revealed]{chapter 5}，但仍有十一个人失踪，哥布林地图上的位置是关于这些受害者可能所在的唯一线索。角色们在本章中找不到这些受害者，但他们会在冒险中的后续部分找到他们。

除了下面列出的个人外，根据您的判断，其他镇民可能仍然失踪。考虑将其他仍然失踪的镇民标识为角色熟悉的个人。@UUID[Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{Gwyn}, Grista, @UUID[Actor.pbsoSisterGarael]{Sister Garaele}, Ander, and Halia haven’t been kidnapped, but anyone else the characters might have come across in Phandalin might be victims.

Missing Individuals

The following people are still missing. These NPCs use the @UUID[Actor.SqZRuJ8lt2KGJBbq]{commoner}属性块。您可以随意添加更多芬德林镇民到失踪人员名单中。

方尖碑碎片

在本章的三个地牢中，角色们可以找到一个@UUID[Item.pbsoObeliskFragm]{obelisk fragment.}。这些碎片比芬德林的碎片要大，重50磅，边长超过一英尺。这些碎片被超自然地硬化，无法被角色们现有的任何手段破坏。

Return to Phandalin.name: 返回费兰德林 (Phandalin)。
Return to Phandalin.text:
在角色前往任何地牢之前，他们应该返回@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin} from @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoZorzulasRest]{Zorzula's Rest}. If they don’t immediately seek her out, the dwarven sage @UUID[Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{Gwyn Oresong}邀请角色加入她在石山小店的聚会。

Gwyn安排了食物和饮料。在用餐过程中，她询问角色们最近的冒险经历以及他们接下来可能去哪里。与吉贝特十字路口相比，索普利地精的@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O]{map} surprises her. She asks to look at it and then says the following:

“These old names have sad stories. Talhund means ‘hidden gifts.’ It relates to priests of Dumathoin, the dwarven god of secrets, mining, and gemstones.

“Talhundereth was a great temple to Dumathoin, and many important priests were laid to rest in the Crypt of the Talhund beneath it. Academics postulate that the crypt’s entrance was protected by a great seal or doorway and that only Dumathoin’s priests would know the secret to unlock it.”

Examining the map further, Gwyn points at @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing} and continues:

“Gibbet Crossing is near the temple, but it’s much deeper underground. It was a trading hub that grew where wide tunnels met. They say that deep gnomes, drow, and duergar once worked together there.

“They’re all gone now. History tells us that mind flayers surged through the Underdark centuries ago like a terrible tide, consuming or oppressing everyone they came across. Gibbet Crossing fell. Talhundereth fell. Legends say that the mind flayers even breached the Crypt of the Talhund.

“The mind flayers soon abandoned these sites, and all three locations have since fallen to ruin. Only monsters and ghosts remain. Sometimes, followers of Dumathoin attempt to reclaim forgotten treasures or purify the despoiled sites. None have returned.”

Gwyn believes that answers about the goblins’ mysterious overlords must exist in these dangerous places. She urges caution and suggests that @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth}可能是一个更好的起点，因为她对塔尔亨德雷斯了解更多。吉贝特十字路口更为遥远，其危险未知。最终，角色们可以选择自己的行动方向。

What's Next.name: 接下来
What's Next.text:
@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.gbAQ3KwJT6QHxUai classes="left three"]

在最理想的情况下，角色们找回了所有三块方尖碑碎片，并让星陨山脉中的危险得以平息。

然而，角色们仍有线索可以追踪。角色们还没有找到更多失踪的镇民。也许更令人担忧的是，他们了解到更深处地下有一群称为@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh7illithino]{Illithinoch}的触须怪狂热者，角色们现在知道如何前往那里。

无论如何，角色们的下一步是返回@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinVil]{Phandalin}休息，并了解有关触须怪狂热者的情报。

Quests and Locations.name: 任务与地点
Quests and Locations.text:
芬德林任务

在他们离开之前，角色们有更多机会帮助芬德林的居民，同时也可以获得一个行动基地，并了解更多关于对镇上威胁的信息，方法是完成以下任务。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinMis.JournalEntryPage.cR9C77zuXXprs5Id]{Pip's Adventure}

This side mission can provide the characters with a base of operations for the rest of this chapter and can easily start at the end of the characters’ @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoChapter60000.JournalEntryPage.gATX1uMnwVCQ995K]{meeting} with Gwyn Oresong at Stonehill Inn.

The Stonehills’ ten-year-old son, Pip, hasn’t returned from playing in the fields southeast of town. Toblen or Trilena Stonehill asks the characters to search the field and bring Pip home.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinMis.JournalEntryPage.7IwLrBRxEkNAKqFZ]{The Odd Cow}

芬德林的人民并不是唯一受到远境恶劣影响的人。黛西是一头从芬德林北部老纳斯农场逃脱的牛，吃了一些生长在异能哥布林休息地的三叶草，这些三叶草被一块方尖碑停留过的异能哥布林感染了。这些三叶草使黛西感染了一种令人不安的疾病。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoPhandalinMis.JournalEntryPage.vC7uBH3pMFNeinSD]{Missing Miners}

Halia Thornton at the Miner’s Exchange needs to find some missing miners. She first approaches any character she recruited into the Zhentarim, but she needs the job done regardless.

Following the Map

The locations of each dungeon are crudely marked on the @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.fbw2MMGCPtGglt8O]{map} that the characters found at the end of the previous chapter. The characters can’t enter the crypt without passing through Talhundereth, but they might approach Gibbet Crossing before or after they explore the temple and crypt.

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth}

塔尔亨德雷斯是杜玛索因的地下神庙，是埋藏秘密的矮人神。数千年前，塔尔亨德雷斯是一个充满活力和人口众多的神庙，许多杜玛索因的信徒前来朝拜。塔尔亨德雷斯建在塔尔亨德的神圣陵墓上，那里安葬着最虔诚的杜玛索因神职人员。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6crypttalh]{Crypt of the Talhund}

塔尔亨德雷斯下方建造的塔尔亨德陵墓是杜玛索因神职人员(被称为塔尔亨德)的安息之地。很久以前袭击塔尔亨德雷斯的控脑食人魔也掠夺了陵墓，他们在这个神圣地方留下的精神污染至今仍然存在。

@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing}

吉贝特十字路口是一个荒凉的地方。曾经是地下世界的十字路口，黑暗精灵、灰矮人和地底侏儒社区曾在这里不安地生活。灰矮人有一个赚钱的生意，制作可折叠的笼子(他们精心制作的吊笼给这个十字路口起了名字)，而灰矮人依赖地底侏儒提供的秘银。黑暗精灵为灰矮人提供安全，以换取包含在地底侏儒贸易合同中，同时黑暗精灵还为灰矮人商品谈判公平价格。三个团体之间的紧张关系一直存在。很久以前，当控脑食人魔袭击这个地区时，这些团体没有一起战斗，最终分别被消灭。

Crypt of the Talhund.name: 塔尔亨德之墓 (Crypt of the Talhund)

Crypt Features.name: 地下墓穴特征 (Crypt Features)
Crypt Features.text:
一旦角色们解决了塔尔亨德雷斯的地下墓穴入口(@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder.JournalEntryPage.lQZP3D8OUKzZbUJ6]{area T20})中的谜题，他们可以随时进入这个建筑物。以下特征在塔尔亨德地下墓穴中普遍存在。

矮人制造

这个地下墓穴是坚固的矮人建筑。尽管经历了千年的荒废，其石头仍然坚固。矮人牧师的雕刻很常见，山峰和多面宝石的雕刻也很常见。微妙的魔法使宝石的雕刻闪闪发光，就像真正的宝石一样。

黑暗

这个地下墓穴没有照明，其居民依赖于黑暗视觉来看清楚。区域描述假设角色们有光源或其他在黑暗中看清的方法。

门

整个神殿的门由厚度为2英寸的石板制成，门上有简单的把手，距离地面几英尺。它们在古老的铰链上轻松打开和关闭。门和秘密门除非另有规定，否则都是未锁定的。

天花板

整个地下墓穴的天花板高12英尺。

无名

尽管这里埋葬了许多死者，但没有任何迹象表明死者的名字。这个神殿的信徒相信杜马索因在死后给予塔尔亨德新的秘密名字，因此他们的凡人名字没有被纪念。

Crypt Hauntings.name: 地下室鬼魂 (Crypt Hauntings)
Crypt Hauntings.text:
地下墓穴中保留着摄心魔的入侵回音，这些回音让墓穴内的灵魂感到不安。当文本提到墓穴的鬼魂时，掷一个d6并查阅@UUID[RollTable.pbsoCh6crypthaun]{Crypt Hauntings} table to determine the nature of the ghostly image or effect encountered there (or choose one that seems evocative). A haunting can’t leave the location where it’s encountered and doesn’t physically interact with the characters in any way.

In each location with a haunting, there’s a way to put the haunt to rest (usually by restoring the location’s solemnity or removing evidence of mind flayer activity); these methods are listed in the relevant areas. Putting the haunt to rest means the haunting no longer occurs there. Any character who worships Dumathoin knows how to put the haunts to rest. Otherwise, characters who succeed on a [[/check skill=prc dc=12]] check know. @Embed[RollTable.pbsoCh6crypthaun classes="caption-top"]

Purifying the Crypt

Purifying the Crypt of the Talhund requires quelling all the crypt hauntings and defeating the ghosts. When this happens, a sigh like grinding stone echoes through the crypt, and each room momentarily flickers with light. No more crypt hauntings appear in any locations, and no spontaneous hauntings occur.

Haunting Locations. Spontaneous hauntings are in the crypt’s ghostly hall (area @UUID[.yUdtPqCq6uHOiKFk]{P2}), honored approach (area @UUID[.2gHj0x07CRejYlzu]{P6}，圣骨匣(区域@UUID[.SEMPjWvpCufxxpbf]{P7}), valiant approach (area @UUID[.XD5YTJNI21UpP0vr]{P11}), and haunted hall (area @UUID[.gdMH5cgE03uK34Ce]{P16})。

杜马索因的祝福。 当角色净化了墓穴时，任何帮助安抚一个幽灵或击败墓穴鬼魂之一的角色都会获得@UUID[Item.pbsoBlessingOfDu]{blessing of Dumathoin.}。杜马索因可以随时取消这个祝福，由你决定，比如如果角色被证明是矮人的敌人。否则，这个祝福遵循《地下城主指南》中呈现的祝福规则(见下文)。

祝福

角色可能因为做了一些真正重大的事情而获得神祇的祝福-这种成就引起了神祇和凡人的注意。

角色应该只获得对他或她有用的祝福，一些祝福会附带施主的期望。通常，神祇会为特定目的而给予祝福，比如找回一位圣人的遗骸或推翻一个暴虐的帝国。如果角色未追求该目的或行动违背了目的，神祇可能会撤回祝福。

角色永远保留祝福的好处，直到授予祝福的神祇收回为止。与魔法物品不同，这种祝福不能被反魔法领域或类似效果抑制。

大多数冒险者一生中甚至都不会收到这些祝福中的任何一种。角色可以获得的祝福数量没有限制，但一个角色同时拥有多个祝福应该是罕见的。此外，一个角色不能同时受益于多个相同祝福。例如，一个角色不能同时受益于两个健康祝福。

了解更多： 超自然天赋 DMG，第227页

Lower Landing.name: 下层平台 (Lower Landing)
Lower Landing.text:
这里有四座石棺，两座靠北墙，两座靠南墙。每对石棺之间都有一尊矮人战士雕像。这些雕像和石棺都已经破裂不堪，仿佛一碰就会崩塌。

每个石棺里都躺着一位被食脑怪魔法腐化的矮人墓守。当石棺被打扰或有活物试图通过西侧门离开时，所有四位墓守就会冲出来战斗，直到被摧毁。墓守会在房间的南半部或北半部使用@UUID[Actor.pbsoRevenant0000]{revenant} stat block with the following changes:

  • They speak Dwarvish only.
  • They have sworn vengeance against all living trespassers in the crypt.
  • They don’t rejuvenate if the characters have put the crypt’s haunts to rest (see the @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{Purifying the Crypt} section).

The stone in this room was badly weakened in the mind flayer assault. The statues fall to pieces if disturbed, creating &Reference[difficult-terrain]{difficult terrain}，具体取决于哪尊雕像被破坏。四座石棺如果被打扰也会坍塌，但每个只会在自己的方格内造成难行地形。

Ghostly Hall.name: 幽灵大厅 (Ghostly Hall)
Ghostly Hall.text:
水花声在这条长廊的西端回荡。北墙有三扇门，南墙上雕刻着一群矮人祭司抬着裹尸体的精美图案。

在这个阴郁的大厅里有一个@UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd]{crypt haunting}。通过击败或驱赶走长廊尽头水房中的生物(@UUID[.js7KkoDGDj01ISOi]{area P5})，将这个幽灵安息。

Corpse Preparation Rooms.name: 尸体准备室 (D&D)
Corpse Preparation Rooms.text:
这些房间看起来都很相似，每个都可以描述如下：

这个房间中间有一块石板，上面覆盖着一些被灰尘覆盖的金属工具。石盆靠近石板。墙上的雕刻展示了矮人虔诚地照料死者。

特训的服务人员在这些相连的房间里为已故的塔尔洪德做准备：

西侧房间

中央房间

东侧房间

这里的服务人员为准备好的尸体穿戴盔甲。石盆里放着几块杂乱的盔甲片；见下方的宝藏。

这里的服务人员在尸体的胸膛里放置了一颗神圣的宝石。石盆曾经装满了数十颗神圣的宝石，但掠夺者摧毁了这里的守卫后带走了这些宝石。现在石盆是空的。

这里的服务人员清洗尸体并缝合任何伤口。石盆里除了几块轻石外是空的。

秘密门。 搜索中央房间并成功进行[[/check skill=prc dc=16]]检定的角色会发现一个隐藏在矮人服务人员雕像内的秘密门，雕像展示了一位女性服务人员将手放在一位已故神职人员胸膛上。按下服务人员的手会使门向外摆开，通往@UUID[.vkw63lnT3e1LnASp]{area P4}。

@UUID[Item.OjkIqlW2UpgFcjZa]{Treasure.} 西侧房间中的盔甲部件包含了一套可用的板甲套装的所有部件。由于这套盔甲是为塔尔洪德而制的葬礼盔甲，杜玛索因的信徒不愿攻击穿戴这套盔甲的人。塔尔洪德地穴中的不死矮人对穿戴这套盔甲的人有攻击检定的劣势。

Hidden Sanctum Access Rooms.name: 隐藏圣所通道房间
Hidden Sanctum Access Rooms.text:
这个小而空荡的房间对面有一扇沉重的石门。

通往旋转圣所的石门(区域@UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l]{P14}) pull open. If the sanctum hasn’t been rotated into position (see areas @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{P9} and @UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l]{P14})被坚实的石头挡住。否则，它们通向P14区域。

与圣所互动

从P4区域通往圣所P14的门在提供的场景中最初是锁着的，以防止令牌在圣所区域旋转到位之前进入。一旦房间被旋转，这些门应根据需要解锁并打开。

当您的玩家准备好操作圣所的旋转机制时，请参阅以下部分：@UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l#rotating-rooms]{Rotating Rooms}

Watery Chamber.name: 水之密室(Watery Chamber)
Watery Chamber.text:
这个房间的大部分已经坍塌到了一个被淹没的坑洞中。黑暗的水面泛起奇怪的涟漪和飞溅声，仿佛深处潜伏着什么。

很久以前发生的坍塌扰乱了地下的泉眼，导致整个区域被淹没。@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.OT2hqLpxIxygk9jb]

一只名为格兰德尔爪(Grandlejaw)的@UUID[Actor.K4vsSlHqbBAHUDHY]{hydra}在水中打盹，保持一两个头警惕地警戒着危险。飞溅声的源头是一个紧张的@UUID[Actor.pbsoWaterWeird00]{water weird}，名叫凯利基利(Kellikilli)。在意识到凯利基利不可食后，格兰德尔爪勉强决定容忍这个水怪。水怪不停地、疯狂地运动让水面泡沫不断，而这正是九头蛇所喜欢的。凯利基利喜欢和像格兰德尔爪这样强悍的生物一起战斗。

如果角色们谨慎地接近这个房间，他们会看到格兰德尔爪和凯利基利互动：格兰德尔爪因为水怪扰乱了一个正在睡觉的头而不悦地啄它，凯利基利则用尖声的咯咯笑回应，并向格兰德尔爪的一个脸喷水。

水怪太过分心以至于没有注意到不扰乱水面的人，但九头蛇饥饿了，会攻击任何看起来可食的东西。如果发生战斗，水怪会留在水池中，但如果可能的话会抓住生物并将其拖入水中。如果水怪受伤严重或者九头蛇被杀死，水怪会逃走。

Honored Approach.name: 尊敬接近(Honored Approach)
Honored Approach.text:
这个大厅的北端有一扇石门。另一扇门朝东倾斜，擦着地板上一个细长、破碎的头骨。两扇门上都刻有矮人文字。

北边的石门上刻着用矮人文字写着“被尊敬的死者”。朝东倾斜的门上写着“死者的遗物”，同样是矮人文字。任何检查歪斜门旁边的头骨的角色都会认出它是一只掠心者的头骨。如果粗暴处理，头骨会破碎。

这里有一个墓穴的幽灵(见@UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd]{Crypt Hauntings})。修复门并移除掠心者头骨会让幽灵安息。修理门需要几分钟时间，使用相关工具，比如石匠工具，并且需要对这些工具有熟练掌握。

Reliquary.name: 圣骸容器
Reliquary.text:
这个房间的地板上散落着破碎的基座、碎玻璃和灰尘。一个无头骷髅靠在被打碎的展示品旁。北墙倒塌了，通向更大的房间。

这个房间曾是探索者和下一个房间里的黏土傀儡之间激烈战斗的地点。黏土傀儡最终赶走了探索者，但在探索者逃走之前，他们偷走了这里保存的大部分矮人遗物。

无头骷髅是一名探索者的，任何检查它的角色都会注意到这一点，以及这具骷髅与@UUID[.2gHj0x07CRejYlzu]{area P6.}

There is a @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd]{crypt haunting} here. Destroying the headless mind flayer skeleton puts the haunt to rest.

Treasure. A metal case containing @UUID[Item.SqTtbBCfiEsmZ36N]{eight beads of force}中的头骨相匹配，头骨留在了瓦砾中。

Honored Dead.name: 尊敬的亡者 (D&D)
Honored Dead.text:
这个房间有一条通往北方的走廊，两排站立的石棺。每个石棺盖上都雕刻着一个休息的牧师。一个身高10英尺、带有矮人特征的全副武装的身影在房间里巡逻。

这个身影是一个@UUID[Actor.YOqhbf8WsX0jH9Fu]{clay golem} who maintains its vigil here. It is 10 feet tall and shaped to resemble an armored dwarf. Even hundreds of years after it repelled the mind flayer attack, the golem remains vigilant. It pursues foes who flee into areas @UUID[.2gHj0x07CRejYlzu]{P6} and area @UUID[.SEMPjWvpCufxxpbf]{P7}，但没有更多信息。

每个石棺里都装着一名矮人的脆弱骨骼。由于掠食者从未绕过黏土傀儡守卫，而这些石棺距离那个用魔法污染了地下墓室的方尖碑碎片最远，这些是唯一保持安息的塔尔亨德。

宝藏。在本章节的前面有每个十四具矮人尸体都有一个@UUID[Item.pbsoRibcageGem00]{gem} worth 100 gp in its ribcage. Any character who steals a gem cannot benefit from the @UUID[Item.pbsoBlessingOfDu]{Blessing of Dumathoin} described in the @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{“Purifying the Crypt”}。

Historian’s Tomb.name: 历史学家之墓 (Historian's Tomb)
Historian’s Tomb.text:
这个房间的墙壁上雕刻着打开的书籍的图像。每本书的页面上都写满了拥挤的文字。一个简单的石棺上雕刻着一位年长的男矮人，手持一支羽毛笔和一本书。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.NCbV4h1LKToHW1Oe caption=false classes="right two"]

Lever. The metal lever in the “up” position can be moved only if the lever in @UUID[.jgAWlqLDI99CuXDu]{area P13} is moved at the same time. Moving both levers simultaneously rotates the hidden sanctum, as described in @UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l]{area P14}中发现历史学家的真实命运。

冒险侏儒。 一位名叫@UUID[Actor.pbsoRivibiddel00]{Rivibiddel} has spent many days in the crypt. Because of his advanced age, his walking speed is 15 feet, and he can’t take reactions. Rivibiddel ran out of food days ago and is quickly running out of water. If the characters aid him, he shares the following information:

Ardent Convert. Rivibiddel is a historian and a convert to the religion of Dumathoin.

Getting In. Rivibiddel accessed a secret Underdark passage leading to the pool in @UUID[.js7KkoDGDj01ISOi]{area P5}. He swam past that room’s treacherous inhabitants and was delighted to find the work here on the walls.

Growing Old Rapidly. Rivibiddel was a much physically younger gnome when he entered the crypt to pursue one of the few known copies of He of the Hidden Gemstone. Worried that he’d run out of food and water before recording all the text, Rivibiddel scouted the passage to the north and ran afoul of a pair of restless ghosts. Their @UUID[Actor.qoFEjfrANBdrCP6m.Item.lOzkFHeXCdO2FB9X]{Horrifying Visage}的年迈斯维尔夫内布林，通过能力使这位不幸侏儒的身体老化，现在他濒临死亡。身体虚弱且恐惧，Rivibiddel退隐到这里。

半途而废。 他已经抄写了整篇《隐藏宝石之主》，但由于身体状况不佳，他抄写的最后一半文字手势颤抖。他把工作和写作工具放在他一直携带的包里。

铁笔。 Rivibiddel知道这部作品的作者名叫Thorgran Ironquill。Rivibiddel分享了本节开头列出的有关Thorgran的一切信息。

圣物。 Rivibiddel从Thorgran的文本中得知，在塔伦德墓穴中有一颗巨大而精美的翡翠，他想取回一块这颗翡翠的碎片作为神圣的遗物，并在死前将其归还给杜马索因的其他信徒。

返回。 Rivibiddel知道自己无法在困难的游泳中生存下去离开原路。他需要其他路线，如果被指引的话，他很乐意暂时留在方达林。

祝福之地。 塔伦德雷斯曾经是杜马索因信徒的重要圣地。他们的祭司们，被称为塔伦德，被埋葬在庙宇下的塔伦德墓穴中。这个墓穴曾经是杜马索因最神圣的地方之一。

墓穴入侵。 许多世代以前，控制了地底世界的一部分，包括塔伦德雷斯在内的许多地方，如同食脑怪。他们一定是入侵了地下室，因为有这么多不安宁的不死生物和幽灵。里维比德尔(Rivibiddel)悲伤地补充道，地下室的神圣已经很久以前被破坏了。 危险。南边的池塘里有一头多头蛇和某种元素生物，西北方有一个危险的魔像，北边有一些矮人骷髅和幽灵。里维比德尔认为整个地下室都充满了致命的危险。 翡翠。里维比德尔寻找的巨大翡翠很可能隐藏在内部圣所中，符合杜马索因(Dumathoin)的传说。在杜马索因的圣地中，秘密门很常见。里维比德尔还没有在地下室中发现任何秘密门。 杠杆。这个地下室里的杠杆可能与揭示地下室隐藏圣所有关，但里维比德尔无法让杠杆移动。他已经做了足够的调整，意识到这个杠杆与某个巨大的齿轮机构相连，必须导致地下室中的整个房间移动。这个杠杆被锁定在原位，因为它与地下室中的另一个杠杆相连。他坚信这两个杠杆必须同时拉动。(如果角色们希望里维比德尔帮忙拉动杠杆，他会很荣幸这样做，但地下室的守护者可能会攻击他，如@UUID[.KS4Sad8cs4j3QU8q]{area P15}中描述的那样。)

Founder’s Tomb.name: 创始人之墓 (Founder's Tomb)
Founder’s Tomb.text:
这个地下室的墙壁上装饰着塔尔洪德雷斯神殿的图像。这个房间里的石棺上雕刻着一个戴着大戒指的矮人女人的形象。

石棺里有一具价值100金币的@UUID[Actor.pbsoDwarfSkeleto]{dwarf skeleton}. This was the influential priest who first received Dumathoin’s vision for Talhundereth and who oversaw its initial construction. As fourteen Talhund assisted her, the number fourteen became important throughout Talhundereth and the crypt.

If the characters have put the crypt’s haunts to rest (see @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{Purifying the Crypt}), the skeleton remains at rest when the characters enter. Otherwise, the skeleton pushes open the sarcophagus lid to attack when anyone enters. If a character spends an action, invokes the name of Dumathoin, and succeeds on a [[/check skill=rel dc=14]] check, the skeleton stops attacking, though it attacks the characters again if they reenter the room.

Treasure. The dwarf skeleton has a @UUID[Item.pbsoRibcageGem00]{gemstone}。创始人的@UUID[Item.pbsoRingOfTheOra]{ring of the orator}也在石棺里，当她变成骷髅时，戒指从她手指上掉了下来。

Valiant Approach.name: 英勇进发
Valiant Approach.text:
这个房间的东墙是光秃秃的石头。其他墙壁上装饰着矮人与巨人、兽人和其他敌人战斗的雕刻。房间中央立着一尊举斧的矮人战士雕像。

一旦有人进入这个房间，@UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd]{crypt haunting} here that manifests immediately.

Four @UUID[Actor.pbsoDwarfSkeleto]{dwarf skeletons} lumber from @UUID[.XD5YTJNI21UpP0vr]{area P12}就会出现。每个后续回合开始时，另外两个矮人骷髅从P12区域出现，直到所有十四个矮人骷髅都加入战斗。任何已经参与战斗的骷髅会追击逃跑的敌人。骷髅会战斗直到被摧毁。

如果一个角色花费一个动作，祈求杜马索因的名字，并在[[/check skill=rel dc=14]]检定中成功，一个骷髅会停止攻击。角色们可以暂时停止所有骷髅，但如果他们重新进入房间，所有这样的骷髅会再次攻击角色。

打败所有十四个骷髅或按上述方法暂时停止它们会让这个区域的幽灵安息。

通往P12区域的门上方刻着用矮人语写的“勇敢的亡者”。

滑动墙。 当这个房间和@UUID[.KS4Sad8cs4j3QU8q]{area P15} is movable. When the levers in @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{areas P9} and @UUID[.jgAWlqLDI99CuXDu]{area P13}之间的墙同时被拉动时，墙壁升起到天花板，将P11和P15区域变成一个大房间。

宝藏。 每个十四个矮人骷髅的胸腔里都有一颗@UUID[Item.pbsoRibcageGem00]{gemstone}，价值100金币。任何偷走宝石的角色都无法从本章节描述的@UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{earlier}中获益杜马索因的祝福。

Narrow Corridor.name: 狭窄走廊 (Narrow Corridor)
Narrow Corridor.text:
这条长廊连接着@UUID[.js7KkoDGDj01ISOi]{P5} and @UUID[.9XygTO6hd7IGLkYN]{P11}.

Secret Door. Characters who search the corridor’s east wall and who succeed on a [[/check skill=prc dc=16]] check discover a secret door. Sliding a wall carving of a mountain peak causes the door to swing open to @UUID[.vkw63lnT3e1LnASp]{area P4}。

Valiant Dead.name: 英勇亡者
Valiant Dead.text:
这个房间有十四块石板，每块上都有一个凹槽，矮人战士可以在上面休息。墙壁上雕刻着勇敢的矮人战神用发光的斧头和辉煌的火焰冲击敌人的形象。

这个区域的门微微开着。这十四个矮人被安置在这些石板上，已经变成了骷髅，角色们在@UUID[.9XygTO6hd7IGLkYN]{area P11}中已经面对过它们。

General’s Tomb.name: 将军坟墓
General’s Tomb.text:
这个房间里有三块有着身体凹槽的石板，中间的石板比其他两块更加华丽。盔甲碎片和脆弱的骨骼散落在每块石板上。雕刻展示了一位女矮人在战斗中领导其他矮人。

向东，墙壁上有一个金属杠杆处于“上”位置。

布莱尔塔·宝刃(Brelta Gemblade)—这位在确保该地区和平的矮人将军—与她的忠诚助手穆尼格(Murnig)和内尔加(Nelja)一起被安葬在这里。

将军和她的两位助手已经从死者中复活，同时移动@UUID[Actor.qoFEjfrANBdrCP6m]{ghosts}. If the characters have put the crypt’s haunts @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{to rest}, the ghosts don’t manifest when the characters enter the room. Otherwise, the ghosts attack when the characters enter. If a character spends an action, invokes the name of Dumathoin, and succeeds on a [[/check skill=rel dc=14]] check, the ghosts stop attacking.

The Lever. The east wall’s metal lever can be moved only if the lever in @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{area P9}。同时移动两个杠杆会旋转隐藏的密室，如@UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l]{area P14.}中描述的。

@UUID[Item.pbsoP13treasure0]{Treasure.} 在每块石板上的骨骼和盔甲碎片中，都有价值100 gp的宝石。将军的石板上还包含她的心灵护卫王冠。

Rotating Sanctum.name: 旋转圣所 (Rotating Sanctum)
Rotating Sanctum.text:
这个圆形房间有三个凹室，每个都有出口，由石柱和门楣支撑，看起来像一个矿井。房间中央有一个高台，上面放着一个巨大、多面的翡翠，散发着温暖的绿光。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.07cqkmbJqMX7qaCO]

三个@UUID[Actor.ET4PEVEiNJLU4f7c]{wraiths} manifest and attack as soon as any other creature enters the room. They can’t leave the room and fight until destroyed.

Rotating the Sanctum. This hidden room is set atop a massive gear. When the characters first arrive in the Crypt of the Talhund, it’s not aligned with any of the sanctum access rooms (@UUID[.vkw63lnT3e1LnASp]{area P4}). When the levers in areas @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{P9}和区域@UUID[.jgAWlqLDI99CuXDu]{P13} are both pulled at the same time, the gears grind and the room rotates clockwise. Rotating the room aligns its three entrances with the access rooms and pulls aside the wall between areas @UUID[.9XygTO6hd7IGLkYN]{P11} and area @UUID[.KS4Sad8cs4j3QU8q]{P15}，将这些区域合并成一个大房间。

旋转房间

提供了一个伴随宏，当角色操作杠杆时，将切换这个房间的物理方向以及分隔P11和P15房间的石隔断。

点击以下链接执行宏：@UUID[Macro.wD06EPjKMIr65ik9]{Rotate the Hidden Sanctum}

The Sanctum’s Gemstone. The mind flayers found this sacred room and discovered that the 10-foot-diameter gemstone was not an emerald. The green-hued crystal was a dependable receptacle for their psionic echoes, so they imbued it with splinters of their malignant intellects. This desecration is a major reason the crypt remains haunted.

The Talhund blessed the gemstone so that it can’t be shattered, but it can be chipped. The svirfneblin @UUID[Actor.pbsoRivibiddel00]{Rivibiddel} in @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{area P9}想要从神圣所在的心脏处取下一块宝石。他不在乎这不是一颗真正的翡翠，因为对他来说，它的重要性是宗教性的，而不是金钱上的。

Blessed Dead.name: 祝福的亡者 (D&D)
Blessed Dead.text:
这个房间里有十四个凹室，每个凹室里都有一个石棺。每个石棺的盖子上雕刻着一个虔诚的矮人牧师。每个雕刻都散发着微弱的光芒。在房间中央蜷缩着六个披甲的骷髅。

这里安葬的牧师的善良灵魂没有受到食脑怪的腐化影响，但负责看守死者的六个地穴守护者受到了影响。当角色进入这个区域时，蜷缩的骷髅会起身，变成六个@UUID[Actor.pbsoRevenant0000]{revenants} with the following changes:

  • They speak Dwarvish only.
  • They have sworn vengeance against all living trespassers in the crypt.
  • They don’t rejuvenate if the characters have put the crypt’s haunts to rest (see the @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{“Purifying the Crypt”} section).

These guardians can’t leave the area until the characters rotate the sanctum and the wall between @UUID[.9XygTO6hd7IGLkYN]{areas P11}和@UUID[.KS4Sad8cs4j3QU8q]{P15} pulls aside. The crypt guardians make their way into the crypt’s western half to fight intruders there. If the characters split up to pull the levers in areas @UUID[.g1VInh6HECCS8IAF]{P9} and area @UUID[.jgAWlqLDI99CuXDu]{P13}，复仇者会分开攻击两个位置。

如果角色们已经平息了地穴的幽灵，守护者的尸体就不会起来。否则，复仇者会一见到角色就发动攻击。

如果一个角色花费一个动作，祈求杜马托因的名字，并成功进行一次[[/check skill=rel dc=14]]检定，其中一个复仇者会停止攻击并返回安息之地。角色们可以暂时阻止所有复仇者发动攻击，但如果角色们重新进入房间，复仇者会再次发动攻击。

滑动墙壁。 这个房间和@UUID[.9XygTO6hd7IGLkYN]{area P11}之间的墙壁是可移动的。当P9和P13区域的杠杆同时被拉动时，墙壁会升起到天花板上，将P11和P15区域变成一个大房间。

Haunted Hall.name: 闹鬼大厅 (Haunted Hall)
Haunted Hall.text:
这条走廊上有雄伟的山峰雕刻，上面是多面宝石的雕刻。

当生物踏入建筑师之墓(区域@UUID[.iY12gUH289TDQ9oA]{P17})门口5英尺范围内时，会出现一个@UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd]{crypt haunting}。打败那个房间里的木乃伊会平息幽灵。

这条走廊北端的门上雕刻着用矮人文写着“被祝福的死者”。南端的门上雕刻着“挖掘的死者”。

秘密门。这条走廊上的秘密门略微歪斜在门框中，比其他隐藏的圣所入口更容易发现。搜索这个走廊并且成功进行[[/check skill=prc dc=12]]检定的角色会发现这扇秘密门。按下墙上宝石的雕刻会使门打开。

Architect’s Tomb.name: 建筑师之墓 (Architect's Tomb)
Architect’s Tomb.text:
这个房间的墙壁上雕刻着建筑设计，展示了地下室的房间和通道。一个面带怒容的矮人雕像站在一个有裂缝的石棺上，守护着它。

这个雕像是一个古老的@UUID[Actor.z85EsGS2GVWj46qE]{shield guardian} bound to the crypt’s architect, who was buried here with several sheaves of his best architectural plans. The corrupted energies unleashed by the mind flayers bound the designs to the corpse of the dwarf, creating a @UUID[Actor.t8WYD7ak07X7xpx8]{mummy} wrapped in architectural plans. If the characters have put the crypt’s haunts @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{to rest}，木乃伊不会复活，雕像也不会移动。但如果木乃伊推开石棺盖并起身袭击入侵者，盾卫护卫会保护它。木乃伊对地下室了如指掌，例如，可能会穿过旋转的神圣区域(区域@UUID[.nIPhEUIY282mb74l]{P14})拦截试图逃跑的角色。

如果一个角色花费一个动作，念出杜马索因的名字，并在[[/check skill=rel dc=14]]检定中成功，盾卫护卫和木乃伊停止攻击。如果角色重新进入房间，这些生物会再次袭击他们。

地下室地图。 墙上的雕刻展示了地下室的完整地图，包括秘密门、秘密区域和旋转的神圣区域。任何查看这张地图的人都会自动发现地下室中的任何秘密门。

宝藏。 木乃伊的躯体中藏有价值500 gp的@UUID[Item.pbsoP17gem000000]{gemstone}。

Obelisk Chamber.name: 方尖碑室(Oblisk Chamber)
Obelisk Chamber.text:
这个房间里有七个雕像，描绘了七名辛勤工作的矮人矿工。北墙靠着一辆矿车，上面放着一块大约一英尺长的黑色石块。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.brCVU7WD0KyjUMyK]

这七个雕像不仅仅是装饰；每个雕像下面都有一个埋葬墓穴，里面躺着一位曾经是矿工转变为祭司的人。这些矿工祭司是塔尔洪德中最受尊敬的人之一，因为他们在听到加入神殿的召唤之前，已经经历了杜马索因的教诲。

方尖碑碎片。 一个法师施放了@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.d9MwcXi7Il3HROXd]{passwall} to bypass most of the crypt, which allowed them to place the obelisk fragment here in the mining cart for safekeeping. The wizard never returned to claim it. The @UUID[Item.pbsoObeliskFragm]{obelisk fragment} has been here for years, amplifying the psychic echoes resonating within the crypt.

When the obelisk fragment is touched, the dwarf spirits within the walls emerge to defend it, unless the characters have put the crypt’s haunts @UUID[.4WGf0GMNYJlIPjmd#purifying-the-crypt]{to rest}。在这种情况下，灵魂不会从雕像中出现。

最初，四个@UUID[Actor.PuPo4H4Dcxigf0fY]{specters} emerge from the carvings. At the beginning of each round, another specter emerges from another carving until the fragment is removed from the room or until all seven specters are summoned into the fight.

The specters attack the characters on sight. If a character spends an action, invokes the name of Dumathoin, and succeeds on a [[/check skill=rel dc=14]] check, one specter stops attacking. The characters can temporarily stop all the specters from attacking, though the specters attack the characters again if they reenter the room.

If the Characters Fail. If the characters are defeated by the specters, the mind flayer fanatics send minions into the crypt to recover the obelisk fragment. Record if the fanatics get the fragment, as it alters how the characters confront the mind flayer fanatics in @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoIlvaashsAnim.JournalEntryPage.KEjBWQszokPCiGar]{chapter 8}.

Development. Once the characters have explored Talhundereth and the Crypt of the Talhund, they should head to @UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6gibbetcro]{Gibbet Crossing}，如果他们还没有这样做的话。

Crypt of the Talhund Locations.name: 塔尔亨德地点 (Crypt of the Talhund)
Crypt of the Talhund Locations.text:
以下位置与@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap6p4000000]{Crypt of the Talhund} 场景相关联。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.3P7avnHeT0NoFmSo caption=false]

。

Crypt of the Talhund.name: 塔尔亨德之墓 (Crypt of the Talhund)
Crypt of the Talhund.text:
建造在塔尔亨德雷斯下方，@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6crypttalh]{Crypt of the Talhund}是杜马索因(被称为塔尔亨德)的祭司被安葬的地方。很久以前袭击塔尔亨德雷斯的控脑食人魔也洗劫了地下墓室，他们在这个神圣地方留下的精神污渍至今仍然存在。

激活塔尔亨德地下墓室场景

当你的玩家到达时，激活@UUID[Scene.pbsoMap6p4000000]{Crypt of the Talhund}场景。

Gibbet Crossing Features.name: 绞刑架十字路口特征
Gibbet Crossing Features.text:
吊刑架十字路口由三个区域组成，由宽阔的自然隧道分隔，便于旅行。矮人工坊位于西部，斯维夫涅布林(svirfneblin)飞地位于东北部，而黑暗精灵贸易大厅位于东南部。

照明

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MK6gpQMeDFo0cP9f]{Continual flame} spells still illuminate the natural tunnels after many years, but the chambers are unlit and the current denizens rely on &Reference[darkvision] to see. Descriptions of unlit areas assume that the characters have a light source or some other method of seeing in the dark.

Doors

Doors throughout Gibbet Crossing are made of 2-inch-thick slabs of stone. Any door opening into a natural tunnel has grooves to place a reinforcing bar, but the bars are nowhere to be found, except in the passage to Talhundereth (area @UUID[.pgPurWbnRFNOsZOx]{G11}).

Ceilings

Ceilings in the svirfneblin enclave (areas @UUID[.pgPurWbnRFNOsZOx]{G11} 到 @UUID[.l37BZzpIfBelLsxg]{G14}) 高达9英尺。吊刑架十字路口其他地方的天花板高度为10英尺，除非文本另有说明。

Surface Entrance.name: 地表入口 (Surface Entrance)
Surface Entrance.text:
这个宽敞的房间里只剩下几块旧矿渣和散落的石头。有文字刻在通往南边的双门上。东西两侧也有出口；西侧的门上有一个大大的暗红色“X”。

从地表延伸的隧道蜿蜒穿过地下超过一英里。最深处是一个塌方，导致这个房间的后墙坍塌。

通往工作室的南门上的文字用矮人语重复着“劳动”。

之前的探险者已经把这个房间里所有有价值的东西都拿走了。涂上红色标记的意图是为了指示一个安全的出口门，尽管角色们可能会有不同的解释。

Storeroom.name: 储藏室 (D&D)
Storeroom.text:
这个储藏室的货架上摆放着各种长度的铁条。

这些沉重的铁条是灰矮人工坊的原材料，一旦灰矮人开始依赖他们的斯维尔夫内布林邻居提供的秘银，就留在这里了。这些铁条已经严重生锈，毫无价值。如果一名矮人角色或者精通&Reference[skill=history](历史)技能的角色检查这些铁条，他们会发现标记表明这些铁条是灰矮人制造的。精通历史的角色还会意识到曾经使用这些标记的灰矮人家族早已灭绝，很多代以前就被掌控者吞噬了。

Cage Workshop.name: 笼子工坊 (Cage Workshop)
Cage Workshop.text:
这间宽敞的车间墙壁上挂满了印章和车床。四个怪异的身影在一座黑暗的熔炉前劳作，敲打着并不存在的金属。几张石桌上摆放着旧工具和装饰有尖刺的金属棒。东南角的一个笼子上装饰着向内尖刺。

四个@UUID[Actor.pbsoFeralAshenwi]{feral ashenwights}被束缚在他们生前工作的车间里。他们会攻击闯入者，并战斗直到被摧毁。

这个车间曾用来制作各种尺寸的金属笼子，所有笼子都装饰有向内和向外尖刺，或者两者兼有。精巧的铰链和加固销钉使这些笼子在空载时易于折叠携带。矮人贩卖这些可怕的笼子曾经有一定的成功，但当他们开始在折叠笼中加入轻质秘银时，他们的生意达到了新的高度。

宝藏。角落里完整组装的@UUID[Item.pbsoCollapsableC]{cage}是一个成品示例。它可以在1分钟内折叠平放。重量为50磅。尽管大部分笼子是铁制的，但它有由秘银制成的加固条和铰链。笼子没有锁；顾客需要额外支付给其他地方制造的锁。这个笼子价值200金币。

Living Quarters.name: 住所
Living Quarters.text:
这个房间里摆放着几张短而铁质的床架。任何被褥都已经消失了。向南的一个开口通往一个只有两张长桌和一把断裂椅子的凹室。

向西，一扇带有红色“X”标记的门通向一条通往交叉点深处的长廊。

地板上的灰烬和烧痕表明曾经有篝火。南边凹室里的木椅残骸似乎被拆散用作柴火。

通往西边的长廊上有通往展示厅（区域@UUID[.qxVzxzkTQ0jKfXoz]{G5}) and the depleted mine (area @UUID[.ygjKvEVGwk8Dn9uv]{G9}).

@UUID[Item.pbsoG4treasure00]{Treasure.} 一个破烂的背包里装有一套制图工具、六品脱的油、一本关于绳索怪的插图书、价值250金币的翡翠和一个显形灯笼。

Showroom.name: 展厅
Showroom.text:
这个房间是空的，但破碎的墙壁雕刻展示了一位灰矮人逐步展开一个带刺笼子。

灰矮人会在这个房间向潜在的购买者展示可折叠的笼子。相邻监狱中的锁链恶魔(区域 @UUID[.xXHsGkGDLo7YqHpD]{G6})会前来调查任何入侵者的声音。

Prison.name: 监狱 (D&D)
Prison.text:
两个带尖刺的笼子里塞满了古老的骨头和腐烂的肉块。一个红皮肤的女人裹着松散的链条坐在地板上。

杜尔加恶魔术士绑定了一个 @UUID[Actor.KtM6IV9I5l1MWUDk]{chain devil} to this room long ago. She dimly remembers her name is Vakketar. When the mind flayers routed the duergar, they blasted Vakketar’s mind and left her for dead. The chain devil survived, however, as did the magic that binds her here. She can leave this area for only 1 minute at a time before the binding magic compels her to return.

Vakketar used to demonstrate the efficacy of the cages for customers, usually on captured thieves or duergar who worked too slowly. She might talk briefly with the characters, but only as a pretense to determine their numbers and weaknesses. She can’t comprehend the passage of time except with extraordinary concentration.

An ageless and sadistic jailer, Vakketar likes to catch intruders and shove them into the spiked cages. She has captured many curious travelers over the years and tries to capture the characters, too.

Treasure. Both @UUID[Item.WVdSEHlCN9onfOk2]{cages} are like the ones in area @UUID[.y37U98syx1IS7rV4]{G3,}，只是它们适合大型生物。一旦清空了骨头和血肉，每个笼子可以在2分钟内折叠平整，重量为500磅。两个笼子都没有锁，因为瓦克塔会用她的活链条缠绕在笼门上以保持关闭状态。每个笼子价值400金币。

Stairs to Flooded Passage.name: 通往洪水通道的楼梯 (Stairs to Flooded Passage)
Stairs to Flooded Passage.text:
这条宽敞的通道铺设着粗糙的台阶，通向混浊的洪水之中。

几十年前，地下水道淹没了这条通道，现在完全被淹没。隧道的一部分已经坍塌，形成了通往谈判室(区域@UUID[.3V3roZCVr8twzyL1]{G16})的入口。

Intersection.name: 交叉口
Intersection.text:
钟乳石悬挂在这个30英尺高的拱形洞穴的天花板上。地面湿滑，被雕刻得平整而均匀。通道朝几个方向延伸，一扇石制双门镶嵌着一个带有尖刺笼的雕刻，嵌入其中的一面墙。

最近，一只@UUID[Actor.pbsoGrickAlpha00]{grick alpha}搬到了这个区域，并盘绕在东侧的一个钟乳石上，可以轻松沿着附近的墙壁滑下来捕捉猎物。成功进行[[/check skill=prc dc=15]]检定的角色注意到了这只格里克，格里克在被注意到时发起攻击。第一次受伤时，格里克发出一声尖叫，吸引了矿井中的格里克巢穴(区域@UUID[.ygjKvEVGwk8Dn9uv]{G9})前来帮助。昆布拉克塞尔的格里姆洛克知道当他们在这里办事时要避开格里克。

尽管这个十字路口曾经是一个繁华的市场，但现在已经一去不复返，但它回荡着微弱的心灵回声，商人和旅行者在进行交易。进入这个区域的角色会听到这个古老生意的瞬间幻听。

Depleted Mine.name: 枯竭矿脉 (Depleted Mine)
Depleted Mine.text:
粗糙的墙壁表明这里曾经进行过采矿。一团令人作呕的黏液堵塞了裂缝。一扇狭窄的门卡在矿井的后面。

六只@UUID[Actor.tFJX45zj3QDc3Zli]{gricks}在这里的巢穴中，它们用自己的黏液建造了巢。如果相邻交叉路口的格里克首领发出求救声，角色们可能已经遇到它们了。

最初，矮人尝试在这里开采金属用于制作笼子，但很快他们发现地底侏儒提供的产品更好。矿井后面的门后来被安装为逃生通道，让许多矮人在被脑吃者攻击时逃脱。

Collapsed Tunnel.name: 坍塌的隧道 (Collapsed Tunnel)
Collapsed Tunnel.text:
这条宽阔的隧道在拐弯处突然结束。大块的石头表明很久以前发生了一次坍塌。

@Embed[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6arthandou.JournalEntryPage.2pCvs5E7VM4DbCo5 classes="right three"]

两个价值30金币的@UUID[Actor.qZyLwdx7lj5d1wfD]{ropers} lurk amid the stones here. They enjoy ambushing travelers, but there haven’t been many travelers recently. The ropers don’t know that gricks have been poaching their potential prey. They’re hungry and desperate for victims.

The ropers know about the strange effect in the adjacent receiving room (area @UUID[.SCDjztDapgQEEq9J]{G12}). Once one roper is defeated, the other one retreats just inside the doorway of the receiving room to gain the protection that room provides.

The long-ago collapse caused desperate times for the svirfneblin enclave. The tunnel once led to several other svirfneblin communities from which these svirfneblin acquired mithral, but the collapse proved too extensive for even the skilled tunnelers to safely excavate. The isolated svirfneblin began to rely on traders from Talhundereth to get mithral, even though this cut deeply into their profits.

Treasure. Each roper has consumed @UUID[Item.pbsoAmethyst0000]{four amethysts}。区域@UUID[.l37BZzpIfBelLsxg]{G14}中的独眼怪急于找回这些紫水晶。

Talhundereth Passage.name: 塔尔亨德雷斯通道 (Talhundereth Passage)
Talhundereth Passage.text:
从G10区域闯入这个房间很困难，因为门被闩住了。角色可以通过在另一侧成功进行一次[[/check ability=dex tool=thief dc=15]]检定来移除闩杆，或者通过成功进行一次[[/check skill=ath dc=21]]检定来用力推开门，从而打破闩杆。昆布拉克塞尔(Qunbraxel)正确地认为通往@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder]{Talhundereth} is behind the door, so the mind flayer sent grimlocks to investigate. The door bears marks from @UUID[Actor.pbsoQunbraxel000]{Qunbraxel's} @UUID[Actor.GpeQYtlo8oGvGlkM]{grimlocks}的通道。G10区域的绳索怪在他们通过门之前吃掉了格里姆洛克。

一条不规则的隧道从北部的裂缝通向南部的一扇加固门。

这个房间北端的裂缝通向塔尔亨德雷斯(Talhundereth)的@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6talhunder.JournalEntryPage.g0tRFvlttxpRg8sx]{area T1}(请查看DM视角的@UUID[JournalEntry.pbsoCh6atlas0000.JournalEntryPage.pMpwwb2h8AzQYPqQ]{here})。地下精灵努力限制了通往塔尔亨德雷斯的通道，并在此处放哨。他们没有料到塔尔亨德雷斯的一次掠食者袭击，很快就被击败了。

Receiving Room.name: 接待室 (Receiving Room)
Receiving Room.text:
从宽敞的隧道通往的双门上有一个风格化的符号，插入一个金属锭的匕首图案，以及用精灵语写着的名字“Triestoroth”。精通 &Reference[技能=历史]{grimlocks} live here, keeping watch on the doors and resting from their interminable excavations in the hall to the north. They keep two @UUID[Actor.hqj2yXtgwt64v3Lj]{basilisks} as pets. The grimlocks can’t be &Reference[petrified]{petrified} 的角色记得，Triestoroth家族是几代前被掠食者灭绝的富有的黑暗精灵贸易家族。许多人相信Triestoroth家族在防御严密的地下宝库中隐藏着未被发现的宝藏。 从双门通往的台阶通向一个被几英寸深水淹没的房间。仿佛真实但严重受损的雕像被推到房间的墙边。几个湿透的垃圾巢置于旧桌子上，使房间散发出可怕的恶臭。在巢附近徘徊着两只矮胖、蜥蜴般的生物，每只有八条腿，以及五个灰色皮肤的人形生物。 五个 @UUID[Actor.GpeQYtlo8oGvGlkM]{grimlocks} live here, keeping watch on the doors and resting from their interminable excavations in the hall to the north. They keep two @UUID[Actor.hqj2yXtgwt64v3Lj]{basilisks} as pets. The grimlocks can’t be &Reference[petrified]{petrified} 被那些蜥蜴兽伤害。 通往西边的门摸上去很凉，因为另一边长着褐色霉菌。 雕像。 推到角落的六座雕像分别是两个矮人、一个黑暗精灵、两只夸格斯，以及一只看到自己倒影的蜥蜴兽。每个雕像都异常逼真，表情惊讶或恐惧。除了蜥蜴兽，如果它们学会了如何做到，其他雕像都被 &Reference[石化]{petrified} Underdark travelers who ran afoul of @UUID[Actor.pbsoQunbraxel000]{Qunbraxel} and the mind flayer’s minions. The grimlocks disfigured each statue enough to prevent the victims from being restored to life.

The characters can acquire a handful of gravel from the smashed statues to shrink the @UUID[Item.9stfX2i2I1YPo8vx]{mudslick tower}。

Private Rooms.name: 私人房间
Private Rooms.text:
一条L形走廊上有六个粗糙的房间基本完好无损。每个房间里都有一对短石床和一个空的金属储物柜。

驻扎在这个前哨站的斯维尔夫内布林共享房间。任何踏入其中一个房间的人都会瞬间感到一阵恐惧，仿佛被一种警告惊醒，警告附近可能发生伏击。这是心灵吸食者袭击的心灵残留。

Toppled Tower.name: 倾覆之塔 (Toppled Tower)
Toppled Tower.text:
这个房间的东侧有一个奇怪的、倾斜的结构，就像一个矮胖的塔倾斜并穿过墙壁。泥泞的瘤状物从它不规则的表面上突出并缩回，以缓慢、催眠般的动作。在这个结构附近，有两个岩石生物和一个三腿三臂、蛋形怪物，头上有一个宽大的口，它们用一种咕哝的语言交谈。

一个被称为@UUID[Actor.2MZNHeOZweXAYbv1]{xorn} named Zoklork lairs here with two @UUID[Actor.sApYLZj9PTZ40wJr]{earth elementals.} They are discussing the tower in Terran.

Toppled Tower. The strange tower is a variant of @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.9stfX2i2I1YPo8vx]{Daern’s instant fortress}的生物。这些盘绳怪杀死并吃掉了佐克洛克的岩石伙伴，包括伙伴肚子里的紫水晶。

复仇。 佐克洛克对盘绳怪感到愤怒，非常想要那些紫水晶。

塔。 如果角色们给了佐克洛克紫水晶，或者如果角色们杀死了盘绳怪但没有找回紫水晶，那么盘石怪会视之为一大恩惠，并分享有关奇怪塔的秘密：这是来自地球位面的一件稀有魔法物品，似乎被意外激活了(佐克洛克不知道有关方尖碑碎片的事)。泥泞的塔的口令可以用来使其缩小；口令是“petrification”，用地语发音。

撤退。 佐克洛克不愿意为角色们侦察，因为附近潜伏着危险生物。

@UUID[Item.pbsoG14treasure0]{Treasure.} 除了泥泞塔，这个房间还有一个保险箱，里面有1300金币。

Duergar Delegate Room.name: @矮人@代表@房间 (Duergar Delegate Room)
Duergar Delegate Room.text:
这个房间里有一张长长的低桌，上面摆放着一些金属零件。楼梯向南下去，下面有一个拱门，上面刻着深深的、锯齿状的花纹。

生活在这个地区的黑暗精灵和灰矮人彼此不信任，但意识到共同合作可以从他们的商品中获得更大的利润。这个房间是灰矮人为与黑暗精灵谈判做准备的地方。桌子上的金属零件是灰矮人折叠笼子的铰链，他们打算展示出来。

拱门上方的雕刻用矮人语写着“不要相信任何人”。

Negotiating Chamber.name: 谈判室 (Negotiating Chamber)
Negotiating Chamber.text:
这个房间被两英尺深的黑水淹没。一张古老石桌的残骸刚好露出水面。四只巨大的、像螃蟹一样的怪物在房间里潜伏。

水使得这个房间成为&Reference[难地形]{difficult terrain} for creatures without a swimming speed. Four @UUID[Actor.P6qC8jB3pnEH0tIE]{chuuls} lurk here, alert for prey entering from any direction. They know about the secret door in the south wall (see below), but they also know that a dangerous creature is beyond it. They don’t pass through the secret door unless they can chase foes that way.

Secret Door. Drow priests often spied on the negotiations from behind this secret door. A character who searches the room and succeeds on a [[/check skill=prc dc=15]] check finds the door, which opens by shifting a sliding panel. Behind the door is a staircase that ascends to area @UUID[.xGHA4cO1EB5uejZp]{G20.}。打开秘密门会导致水淹没楼梯底部的前两英尺。

Drow Delegation Room.name: 黑暗精灵代表团房间 (Drow)
Drow Delegation Room.text:
这个房间积水两英尺深。生锈的金属椅框从水中突出，门口上方雕刻着精致的文字。

金属椅框曾经是舒适的椅子，但除了框架以外的一切都已经腐烂。

雕刻的文字用精灵语写着“distrust all strangers”。

Drow Passage.name: 黑暗精灵通道 (Drow Passage)
Drow Passage.text:
天然石阶通向一条被黑水淹没的通道。通道西侧水面上方突出一半的门。

这条宽敞的通道通往地下世界的领土，曾被黑暗精灵占领。两个黑暗精灵贸易商行在通道两侧各设有前哨站(区域@UUID[.pmWaebD969s82bTS]{G19}和区域@UUID[.CusnAUrCdKqfiu06]{G21})。

这条通道的最低点被深约2英尺的黑水淹没。

Azfadiel Receiving Room.name: 阿兹法迪尔接待室(Azfadiel Receiving Room)
Azfadiel Receiving Room.text:
通往宽敞隧道的门上有一个硬币与蜘蛛腿符号，以及用精灵语写着“Azfadiel”的名字。精通&Reference[技能=历史]{area G20}技能的角色，或者是一名黑暗精灵，会记得Azfadiel家族是一家被数代前的掠食者灵魔灭绝的黑暗精灵贸易家族。

这个宽敞的房间里有几把坚固的丝绸椅子，坐架是金属制成。靠西墙有一个装饰着硬币与蜘蛛腿符号的金属柜。

当灵魔袭击时，黑暗精灵居民将大而空的金属柜移至神龛门前(@UUID[.xGHA4cO1EB5uejZp]{area G20})以掩盖门。这个诡计奏效；灵魔从未进入神龛，也未发现被束缚在里面保护的约克洛恶魔。

移开金属柜是打开神龛门的必要步骤，尽管来自G20区域的约克洛恶魔可以以雾的形态渗透门缝和金属柜。

这里的一切都比吊桥十字路口的其他地方都要干净整洁，维护得更好。

Azfadiel Shrine.name: 阿兹法迪尔神龛 (Azfadiel Shrine)
Azfadiel Shrine.text:
蜘蛛腿上的硬币沿着覆盖天花板的蛛网爬行。一张桌子靠在通往北面楼梯的旁边。在南墙上，一座大理石祭坛上有一个明显的凹痕。在祭坛附近，有一个身体像融化的黄蜡一样的单眼生物。

这个@UUID[Actor.pbsoYochlol00000]{yochlol} Zuluthl was summoned by the priests of House Azfadiel, and it has remained here ever since. The demon knows that the Azfadiel drow here were killed a long time ago, but the fight was over too quickly for the yochlol to join. Although Zuluthl doesn’t need to remain here, the yochlol considers itself on an extended break from the chaotic machinations of the Demonweb Pits. It enjoys the solitude and reacts violently to intruders.

Command Word. The table contains several slate tablets filled with notes in Undercommon. Reviewing them reveals that the writer was eavesdropping on conversations between duergar and drow. Apart from dull trade information about sharing resources to get more money from traveling customers, the duergar were seeking a command word to activate a magical stone tower. The drow claimed ignorance. The notes indicate that the drow already researched the command word and were separately negotiating with the nearby svirfneblin about sharing it with them. The drow hoped to be paid twice for the same command word. Characters who spend at least 10 minutes reading the notes find a drawing of a tower with the Terran word for “petrification” written under it. The characters should be able to determine that this is the @UUID[Item.9stfX2i2I1YPo8vx]{mudslick tower’s} command word once they’ve examined the tower in @UUID[.l37BZzpIfBelLsxg]{area G14.}

@UUID[Item.pbsoG20treasure0]{Treasure.} 爬行在蛛网上的蜘蛛是由约克洛尔施加魔法的普通硬币。如果被带出这个房间，它们会恢复成普通的硬币。这里总共有80金币。此外，在祭坛上方有一卷自由移动的法术卷轴。

Moldy Room.name: 发霉的房间(Moldy Room)
Moldy Room.text:
这个曾经豪华的餐厅被淹没在超过一英尺深的黑水中。曾经支撑挂毯的金属棒现在支撑着一层霉菌。六把椅子围绕着一张大桌子。在一个角落里，水面上结了一层发霉的棕色硬壳。

向南的一块宽10英尺的霉菌区域是褐色霉菌，使水变冷到足以形成一层薄薄的冰层。

褐色霉菌

褐色霉菌靠温暖为食，从周围吸取热量。一块褐色霉菌通常覆盖一个10英尺的正方形区域，其周围30英尺内的温度始终寒冷。

当生物首次移动到距离霉菌5英尺内或在那里开始其回合时，它必须进行一次[[/save ability=con dc=12]]豁免投掷，豁免失败则受到[[/damage 4d10 type=cold]]冷伤害，豁免成功则受到一半伤害。

褐色霉菌对火焰免疫，任何带有火焰的源头靠近5英尺内的霉菌区域，会导致霉菌立即向火焰方向扩展，覆盖一个10英尺正方形区域(以火源为中心)。暴露在造成冷伤害的效果下的褐色霉菌会立即被摧毁。

了解更多：危害 DMG，第105页

Killing Hall.name: 杀戮大厅(Killing Hall)
Killing Hall.text:
这条曲折走廊的西侧布满狭窄的箭孔。

箭孔提供了三分之三掩护(three-quarters-cover)和两个角色(@UUID[Actor.GpeQYtlo8oGvGlkM]{grimlock} minions have occupied the adjacent guard room for the past few weeks.
